our products are truly unique and instantly appreciated for their ingenuity alone.  our matchbox packaging is perfect for gifting.  many of you will actually cherish the packaging box and keep for other uses.  hence, we are selling the matchbox as a standalone product.  note the fxband and bottleglove are not packaged in these boxes.  still wondering what to get that special person who you think has everything ...


 please sir, i want some more
we realize you are design famished and in need ... to receive more than one perk, simply create additional contributions ... we apologize that the indiegogo system doesn't allow mutliple perks within one contribution. the 'you'll get nothing and like it' perk is really meant for people that want EVERYTHING on the menu, or a large combination of items. it's actually a quote from caddyshack.


 milestones
fortunately, we have many ideas ... unfortunately, not the funds to produce the entire line for launch.  all of the products have functional prototypes, which were perfected over the past 3 years ... all the designs are now prepared for manufacturing and the creation of inventory necessary to move forward efficiently.  the one exception is the blackbox.  we have perfected the protype, but have yet to tool the design for manufacturing.  tooling and manufacturing of the blackbox is an extremely expensive upfront cost.  therefore, we really need your help and are only able to offer the blackbox if we meet our $100k goal.
$100,000

3% of contributions will be donated to Human Rights Campaign
your contributions will let us truly launch the entire line of products.

$500,000

4% of contributions will be donated to Human Rights Campaign
only with contributions of 1/2 million dollars would i be able to recoup my initial financial investment ... and this would not even pay a penny towards the years of sweat equity ... and this is completely hypothetical, because i plan to reinvest the funds in the project ... this is a serious and committed endeavor ...  please do not let the artist within starve.

$1,000,000 [the true goal]

5% of contributions will be donated to Human Rights Campaign
supporters will recieve a very special gift
the top 9 individuals with the most referrals and deemed most influencial, will recieve the entire line of products! for more information on how indiegogo tracks referrals click this link

each city around the globe which was a major participant, will have a celebratory party and our supporters will be our vip guests





 the plan


via a successful campaign we will be able to produce and stock our entire line.
the manufacturers are all in hand.  our new york team includes; jewelry, handbag, garment, plastic and rubber manufacturers.  all of the products have functional prototypes, which were perfected over the past 3 years.  a global fulfillment house is lined up for shipping, if it can't be handled in-house.
not knowing the total orders achievable via this medium, we are conservatively estimating production time at 3 months. inventory on all products can certainly be created and shipped within 2 months or less, but we are allowing extra time to ensure quality control. please keep in mind most of our manufacturers are local craftspeople normally working with designers and exclusive limited brands, not mass overseas producers. WE ARE PREPARED TO HANDLE ANY QUANTITY OF ORDERS!!!



 what makes us tick
manifestoour underground effort applies creativity + passion to our daily routine, by producing minimalist 'daily essentials for the anti-conformist' tm.  with our design aesthetic, we are fighting visual pollution from the endless branding, product warnings and physique destroying bulk ... think of us as the anti-brand.

creativity + passionour ideals infuse every aspect of our products and also the way we spread the word … we want to continue the success of softly marketing ourselves and treating people with dignity and respect.  we do not see you as sheep to be manipulated.  we are already planning our next film shoot and additionally, we have a great interest in endorsing all types of artistic mediums in the future.  we want to create for and be supported by creatives!!!  hopefully this project will start a movement ... erasing neighborhood destroying billboards, film interrupted advertising, blazing logos, price tags derived from marketing efforts, not quality. let's take back our lives.
our many layersdesign  ::  minimalist . discreet . provocative . luxuriousengineering  ::  compact . structurally complex . functionalmanufacturing  ::  quality driven . made in new yorkmarketing  ::  only with whisperssoul  ::  creative . connecting creatives . supporting creativesresponsible  ::  vegan . environmentally consciousunderstanding ::  consciously simple . subconsciously influential


 my story [pierre]
i was never satisfied with the accessories on the market for many reasons.  perhaps, because i am detail obsessed ... many of you will likely relate to at least one of the drivers which led me to launch this product line.
 

love


design
quality
being discret, without changing who i am
being unique




dislike


bulk in my pockets
pretentious logos and labels
annoying tags
commercial advertising and blatant marketing
made in china




shopping list which was never resolved (until now)
key ring ... that's not annoying when wearing skinny jeans
daily bag ... androgynous, stylish, quality, unpretentious and fits my iPad
cigarette case/box ... camoflauged ... not drawing negative attention
money clip/band ... that's not flashy, pretentious, stupid, or cheap
underwear ... if calvin's not paying rent, my body's not another billboard
condom cover ... nothing worse than that circular indentation in one's wallet
pill case ... that's not flashy, pretentious, stupid, or cheap 


my do-it-yourself attitude
 
working in architecture and real estate development, i have always created projects from scratch.  i am passionate about the process.  this project is certainly different, but there are parallels in the design process ... just that it's to the smallest detail.
 

helmut newton's influence
 
i've always been inspired by helmut newton's photography and i realize a lot of inspiration was drawn from his photographs when developing the designs of the product line.  imagine if helmut newton had to design accessories for muji.  hence the short film's inspiration as well.
 

 

aggressive marketing makes me nauceous
 
when i set out to create the boX brand, i wanted to do it my way.  somewhat like an anti-brand that could get not-for-profit religious tax status.  somehow that led into making a creative short film about a cat thief stealing my products.  extrememly subtle and hopefully entertaining.  i did not want to get the word out via typical marketing strategies, which would make me puke ... if you don't like what you do, why do it???  sidenote: i don't own a tv, as i cannot justify the interruptions of commercials (exception is the super bowl sunday).
 
once i had the initial prototype made, i decided to throw caution to the wind and create some art!  i wanted to start building a feeling for my brand. i engaged my friend olivier french who is a film maker and owns viral cinema studio.  the result was 'black box'. the product was featured in a very subtle way.
 
smells like art ... 'black box' our erotic film noir short, was an official selection at the cannes film festival in 2011 and at the la jolla fashion film festival in 2012.



 

detail obsessed
 
countless designs and many very expensive prototypes later the entire line is finally ready to launch ... 3 years to achieve perfection.  the designs needed to be approved by the helmut newton in my head and worthy of the boX cat burgalr to steal.
 
early design drawings and mood boards

 
 
... and thus began my little fantasy range of products ... NOW I NEED YOUR HELP TO ACTUALLY MAKE IT HAPPEN ... after all i think that there is a little helmut newton in all of us.


 msg from [pierre] ... thank you!!!
i have my designs, dreams, hard work and life savings invested ... but nothing could have happened working alone ...
boX will become successful thanks to all you trend-setting early adapters!!!  
i send a very special thank you to all who supported the major effort behind this 3 year project, helping perfect the simplest of products ... simple in final form, but complex in terms of design, artistic and philosophical layers. it has been an incredibly creative & rewarding journey already, which deserves to continue with accelerated momentum.  it would not be, what it has become, without the involvement of ::
OLIVIER FRENCH : Michael Nelson : tony notarberardino : yael abbey : erinn ruth : shahnee zaver : yanni feder : steve ovenden : patrick cannell : jill lenoir : elise laporte : kathy cherry : lora gheysen : cynthia kummer : catherine mix : sophie willing : steven keating : rick librizzi  : joel diamond : gene hale : steve fuller : joseph postiglione : james hicken : ben cohen : kathleen lopez : jeff frummess : perry levy : steve tollen : andrew morse : jonathan gray : ray oliveira : raymond mclaren : hector simancas : dimitrios krikelis : eirini tsachrelia : dna model management : fushion model management : heather janey : susan batson studio : jasper sceats : roberta wallach : greg loibl : josiah hobson : rick lehrer : sabrina piccione : rodolphe lombard : dionisio cortes : matt dobbs : sarah moessner : romina frecha : scott reed : nissa botthoff : samuel ferrati
the underdog will finally have a voice!!!


 connections

share (y)our creative ideas on FACEBOOK [share our campaign on facebook for a chance to win the product of your choice]

undress your thoughts with us on TUMBLR

please guide us through the sea of s%^t on TWITTER towards your genius
connect on pinterest, behance or instagram for inspiration

we envision a chain reaction of connections will occur if you personally share this campaign.  your friends will surely thank you for the introduction.

story:
Vitrizia: Fashion & Emotions 

www.vitrizia.com  vitrizia.p@gmail.com

4 lines to love and share: TesteCalde, Frock, Marriage, Immagina..

Vitrizia is a brand that embodies my lifetime dream,

  • to create a line of fashion that makes women happy with pop and fairy hats that accompany the winter,
  • with leather dresses inspired rock,
  • with art creations for theater companies,
  • with custom accessories for the wedding.

How

  • Coloring thoughts with warm hats named "TesteCalde"

  • Hugging the body with elegance, sensuality and personality with the "Frock"

  • creating unique accessories for the wedding with the line "Marriage"
  • creating emotions for the theater with the surreal production of "Immagina"

The Lines

Vitrizia for " TesteCalde "

The noble and unpredictable cozy wool is transformed into models of handmade hats, with unique and precious decorations. The decorations come from the encounter with other craftsmen in the tailoring world who share buttons, crystals, nacre, felt and ever new elements. The hats are unique or limited edition.

Click here to look photo Teste Calde



BONNET LUXURY


TUDOR LUXURY

TUDOR ORIENTAL LUXURY

BASCO LUXURY

TUDOR ORIENTAL BASIC

HAIR


TUDOR BASIC

BONNET BASIC



Vitrizia for Frock


From the processing of the main territorial leather artisans come the ‘Frock’. blouse and dress version; light, elegant and timeless. The Frock accompany the modern woman, who loves to dress refined articles, wearable anytime. The Frock are made in patchwork with selected leathers, with unique workmanship, with either solid or matched colors .The sizes of Blouses and dresses are S, M, L . Colors: black blue, brown, red, vanilla, multicolor.

Click here to look photo Frock

Frock SS

Frock LS

Frock Dress


Vitrizia for "Marriage"

Vitrizia has an incredible proposal ... the Wedding !
The woman that wears Vitrizia loves details and new visions of being fashion but different and truly creative! Now she can choose unique accessories for her wedding day in pure Vitrizia's style ! Vtrz has created a very glamour knitted bouquet and unique headdresses ! These incredible proposals are embellished by crystals and other precious details in white, all its declinations or personalized as she wishes. This unique masterpiece as the Glamour Bouquet, can be preserved like the wedding dress. A wedding of soft wool and warm as love.
For a total look of a bride that dares, Vitrizia proposes the choice of a special dress:  the "Frock".
This choice can be extended to the bridesmaids ! The "Frock" is the leather Vitrizia's line.
Early Bird in Crowdfunding: Headdress + Glamour Bouquet. Colors: white, ecru, rope, vanilla, colored.

Some idea 

Headdress + Glamour Bouquet + Stola.

Wedding Frock + Headdress + Glamour Bouquet.

Wedding Frock + Headdress + Glamour Boquet + Stola.

Colors: white, ecru, rope, vanilla, colored.

Click here to look photo Marriage

the Glamour Knitted Bouquet 


the Glamour Knitted Bouquet Flowersfall

Wedding Headdress: Bonnet 30's with veil. Color: Warm White

Wedding Whipped Cream Set. Headdress "Zuccotto" and the Glamour Knitted Bouquet round model. Color warm white

The "Daring Bride" with the Wedding Frock Vanilla ... mour Knitted Bouquet "Flowerfall" color cream

Fancy Bride. Wedding Headdress "Hair" and the Glamour Bouquet " Flowersfall". Color: Cream




Vitrizia for " Immagina"


Collections for theater companies that come from the carrying out of a project and the development of theatrical costumes.

Click here to look photo Immagina


Vitrizia’s history

Vitrizia is the abbreviation of my name: Patrizia Visone and it is my life experiences. I was born on the other side of the world in Sydney, from a family of Neapolitan artisans who always took care of fashion, the "Sartoria Visone", listed in the archives of Cultural Heritage between the 13 historical tailors Studios in Campania.

“If Vitrizia has fashion in her blood, the idea of hats is always been in her mind"!

My creations come to life thanks to my passions for art and rock music, I’m  inspired by "Alice in Wonderland", the director Tim Burton’s visions, the trilogy of "Matrix", the Doors,Pink Floyd, Depeche Mode.

I love the colors and intense expressions of the world of Rock, Pop, Synth and especially psychedelia. The product of this vision represents an evocative,timeless and valid art/craft expression.

My challenge is to take my family historical legacy and keep saying : "Who has head, can’t miss hat .“ Click here to look photo Sartoria Visone

Patrizia Visone

I graduated as a Tour Operator, I decided to follow my passions starting to create the front lines since the '90s alternating career to the family. Then I improved my technique by taking a course at the Accademia della Moda. I have had so many creative experiences through a professional and managerial path which brought me last year to the incubator Vivaio Donna, where I compared to managers, craftsmen and creative people.  Click here to look photo Patrizia Visone Story

Why crowdfunding

Crowdfunding is a right answer across the market and the traditional financial system, because it is based on personal values and conveys energy to those who need a professional help. It is an harmonious and vibrating social system that cannot leave you alone, where people can compare and create new collaborations.

Why support me

I ask you to help me because I want to do business in Naples, to make a fashion network, a place where one can share his own competence and esperience.

•  I ask for support in order to be able to turn my passion into a job.

•  I ask for support to prove that we can have our dreams back.

•  I ask for support to give other people the same opportunity to pursue a dream like mine or collaborate with me.

•  I ask for support to give an opportunity to women who do not have a job to learn it with my help.

•  I ask for support to continue and take the made in Naples brand abroad.

•  I ask for support to create a network between the Neapolitan artisans of all ages


What are the funds for

To start producing and take part of trade fairs I need to create a company and start the early stages. The funds raised will be used to:

·  Open a small company with its legal and administrative obligations a € 3.500

·  Start my e-commerce € 3.000

·  Make a promotional campaign in key social media to spread and show my products and create a catalog €. 2.000

The first objective is € 8.500

I hope, with your help, to be able to achieve this first step and go further.

In this case I would be ready to participate in an italian fashion trade fair : White 2016: € 3.000

Finally I would like to build up a co-working with other colleagues who work in fashion and want to share spaces and professionalism, as bloggers, designers, tailors, graphics. € 5.000



Project Timeline

We would like to reach every place in the world. So send us an email and we 'll reply.

Vitrizia: Fashion & Emotion

www.vitrizia.com  vitrizia.p@gmail.com

4 linee da amare e condividere: TesteCalde, Frock, Marriage,Immagina


Vitrizia è un brand che racchiude il mio sogno di una vita,

  • creare una linea di moda che renda felici le donne con cappelli pop e fiabeschi che accompagnano l’inverno,

  • con abiti in nappa di ispirazione rock,

  • con accessori personalizzati per il matrimonio

  • con creazioni artistiche per le compagnie teatrali


In che modo?

  • Colorando i pensieri con caldi cappelli linea "TesteCalde"

  • Abbracciando Il corpo con eleganza, sensualità e personalità con la linea "Frock"

  • Ideando accessori unici per il matrimonio con la linea “Marriage”

  • Creando emozioni per il teatro con la linea surreale "Immagina"


Le linee


Vitrizia per “TesteCalde”

La lana accogliente, nobile ed imprevedibile è trasformata in modelli di cappelli artigianali, resi unici e particolari grazie ad insolite e preziose decorazioni. Le decorazioni nascono dall'incontro con altri artigiani del mondo sartoriale condividendo bottoni, cristalli, madreperle, feltri ed elementi sempre nuovi. I cappelli sono in edizione unica o limitata . Click here to look photo Teste Calde


Vitrizia per “Frock”

Dalla pelle della lavorazione dei principali artigiani territoriali nascono le Frock in versione maglie ed abito, leggere, eleganti e senza tempo. Le Frock accompagnano la donna moderna che ama vestire capi ricercati indossabili in tutte le ore del giorno. Le Frock sono realizzate in patchwork con pelli selezionate, con lavorazioni  uniche, tinta unita or tinte abbinate. Le bluse e gli abiti hanno una vestibilità S,M,L .  Colori:  nero, blu, marroni, rosso, vaniglia, multicolor.Click here to look photo Frock


Vitrizia for "Marriage"

La donna che indossa Vitrizia ama i dettagli e nuove visioni di essere alla moda, diversa e veramente creativa! Ora può scegliere accessori unici per il suo matrimonio, in puro stile Vitrizia.

Vtrz ha creato un bouquet a maglia molto glamour e copricapo unici!

Queste proposte incredibili sono arricchite da cristalli e altri dettagli preziosi in bianco, in tutte le sue declinazioni o personalizzati. Questo capolavoro unico come il Glamour Bouquet, può essere conservato come l'abito da sposa. Un matrimonio di lana morbida e calda come l'amore.

Per un total look della sposa che osa, Vitrizia propone la scelta di un abito speciale: la "Frock".

Questa scelta può essere estesa alle damigelle d'onore!

La "Frock" è la linea di pelle di Vitrizia.

Early Bird in crowdfunding: Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet. Colori: white, ecru, rope, vanilla, colored.


Qualche idea:

Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet.

Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet + Stola.

Wedding Frock .

Wedding Frock + Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet.

Colori: white, ecru, rope, vanilla, colored.


Click here to look photo Marriage


Vitrizia per “ Immagina” 

Collezioni per le compagnie teatrali che nascono con dalla realizzazione di un progetto e lo sviluppo dei costumi. Click here to look photo Immagina

Vitrizia Story

Vitrizia è l'acronimo del mio nome: Patrizia Visone e delle mie  esperienze di vita. Io sono nata dall’altra parte del mondo a Sydney da una famiglia di artigiani napoletani che da sempre si è occupata di moda, la “Sartoria Visone”, custodita negli Archivi dei Beni Culturali tra le 13 sartorie storiche della Campania. Le mie creazioni prendono vita grazie alle mie passioni verso l’arte e la musica rock ispirandomi  a "Alice nel paese delle meraviglie", alle visioni del regista Tim Burton, alla trilogia di "Matrix", ai Doors, ai Pink Floyd,  ai  Depeche Mode .

Adoro i colori e le espressioni  del mondo Rock, Pop, Synth e, in particolare la psichedelia. Il prodotto di questa visione rappresenta un’espressione artistico/artigianale evocativa, senza tempo e  di carattere.

“Se Vitrizia la moda ce l'ha nel sangue, l'idea dei cappelli l'ha avuta sempre in testa!”

Vitrizia è Il "Cappellaio Matto" che incorre in soluzioni inusuali, disegna e crea modelli unici. Sono un'artigiana che maneggia lane, fonde cromie e sfumature, creo insoliti accostamenti. Amo provocare e osare. La mia sfida è quella di proseguire la storia di famiglia per continuare a dire: “Chi ha testa non manca cappello!”. Click here to look photo Sartoria Visone


Patrizia Visone

Diplomata come operatore turistico, ho preferito seguire le mie passioni iniziando a creare le prime linee sin dagli anni 90 alternando il percorso professionale a quello familiare. Ho poi migliorato la mia tecnica seguendo un corso modellismo presso l’Accademia della Moda di Napoli. Tante le esperienze creative che si sono poi sintetizzate grazie al percorso professionale e manageriale che mi ha visto impegnata lo scorso anno nell’incubatore Vivaio Donna, dove mi sono confrontata con manager, artigiani e creative.

Perché crowdfunding

Il crowdfunding è una risposta trasversale al mercato ed al sistema finanziario tradizionale, perché si basa sui valori personali e convoglia energia verso chi vuole farsi aiutare. E 'un sistema armonioso e sociale che non può lasciarti solo, è un sistema dove c'è confronto, è un sistema vivo che fa nascere tante collaborazioni.


Perchè sostenermi

Ti chiedo di aiutarmi perchè voglio fare impresa a Napoli mettendo a disposizione delle persone che vorranno collaborare, la mia storia ed il mio know how, fatto anche di relazioni e condivisioni. 

  • chiedo il sostegno per avere gli strumenti per far diventare le mie passioni un mestiere

  • chiedo sostegno per provare che possiamo recuperare i sogni

  • chiedo sostegno per dare la possibilità anche ad altre donne di seguire un sogno come il mio o collaborando con me

  • chiedo sostegno per dare la possibilità a donne che non hanno un mestiere di impararlo facendo formazione con me.

  • chiedo sostegno nel continuare a portare il Made in Naples all’estero

  • chiedo sostegno per circondarmi di persone appassionate e positive.

  • chiedo sostegno per creare una rete tra gli artigiani napoletani di tutte le età.


A cosa servono i fondi

Per iniziare a produrre e partecipare alle fiere ho bisogno di creare un'impresa e avviare le prime fasi. I fondi raccolti serviranno a:

  • Aprire una piccola  società giuridica con i relativi obblighi amministrativi  €3.500

  • Avviare un e-commerce  €3.000

  • Realizzare una campagna promozionale sui principali social media che faccia conoscere i miei prodotti e realizzare un catalogo €2.000

Il primo obiettivo è €8.500

Spero grazie al vostro aiuto di riuscire un raggiungere questo primo passo e di superarlo. In questo caso sarei pronta a partecipare ad una fiera italiana della moda, White 2016: €3.000.Infine vorrei partecipare ad un coworking con altre colleghe che operano nella moda e condividere gli spazi e le professionalità, come blogger, designer, sarte, grafiche €5.000 Sviluppo del progetto

PRESS KIT  ITALIANO

About me

www.vitrizia.com

vitrizia.p@gmail.com

https://www.facebook.com/vitrizia

https://twitter.com/vitrizia

Spedizioni Le spese di spedizione sono escluse. In questa prima fase inveremo nei seguenti paesi- Italia- Europa- Stati Uniti- CanadaVorremmo arrivare in tutto il mondo, mandaci un email e ti replicheremo.Unicamente per gli amici Napoletani che vorranno possono ritirare i prodotti presso il mio laboratorio.

I was born on the other side of the world in Sydney, from a family of Neapolitan artisans who always took care of fashion, the "Sartoria Visone", listed in the archives of Cultural Heritage between the 13 historical tailors Studios in Campania. 
“If Vitrizia has fashion in her blood, the idea of hats is always been in her mind"!My creations come to life thanks to my passions for art and rock music, I’m  inspired by "Alice in Wonderland", the director Tim Burton’s visions, the trilogy of "Matrix", the Doors,Pink Floyd, Depeche Mode.


I love the
colors and intense expressions of the world of Rock, Pop, Synth and especially
psychedelia. The product
of this vision represents an evocative,timeless and valid art/craft expression.

My
challenge is to take my family historical legacy and keep saying : "Who
has head, can’t miss hat .“ Click here to look photo Sartoria Visone

Patrizia Visone



I graduated
as a Tour Operator, I decided to follow my passions starting to create the
front lines since the '90s alternating career to the family. Then I improved my
technique by taking a course at the Accademia della Moda. I have had so
many creative experiences through a professional and managerial path which
brought me last year to the incubator Vivaio Donna, where I compared to managers,
craftsmen and creative people.  Click here to look photo Patrizia Visone Story
Why crowdfunding


Crowdfunding
is a right answer across the market and the traditional financial system,
because it is based on personal values and conveys energy to those who need a
professional help. It is an harmonious and vibrating social system that cannot
leave you alone, where people can compare and create new collaborations. 
Why support me 
I ask you
to help me because I want to do business in Naples, to make a fashion network,
a place where one can share his own competence and esperience. 
•  I ask for support
in order to be able to turn my passion into a job. 
•  I ask for support
to prove that we can have our dreams back. 
•  I ask for support
to give other people the same opportunity to pursue a dream like mine or
collaborate with me. 
•  I ask for support
to give an opportunity to women who do not have a job to learn it with my help.
•  I ask for support
to continue and take the made in Naples brand abroad. 
•  I ask for support
to create a network between the Neapolitan artisans of all ages
What are the funds for 
To start producing
and take part of trade fairs I need to create a company and start the early
stages. The funds raised will be used to: 
· 
Open a small company with its legal and administrative
obligations a € 3.500 
· 
Start my e-commerce € 3.000 
· 
Make a promotional campaign in key social media to
spread and show my products and create a catalog €.
2.000 
The first
objective is € 8.500 
I hope, with your
help, to be able to achieve this first step and go further. 
In this case I
would be ready to participate in an italian fashion trade fair : White 2016: € 3.000 
Finally I would
like to build up a co-working with
other colleagues who work in fashion and want to share spaces and
professionalism, as bloggers, designers, tailors, graphics. € 5.000

Vitrizia: Fashion & Emotion www.vitrizia.com  vitrizia.p@gmail.com 
4 linee da amare e condividere: TesteCalde, Frock, Marriage,Immagina 
Vitrizia è un brand che racchiude il mio sogno di una vita, 

creare una linea di moda che renda felici le donne con cappelli pop e fiabeschi che accompagnano l’inverno, 
con abiti in nappa di ispirazione rock, 
con accessori personalizzati per il matrimonio
con creazioni artistiche per le compagnie teatrali

In che modo? 

Colorando i pensieri con caldi cappelli linea "TesteCalde"
Abbracciando Il corpo con eleganza, sensualità e personalità con la linea "Frock"
Ideando accessori unici per il matrimonio con la linea “Marriage”
Creando emozioni per il teatro con la linea surreale "Immagina"

Le linee
Vitrizia per “TesteCalde”

La lana accogliente, nobile ed imprevedibile è trasformata in modelli di cappelli artigianali, resi unici e particolari grazie ad insolite e preziose decorazioni. Le decorazioni nascono dall'incontro con altri artigiani del mondo sartoriale condividendo bottoni, cristalli, madreperle, feltri ed elementi sempre nuovi. I cappelli sono in edizione unica o limitata . Click here to look photo Teste Calde



Vitrizia per “Frock”

Dalla pelle della lavorazione dei principali artigiani territoriali nascono le Frock in versione maglie ed abito, leggere, eleganti e senza tempo. Le Frock accompagnano la donna moderna che ama vestire capi ricercati indossabili in tutte le ore del giorno. Le Frock sono realizzate in patchwork con pelli selezionate, con lavorazioni  uniche, tinta unita or tinte abbinate. Le bluse e gli abiti hanno una vestibilità S,M,L .  Colori:  nero, blu, marroni, rosso, vaniglia, multicolor.Click here to look photo Frock

Vitrizia for "Marriage"

La donna che indossa Vitrizia ama i dettagli e nuove visioni di essere alla moda, diversa e veramente creativa! Ora può scegliere accessori unici per il suo matrimonio, in puro stile Vitrizia. 
Vtrz ha creato un bouquet a maglia molto glamour e copricapo unici! 
Queste proposte incredibili sono arricchite da cristalli e altri dettagli preziosi in bianco, in tutte le sue declinazioni o personalizzati. Questo capolavoro unico come il Glamour Bouquet, può essere conservato come l'abito da sposa. Un matrimonio di lana morbida e calda come l'amore.
Per un total look della sposa che osa, Vitrizia propone la scelta di un abito speciale: la "Frock". 
Questa scelta può essere estesa alle damigelle d'onore! 
La "Frock" è la linea di pelle di Vitrizia.
Early Bird in crowdfunding: Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet. Colori: white, ecru, rope, vanilla, colored.

Qualche idea:
Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet.
Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet + Stola.
Wedding Frock .
Wedding Frock + Copricapo + Glamour Bouquet.
Colori: white, ecru, rope, vanilla, colored.
Click here to look photo Marriage
Vitrizia per “ Immagina” 

Collezioni per le compagnie teatrali che nascono con dalla realizzazione di un progetto e lo sviluppo dei costumi. Click here to look photo Immagina


Vitrizia StoryVitrizia è l'acronimo del mio nome: Patrizia Visone e delle mie  esperienze di vita. Io sono nata dall’altra parte del mondo a Sydney da una famiglia di artigiani napoletani che da sempre si è occupata di moda, la “Sartoria Visone”, custodita negli Archivi dei Beni Culturali tra le 13 sartorie storiche della Campania. Le mie creazioni prendono vita grazie alle mie passioni verso l’arte e la musica rock ispirandomi  a "Alice nel paese delle meraviglie", alle visioni del regista Tim Burton, alla trilogia di "Matrix", ai Doors, ai Pink Floyd,  ai  Depeche Mode .Adoro i colori e le espressioni  del mondo Rock, Pop, Synth e, in particolare la psichedelia. Il prodotto di questa visione rappresenta un’espressione artistico/artigianale evocativa, senza tempo e  di carattere.
“Se Vitrizia la moda ce l'ha nel sangue, l'idea dei cappelli l'ha avuta sempre in testa!”
Vitrizia è Il "Cappellaio Matto" che incorre in soluzioni inusuali, disegna e crea modelli unici. Sono un'artigiana che maneggia lane, fonde cromie e sfumature, creo insoliti accostamenti. Amo provocare e osare. La mia sfida è quella di proseguire la storia di famiglia per continuare a dire: “Chi ha testa non manca cappello!”. Click here to look photo Sartoria Visone
Patrizia Visone 
Diplomata come operatore turistico, ho preferito seguire le mie passioni iniziando a creare le prime linee sin dagli anni 90 alternando il percorso professionale a quello familiare. Ho poi migliorato la mia tecnica seguendo un corso modellismo presso l’Accademia della Moda di Napoli. Tante le esperienze creative che si sono poi sintetizzate grazie al percorso professionale e manageriale che mi ha visto impegnata lo scorso anno nell’incubatore Vivaio Donna, dove mi sono confrontata con manager, artigiani e creative.
Perché crowdfunding
Il crowdfunding è una risposta trasversale al mercato ed al sistema finanziario tradizionale, perché si basa sui valori personali e convoglia energia verso chi vuole farsi aiutare. E 'un sistema armonioso e sociale che non può lasciarti solo, è un sistema dove c'è confronto, è un sistema vivo che fa nascere tante collaborazioni.
Perchè sostenermi 
Ti chiedo di aiutarmi perchè voglio fare impresa a Napoli mettendo a disposizione delle persone che vorranno collaborare, la mia storia ed il mio know how, fatto anche di relazioni e condivisioni. 

chiedo il sostegno per avere gli strumenti per far diventare le mie passioni un mestiere
chiedo sostegno per provare che possiamo recuperare i sogni
chiedo sostegno per dare la possibilità anche ad altre donne di seguire un sogno come il mio o collaborando con me
chiedo sostegno per dare la possibilità a donne che non hanno un mestiere di impararlo facendo formazione con me.
chiedo sostegno nel continuare a portare il Made in Naples all’estero
chiedo sostegno per circondarmi di persone appassionate e positive.
chiedo sostegno per creare una rete tra gli artigiani napoletani di tutte le età.

A cosa servono i fondi
Per iniziare a produrre e partecipare alle fiere ho bisogno di creare un'impresa e avviare le prime fasi. I fondi raccolti serviranno a: 

Aprire una piccola  società giuridica con i relativi obblighi amministrativi  €3.500 
Avviare un e-commerce  €3.000 
Realizzare una campagna promozionale sui principali social media che faccia conoscere i miei prodotti e realizzare un catalogo €2.000 

Il primo obiettivo è €8.500 
Spero grazie al vostro aiuto di riuscire un raggiungere questo primo passo e di superarlo. In questo caso sarei pronta a partecipare ad una fiera italiana della moda, White 2016: €3.000.Infine vorrei partecipare ad un coworking con altre colleghe che operano nella moda e condividere gli spazi e le professionalità, come blogger, designer, sarte, grafiche €5.000 Sviluppo del progetto

Spedizioni Le spese di spedizione sono escluse. In questa prima fase inveremo nei seguenti paesi- Italia- Europa- Stati Uniti- CanadaVorremmo arrivare in tutto il mondo, mandaci un email e ti replicheremo.Unicamente per gli amici Napoletani che vorranno possono ritirare i prodotti presso il mio laboratorio.

story:
TATE WADE is a two-man start-up based in Bienne in Switzerland, home of luxury watches. The journey started when two watch enthusiasts met to make an authentic design Swiss automatic watch which doesn’t cost an arm and leg and delivers everyday pleasure to wear.

 

AS SEEN IN... 

 

Our goal is to bring something new and different to our consumers. To create a design we wanted, we had to find our own unique brand concept which will live in our watches. After many exchanges of ideas, we took ‘moments of life’ idea to build our brand since we believe that our watches can have bigger meaning to our consumers than being just nice watches to wear.

The idea is simple but relevant. In life, there are important moments which make difference. However, sometimes we miss them without realizing how important they are. We wish our consumers to be able to leverage full potential of each moment to live a successful and meaningful life without leaving important things behind.

To translate this idea into more tangible design code, we chose camera as a medium because we saw a strong link between photography which captures slice of life and our idea about moments. Thanks to top Swiss watch designers that we work together, this concept is now materialized into a unique TATE WADE design.

The design is elegant, premium, and playful. Each model boast its own personality to accommodate different preference that you may have. On the case back of each watch, it is written in Latin ‘Carpe Momentum in Vita” as per our brand mission. ‘Seize the moments in the life’.  

 

 

BOKEH COLLECTION

Bokeh collection offers you three styles of watches.

 

 

  • Bokeh Collection - Stainless Steel - 42mm

 

  • Bokeh Collection Black PVD - 42mm

 

  • Bokeh Collection Gun Metal PVD - 42mm

 

 

We chose SWISS MADE as we value the heritage of Swiss automatic watch industry which have been built over hundreds years through continuous innovation. If we were to make a quartz watch, we could have gone somewhere else to make our watches. However, for AUTOMATIC watches of long term value, we believe that Swiss Made is the right choice for you. It was also a challenge that we set for ourselves to prove that it is possible to create a unique Swiss Made watch with attractive price. 

Made by Swiss Craftmanships

 

You might ask why we chose automatic watch rather than quartz which is more accurate. As watch enthusiasts, we believe that true value of a watch is not only in accurately measuring time but also in special emotional bonding that we can build with the watch for long period of time. We want a watch which we can proudly wear for long time and give it to someone important as a meaningful gift in life. When we finalized our brand concept, it became clear that it had to be a mechanical movement.

Bokeh Collection - Black PVD - 42mm - Caseback

 

ETA movement is one of the most popular movements used by the most of luxury Swiss watch brands. Due to its popularity, it is extremely difficult to source it for a small start-up. We searched almost a year to find a supplier who could provide us with the movement not only for this project but for long term. After a long search, we finally found one! After a long discussion with the supplier, for the project, we decide to use ETA2824. ETA2824 is one of the most famous movements which can be easily found in many of top end luxury Swiss watch brands. Precision of the movement is definitely one of the best out there.

ETA2824 movement

 

All TATE WADE watches have specification only found in premium Swiss watch brands.

  • Movement: ETA2824 (Standard grade)
  • Case: Unique wing body case in 42mm / Steel / premium PVD coating (43.5mm for wing side)
  • Thickness: 9.1mm
  • 20mm lug width
  • Case back: 4 screws case back with window
  • Front glass: 1.85mm Elevated Sapphire glass with Anti-Reflection coating
  • Back case glass: High quality mineral glass window
  • Dial: Immersive multi-layer dial with different finishing
  • Water Resistance: 50M
  • Crown: TATE WADE crown
  • Buckle: TATE WADE buckle
  • Strap: High quality genuine leather

 

All TATE WADE watches allow you to change the look of your watch within seconds without tools.

 

 

We work with one of the best designers in the industry. Their innovative design challenges status quo of Swiss watch design. After ten months of intensive collaboration and countless designs, we are proud to present the outcome of our collaborative work.

Designed by one of the best Swiss design houses

 

 

We achieve affordable consumer pricing by;

  • No Middleman: through our direct business model via internet. Usual retailer margin is 50% of a normal consumer price. It means much more work for us. However, we will gladly take it.
  • No Outrageous Marketing: we invest marketing budget where it adds value to our consumer and the brand only. 
  • Optimize our margin to make it more attractive for consumers

 

 

Behind Tate Wade stands a team of passionate watch fans like you. We started this journey simply because we love watches. Each of us brings unconventional views and different expertise built in other industries than watch industry to create unique products and experiences. Our Mission is to give watch enthusiasts the opportunity to access the finest Swiss timepieces that they could not afford otherwise. AND we do it from consumers' point of view as we are also consumers. We are based in Switzerland. BUT each of us travels and works in different locations in the world to be closer to watch enthusiasts and to know better your needs.  Of course, our cameras and our watches are with us on our travels.

 

  • All our watches come with 2 years warranty period. 
  • All our watches have 30 days free return policy as long as it is not worn and in original status.
  • Custom Duty&VAT charges: You will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 

If you have any question, just leave a comment or email to us at hello@tatewade.com.

story:
If you wish to get your WT2 Plus, feel free to visit our Timekettle official website for purchase.

 

Language is beautiful, fascinating and occasionally frustrating – especially if the conversation is between speakers of two different languages! When you're traveling abroad, there’s nothing worse than being stuck in an unknown place without a means to effectively communicate.

Real communication is natural and face-to-face. Without eye contact and body language, conversations are awkward or altogether impossible.

That's why we created the WT2 translator, the real-time translating earphone for natural, hands-free communication. Conversations between different languages are enabled by two earphone translators and one app. Each person wears one earphone - you speak in your language, they hear in theirs.

WT2 was recently featured on TechCrunch. Thanks for the demo!

We can't wait to share the WT2 translator with the Indiegogo community. With your help, we can bridge the gap in foreign language communication.

 

WT2 is a real-time, wearable translator that includes 2 earphones, 1 app, and a customized charging case. The earphones provide long-term, hands-free foreign language communication, allowing you to immerse yourself in the local culture while traveling, express yourself more completely and build more meaningful connections with the people you meet.

What is 1+2, and why is it the best solution for natural bilingual conversation?

"1+2"=1 app + 2 earphone translators.

Our WT2 is the world’s first and only “1+2 translation” system. This means that unlike other solutions, our patented technology innovatively allows multiplexed speech communication between both WT2 earphone translators and a single phone with the WT2 App, creating a smooth communication experience for the user.

This system integrates wireless communication technology, intelligent algorithms, voice translation, and many other technologies into one seamless package. By using "1 +2", one can easily talk with anyone, regardless of spoken language, and with no awkward setup steps.

“1+2“ is the key to breaking down language barriers across the globe, letting you easily talk to new people without having to worry about asking them to download an app on their own phone first - Just pass them an earphone and start having a real conversation! With the WT2, full eye contact and natural body language are maintained, allowing you to not only to talk to other people in different languages, but to really understand them.

 

Here are some of WT2’s unique features:

Perfect for travel enthusiasts, expats, homestay students, cross-cultural families, international shops, hotels and everyone in between. WT2 can help make your travel experience more enjoyable and improve your communication efficiency with foreign customers or partners.

 

 

 

 

WT2 comes ready to use - just separate the charging case and share one half with your speaking partner. The earphones will automatically wake up and pair with each other as well as the app. Nothing could be more Simple!

 

The WT2 translator currently supports six languages: Mandarin Chinese, English, French, German, Japanese and Spanish. After our initial release, we will continually add more languages (Portuguese, Arabic, Thai, etc.), which will be rolled out via our app updates. Kickstarter Community: Please leave your ideas about which languages you would like WT2 to support! We’ll plan to include the most requested languages in our next app update.  

 

After in-depth research that examined the most common travel situations and careful consideration of WT2’s technical capabilities, we’ve created three communication modes (“Auto”, “Manual”, and “Ask”) to deal with a variety of communication environments.

 

This mode is for conversation in a relatively quiet environment such as a hotel, meeting room or coffee shop. There’s no need for any manual operation – with its advanced built-in in intelligent algorithm, WT2 will translate your conversation in real time, absolutely hands-free.

 

 

This mode makes communication possible even in a noisy environment. Unfortunately, the WT2 translator can’t be fully automatic in very noisy environments, but you can easily adapt to your surroundings by activating the Manual mode.

 

 

This mode is useful for quick inquiries like asking for directions or confirming a price.To use Ask mode, wear one of the earphones and hold your phone in front of your conversation partner. He or she can then hear the translation aloud or view the translated text.

 

 

The simple, creative design of our custom charging case makes it easy to share your WT2 translator with your speaking partner. There’s no awkward fumbling - just separate the charging case and start your conversation in one smooth step.

 

 WT2’s charging case can recharge the earphones on-the-go for extended use and longer conversations. Just place your earphones inside the case and charging will start automatically. The battery life of the WT2 translator is approximately 2 hours when used outside of the charging case.

 

 

 

 

People are often surprised to discover how far machine translation technology (MT) has progressed. Today, the technology has already reached the level we need, in most cases, for daily communication. 

We’ve had major breakthroughs on both real-time automatic audio interaction and smart speech translation switch technology. Our system has successfully integrated wireless communications technology, voice translation technology, wearable technology and acoustic technology. Most of these technologies have never before been integrated into an earphone, but the WT2 translator achieved this in order to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience to users.

It's incredibly exciting for us to make this new translation technology accessible to everyday consumers at an affordable price. We strive to make the WT2 translator a better translation experience - natural, reliable and instantly ready to use.

 

 

 

Timekettle is a tech startup based in Shenzhen & Pasadena, CA. We are a passionate team of wireless embedded experts, audio engineers, iOS and Android developers, and hardware and manufacturing gurus. Our partners include Global Machine Translation, ASR and TTS professionals. 

We believe WT2 can not only give individuals a much more colorful travel experience but also provide international organizations with a more efficient communication channel. It's time to make this groundbreaking technology accessible to everyone.

  

            

 

                                                                              

 

 

 

 

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.

With your help, we can bridge the gap in foreign language communication. WT2 is a real-time, wearable translator that includes 2 earphones, 1 app, and a customized charging case. The earphones provide long-term, hands-free foreign language communication, allowing you to immerse yourself in the local culture while traveling, express yourself more completely and build more meaningful connections with the people you meet.What is 1+2, and why is it the best solution for natural bilingual conversation?"1+2"=1 app + 2 earphone translators.Our WT2 is the world’s first and only “1+2 translation” system. This means that unlike other solutions, our patented technology innovatively allows multiplexed speech communication between both WT2 earphone translators and a single phone with the WT2 App, creating a smooth communication experience for the user.This system integrates wireless communication technology, intelligent algorithms, voice translation, and many other technologies into one seamless package. By using "1 +2", one can easily talk with anyone, regardless of spoken language, and with no awkward setup steps.“1+2“ is the key to breaking down language barriers across the globe, letting you easily talk to new people without having to worry about asking them to download an app on their own phone first - Just pass them an earphone and start having a real conversation! With the WT2, full eye contact and natural body language are maintained, allowing you to not only to talk to other people in different languages, but to really understand them. Here are some of WT2’s unique features:Perfect for travel enthusiasts, expats, homestay students, cross-cultural families, international shops, hotels and everyone in between. WT2 can help make your travel experience more enjoyable and improve your communication efficiency with foreign customers or partners.     WT2 comes ready to use - just separate the charging case and share one half with your speaking partner. The earphones will automatically wake up and pair with each other as well as the app. Nothing could be more Simple! The WT2 translator currently supports six languages: Mandarin Chinese, English, French, German, Japanese and Spanish. After our initial release, we will continually add more languages (Portuguese, Arabic, Thai, etc.), which will be rolled out via our app updates. Kickstarter Community: Please leave your ideas about which languages you would like WT2 to support! We’ll plan to include the most requested languages in our next app update.   After in-depth research that examined the most common travel situations and careful consideration of WT2’s technical capabilities, we’ve created three communication modes (“Auto”, “Manual”, and “Ask”) to deal with a variety of communication environments. This mode is for conversation in a relatively quiet environment such as a hotel, meeting room or coffee shop. There’s no need for any manual operation – with its advanced built-in in intelligent algorithm, WT2 will translate your conversation in real time, absolutely hands-free.  This mode makes communication possible even in a noisy environment. Unfortunately, the WT2 translator can’t be fully automatic in very noisy environments, but you can easily adapt to your surroundings by activating the Manual mode.  This mode is useful for quick inquiries like asking for directions or confirming a price.To use Ask mode, wear one of the earphones and hold your phone in front of your conversation partner. He or she can then hear the translation aloud or view the translated text.  The simple, creative design of our custom charging case makes it easy to share your WT2 translator with your speaking partner. There’s no awkward fumbling - just separate the charging case and start your conversation in one smooth step.  WT2’s charging case can recharge the earphones on-the-go for extended use and longer conversations. Just place your earphones inside the case and charging will start automatically. The battery life of the WT2 translator is approximately 2 hours when used outside of the charging case. 
 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 
   People are often surprised to discover how far machine translation technology (MT) has progressed. Today, the technology has already reached the level we need, in most cases, for daily communication. 
We’ve had major breakthroughs on both real-time automatic audio interaction and smart speech translation switch technology. Our system has successfully integrated wireless communications technology, voice translation technology, wearable technology and acoustic technology. Most of these technologies have never before been integrated into an earphone, but the WT2 translator achieved this in order to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience to users.

It's incredibly exciting for us to make this new translation technology accessible to everyday consumers at an affordable price. We strive to make the WT2 translator a better translation experience - natural, reliable and instantly ready to use.

 


 

 

Timekettle is a tech startup based in Shenzhen & Pasadena, CA. We are a passionate team of wireless embedded experts, audio engineers, iOS and Android developers, and hardware and manufacturing gurus. Our partners include Global Machine Translation, ASR and TTS professionals. 
We believe WT2 can not only give individuals a much more colorful travel experience but also provide international organizations with a more efficient communication channel. It's time to make this groundbreaking technology accessible to everyone.

 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 

  

            

 
 
                                                                                  
           
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.

story:
The Impact of Untreated Hearing Loss     

     Did you know that there are over 600 million people worldwide with some degree of hearing loss? And did you know that about 80% of these people live in developing countries with limited access to the proper treatment and equipment they need?

     Untreated hearing loss prevents healthy children and adults from having access to a complete education and meaningful job opportunities. If a child with hearing loss has access to treatment and hearing aids before she is 3 years old she has a dramatically better chance of developing the ability to speak and therefore the opportunity to receive an education in the public school systems accross the developing world.

    

     In developing countries, only 1 in 40 people that need a hearing aid have one. Hearing aids are expensive and batteries are prohibitively expensive and difficult to find.

Solar Ear's Vision

    This is where we come in.

    Why spend so much money when the energy from the the sun is free?

    Solar Ear is a social non-profit business that develops solar powered hearing aids and rechargeable batteries. These high quality products are 80% less expensive than aids and batteries on the world market. And furthermore, these hearing aids were invented and are manufactured by young adults who are trained to make the solar powered units. 

    We want to diminish the impact and burden of hearing loss and show society that these people have special abilities.

 

We Need Your Help!

    You can help us make this dream come true!

    Solar Ear and its founder, Howard Weinstein, have been recognized in awards for leading social entrepreneurship and impact. Now we want a website that allows us to go even further.

    With your donation we will make an accessible website. The site will bring together a community of hard of hearing people and those looking to help make the world a better place. Thank you for your help.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Doug Long. I served as a Peace Corp Volunteer in Swaziland from 93 to 95 and in Lesotho from 2003 to 2005. I addition to teaching computers and woodworking in the mountainous Thaba Tseka District, I also was a member of the District AIDS Task Force. The coordinating committee for volunteer efforts to combat the AIDS epidemic.

I have continued to fully support a couple of orphans (both of which lost their parents to AIDS) since returning to Hawaii in 2005 and return to Lesotho at least every 2 years to check their living, schooling and housing conditions.

When going back to Lesotho I go with as many suitcases as the airline will allow me, packed with cloths for a few of the many orphans in the country. Because of the weight and bulk of shoes, I generally collect what money I can to purchase shoes in South Africa and Lesotho. These school shoes are also distributed to the orphans.

Lesotho is not you typical picture of Africa. Just this winter 2 times they recieved over 18" of snow. The winter months are from about April to September. Without shoes, because of the low tempuratures, it is impossbile for kids to attend school.

100% of the funds collected will be used to purchase shoes.


Thankyou.

story:
Why we need your help right now

By pledging we will be able to produce blank sweatshirts and hoodies which we will ship to our location here in the SF Bay Area using local vendors to do all the printings and embroidery. Our long term goal is to assemble our own printing and embroidery factory here in Oakland. The first step to our plan is to test this concept by making small quantity of blank apparels. 

The short of my story:

My name is Baba Afolabi. I am a Bay Area resident living in Oakland. I have a passion for multiculturalism and diversity. I believe by wearing a diverse lifestyle brand, it will enhance our cultural awareness which in turn allows people to embrace diversity. 

The Logos

After spending some time in Tokyo, Japan in 2008, I (Baba Afolabi-Founder) introduced the SuRu brand in November 2009 by releasing a few t-shirt designs and cab driver hats. From then on, we worked hard at SuRu on product quality, as it is our top priority to present you with an impeccable, comfortable product that will last. In 2010, I had a serious futbol (Soccer) injury that was so severe I was out of work for 8 months, living on temporary disability. I have to say it drove me nuts but yet fueled my passion to work even harder on SuRu. Through perseverance, I put my MBA to work by completing a 35 page business plan (excluding the financials). I called it The SuRu Blueprint. I diced it down to 28 pages (including financials) and I called it The Business Plan, then down to 8 pages and I called it The Proposal. I took the proposal to nearly all my friends with the hope of getting one of them to invest so I could revitalize the brand. I ended with two amazing friends that enabled us to produce our first top collection last year and acquire a pop-up shop (temporary store) to sell them. We are here on Indiegogo to raise funds. In order to make SuRu a successful brand and company, we need the support of the people and money to do many things, from production to marketing, from talent acquisition to giving back to the community, and more importantly bringing part of our production process to the USA.

Our goal is to provide internships and employment to local inner-city youth and college students interested in the apparel industry or simply looking for entry-level jobs. We would like to give them the opportunity and platform to do something fun and develop careers for themselves. In order to do this, we need your support to make this happen.

As a start-up apparel company, we are confined to buy from popular brands like American Apparel to place our graphics on their product to sell. We are changing all that, but we need your support to make this happen. By pledging today you will be giving us the resources to achieve our objectives. We want to keep producing apparel that supports and promotes a diversity lifestyle. Our idea is to produce blank apparels using our own fabric choice and sewing details in factories and ship them to our location here in the San Francisco Bay Area, where we will do all the printing and embroidery work through local vendors. If this strategy thrives, we will invest our profits in assembling our own printing and embroidery machines. This will enable us to hire locally.

Our designs & concepts:

We create premium apparel that embodies multiculturalism and diversity for both men and women. Our designs derive inspirations from the global sport, futbol (Soccer), along with a diverse variety of cultural symbols. We incorporate colors from the sovereign flags of different countries, alphabets and language characters from different countries. We are celebrating cultural pride by creating high quality premium apparel embellished with culture and diversity. 

The perks

We are offering one of our winter sweatshirt and hoody designs made with 100% cotton for our backers. The first 50 backers will get these items at a low price of $49 for a sweatshirt, valued at $75 and $59 for a hoody valued at $90. We are also offering hats, t-shirts, stickers, and wristbands. All the rewards are to your right. Just click and follow the prompt steps. You will be able to pick the size after the campaign ends.

WRISTBAND, STICKER AND HAT Rewards. 

The T-Shirt Reward: Made with 100% Cotton

The Sweatshirt & Hoody Reward: Made with 100% Cotton

Note: Above sweatshirt comes in male fitting style as well.

The money raised will be used for the following:

  • Help produce blank sweatshirts and hoodies for both men and women

  • Help fund local Marketing and Promotion agendas

The Impact Of Your Help

Beside our social position, your contribution will also help bring part of our production process to USA using local vendors to do our printing and embroideries. If this process prove to be successful we will invest our profits in assembling our own printing and embroidery machines. We will then provide internship and job opportunity to inner-city youths to do all the printing and embroidery. Many after school programs are being cut due to economy down turn. We think this will be a great outlet for many of our youths to learn and grow. Your contribution means we are taking a step towards achieving this goal. 

Other Ways You Can Help

To support us, click on any of the pledges to the right that fit your enthusiasm for our mission. You can also help us reach our goal by spreading the word amongst friends and family, blog about our campaign and use Indiegogo share tools so they land at the appropriate campaign. Thank you in advance.

Cheers,

Baba. Afolabi

Note: Above sweatshirt comes in male fitting style as well.

Help produce blank sweatshirts and hoodies for both men and women


Help fund local Marketing and Promotion agendas

We will then provide internship and job opportunity to inner-city youths to do all the printing and embroidery. Many after school programs are being cut due to economy down turn. We think this will be a great outlet for many of our youths to learn and grow. Your contribution means we are taking a step towards achieving this goal. 

Other Ways You Can Help



To support us, click on any of the pledges to the right that fit your enthusiasm for our mission. You can also help us reach our goal by spreading the word amongst friends and family, blog about our campaign and use Indiegogo share tools so they land at the appropriate campaign. Thank you in advance.
Cheers,
Baba. Afolabi

story:
Our pre-order campaign is complete and product will be available for purchase online at www.nettlestale.com starting Monday, May 20th!

 

About The Campaign:

 

We’ve heard it from you online and in our change rooms over the last five years - many of you are frustrated with the women’s clothing industry. These large corporations and major brands seem unable to make sizing and fit requests, and as a result, end up excluding the women they’re supposed to exist for. Imagine actually having a say and a vote about what clothing is being produced and put to market for women. Well, now you do!

Just like our swimwear line, we're now offering an opportunity for women to have a say in what items we make.

 

What is Kind Clothing?

We're launching a brand new line of kind clothing. Why is it kind? It's kind to the women that wear it:

  • In how it’s been designed to fit
  • The wide range of sizes available (Don't see your size? Let us know!)
  • The quality of fabrics used

It's also kind to the people that make it:

Every item is manufactured right here in Canada, in manufacturing shops we have good relationships with and visit on a regular basis. We know our shop owners and sewers.

We strive to use technically advanced fabric, that embrace new methods of creating more eco-friendly and sustainable garments for the planet, sewers and customers.

Our pieces are not only determined by our customers, they're also modelled by them. On our campaign and online shop, you’ll see women that look just like you and the women that surround you daily. The positive impact this has for the current and future generations is invaluable.

What We Need & What You Get

What we need:

We want to make clothing you want, in the sizes that you need. We're using this as a pre-order campaign, so we’ll only produce items in the colours and sizes that our customers want and need. This keeps you, us and the planet happy!

 

What you get:

Clothing that’s made for you! This is an exclusive opportunity to order these  items at prices and in bundles that will never be offered again once the line goes to market.

 

Here’s how it works (it’s easy, we promise!):

1. Choose Your Colour

2. Choose Your Size (Don't see your size? Email us)

3. Place Your Pre-Order

 

Perk #1: Strait Tee

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Your new favourite everyday T-shirt has arrived. The perfect length for a french tuck (@Tanfrance), but no worries, it’s not a crop. This shirt is boxy, without looking like a box. Made from the softest blend of Rayon from Bamboo, Cotton and Spandex, this shirt washes nicely and maintains its shape no matter how well loved it becomes. My new favourite T-shirt to pair with my higher waisted, raw denim.

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #2: Harbour Tee

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Your new favourite weekend warrior. The perfect length to wear with jeans or tights. Short enough to be a T-shirt, but long enough to cover that tush. Made from the softest blend of Rayon from Bamboo, Cotton and Spandex, this shirt washes nicely and maintains its shape no matter how well loved it becomes. Wear it as-is, or if you love the fit as much as I do, wear it tucked all the way in. Also a great length for days when you feel like knotting it.

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #3: Port Blouse

Material: 100% Linen

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Your perfect office and weekend brunch blouse. Both the cut and darting in this top work together to provide an effortless fit that does not flatten larger bust lines. This top will be an easy addition to your weekly rotation. Made in 100% Linen - need we say more?

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #4: Reserve Blouse

Material: 100% Linen

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Finally a basic, cropped blouse that fits a wide array of busts! Both the cut and darting in this top work together to provide an effortless fit that does not flatten larger bust lines. Having deja vu? That's because this blouse literally is the Port Blouse sans ruffle. If it ain't broke, don't fix it! Pair it with jeans on the weekend or trousers for the work day, this blouse works great as an everyday basic in your weekly rotation and is also made in 100% Linen glory!

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #5: Lund Dress

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Wear it loose or belted, this dress cares about how you feel ,what stage of life you're in, and is effortless to style. Gain some weight, lose some weight, the Lund Dress, just loves you, for you. The fuller bottom allows for a gorgeous drape. Nothing like wearing  a dress you don't want to change out of as soon as you get home.You're sure to receive compliments in this when you’re out and about! Not to mention how amazing this piece would be to pack for your next trip. The perfect length, versatile, lightweight and breathable fabric.

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #6: Brem Dress

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Wear it with jeans, wear it with slides, wear it with tights, wear it every day and every season, this dress will be your friend until the end! A perfectly fitted raglan sleeve throughout the shoulder, with vertical darts up the back that allows fabric to rest perfectly in your curves, while leaving it looser in the front. A great balance of oversized comfort and tailoring. Long enough to be worn as a dress, but a super fun piece to layer and mix up!

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #7: Crofton Button Up

Material: 100% Linen

SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

Both our above model’s (Liz) and videographer’s (Britney) favourite item, the perfect button up for every bust size, we promise! (Julia's an E cup and wears the large, with no pulling!) If that didn't sell you, this shirt has pockets!!! Wear it open or closed, half buttoned or buttoned all the way up, this shirt is going to be your new favourite basic and office classic. The perfect dance between oversized and fitted - finally a button up made for you!

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #8: Sonora Jumpsuit

Material: 62% Lyocell, 19% Cotton, 13% Modal, 6% Spandex

SIZE CHART (Black / Heretic)  SIZE CHART (Blue Windowpane) / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE

From lazy Sunday on the couch to the savvy office jumpsuit. The button closure in the back, pleats in the front, and matching belt work together to add just enough detail to be styled for a day at the office. Just throw on a jacket or blazer. Made from the softest fabric in our entire line up! Seriously! SO SOFT!!! Note: If you’re between sizes, size down in this piece, as the fabric does contain 6% spandex and has quite a bit of stretch.

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #9: 2 x T-shirts

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex

The T-shirt bundle is a steal of a deal! Pre-order 2 x Harbour T-shirts or 2 x Strait T-shirts or one of each in any colour or size. Invest in multiple colours and keep them to yourself or share the order with a friend or co-worker. This is a bundled deal, never to be seen again!

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

 

Perk #10: 2 x Dresses 

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex

The dress bundle is a steal of a deal! Pre-order 2 x Lund Dresses or 2 x Brem Dresses or one of each in any colour or size. Invest in multiple colours and keep them both for yourself or share the order with a friend or co-worker. This is a bundled deal, never to be seen again!

Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.

About Us

Hi there! We're Nettle's Tale and we launched our company in 2014 with an IndieGoGo campaign you can view it HERE.

 

We've been making honest swimwear, sized after and modelled by women just like you, since the above campaign in 2014 and now, five years later we're still the same brand, with the same values, but we're launching something new and we've returned to our IndieGoGo family and our first ever customers to share it.

Risks & Challenges

Some of the challenges we face manufacturing locally is slightly higher unit costs and sometimes longer production time lines. We're overcoming some of these challenges by making sure we are not producing wasteful units or amounts of inventory through pre-order campaigns like this one. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you won't be able to contribute to this campaign at this time, but still have a strong desire to see more size inclusive and ethical clothing going to market for women, that doesn't mean you can't contribute in your own way:

  • You can get the word out about the line and make some noise about our pre-order campaign to friends, colleagues and family.
  • Or you can use any of the share tools, to share this campaign on any social media channels or by direct message and email (social share links at top of this page, by the video).

Our pieces are not only determined by our customers, they're also modelled by them. On our campaign and online shop, you’ll see women that look just like you and the women that surround you daily. The positive impact this has for the current and future generations is invaluable.
What We Need & What You Get
What we need:
We want to make clothing you want, in the sizes that you need. We're using this as a pre-order campaign, so we’ll only produce items in the colours and sizes that our customers want and need. This keeps you, us and the planet happy! What you get:
Clothing that’s made for you! This is an exclusive opportunity to order these  items at prices and in bundles that will never be offered again once the line goes to market. Here’s how it works (it’s easy, we promise!):
1. Choose Your Colour
2. Choose Your Size (Don't see your size? Email us)
3. Place Your Pre-Order
 
Perk #1: Strait Tee


Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Your new favourite everyday T-shirt has arrived. The perfect length for a french tuck (@Tanfrance), but no worries, it’s not a crop. This shirt is boxy, without looking like a box. Made from the softest blend of Rayon from Bamboo, Cotton and Spandex, this shirt washes nicely and maintains its shape no matter how well loved it becomes. My new favourite T-shirt to pair with my higher waisted, raw denim.
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
