Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Your new favourite weekend warrior. The perfect length to wear with jeans or tights. Short enough to be a T-shirt, but long enough to cover that tush. Made from the softest blend of Rayon from Bamboo, Cotton and Spandex, this shirt washes nicely and maintains its shape no matter how well loved it becomes. Wear it as-is, or if you love the fit as much as I do, wear it tucked all the way in. Also a great length for days when you feel like knotting it.
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #3: Port Blouse

Material: 100% Linen
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Your perfect office and weekend brunch blouse. Both the cut and darting in this top work together to provide an effortless fit that does not flatten larger bust lines. This top will be an easy addition to your weekly rotation. Made in 100% Linen - need we say more?
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #4: Reserve Blouse

Material: 100% Linen
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Finally a basic, cropped blouse that fits a wide array of busts! Both the cut and darting in this top work together to provide an effortless fit that does not flatten larger bust lines. Having deja vu? That's because this blouse literally is the Port Blouse sans ruffle. If it ain't broke, don't fix it! Pair it with jeans on the weekend or trousers for the work day, this blouse works great as an everyday basic in your weekly rotation and is also made in 100% Linen glory!
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #5: Lund Dress

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Wear it loose or belted, this dress cares about how you feel ,what stage of life you're in, and is effortless to style. Gain some weight, lose some weight, the Lund Dress, just loves you, for you. The fuller bottom allows for a gorgeous drape. Nothing like wearing  a dress you don't want to change out of as soon as you get home.You're sure to receive compliments in this when you’re out and about! Not to mention how amazing this piece would be to pack for your next trip. The perfect length, versatile, lightweight and breathable fabric.
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #6: Brem Dress

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Wear it with jeans, wear it with slides, wear it with tights, wear it every day and every season, this dress will be your friend until the end! A perfectly fitted raglan sleeve throughout the shoulder, with vertical darts up the back that allows fabric to rest perfectly in your curves, while leaving it looser in the front. A great balance of oversized comfort and tailoring. Long enough to be worn as a dress, but a super fun piece to layer and mix up!
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #7: Crofton Button Up

Material: 100% Linen
SIZE CHART / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
Both our above model’s (Liz) and videographer’s (Britney) favourite item, the perfect button up for every bust size, we promise! (Julia's an E cup and wears the large, with no pulling!) If that didn't sell you, this shirt has pockets!!! Wear it open or closed, half buttoned or buttoned all the way up, this shirt is going to be your new favourite basic and office classic. The perfect dance between oversized and fitted - finally a button up made for you!
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #8: Sonora Jumpsuit

Material: 62% Lyocell, 19% Cotton, 13% Modal, 6% Spandex
SIZE CHART (Black / Heretic)  SIZE CHART (Blue Windowpane) / COMMUNITY FIT GUIDE
From lazy Sunday on the couch to the savvy office jumpsuit. The button closure in the back, pleats in the front, and matching belt work together to add just enough detail to be styled for a day at the office. Just throw on a jacket or blazer. Made from the softest fabric in our entire line up! Seriously! SO SOFT!!! Note: If you’re between sizes, size down in this piece, as the fabric does contain 6% spandex and has quite a bit of stretch.
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #9: 2 x T-shirts

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex
The T-shirt bundle is a steal of a deal! Pre-order 2 x Harbour T-shirts or 2 x Strait T-shirts or one of each in any colour or size. Invest in multiple colours and keep them to yourself or share the order with a friend or co-worker. This is a bundled deal, never to be seen again!
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
 
Perk #10: 2 x Dresses 

Material: 67% Bamboo Rayon, 29% Cotton, 4% Spandex
The dress bundle is a steal of a deal! Pre-order 2 x Lund Dresses or 2 x Brem Dresses or one of each in any colour or size. Invest in multiple colours and keep them both for yourself or share the order with a friend or co-worker. This is a bundled deal, never to be seen again!
Buy now, decide later - View our Indiegogo exchange policy here.
About Us
Hi there! We're Nettle's Tale and we launched our company in 2014 with an IndieGoGo campaign you can view it HERE. We've been making honest swimwear, sized after and modelled by women just like you, since the above campaign in 2014 and now, five years later we're still the same brand, with the same values, but we're launching something new and we've returned to our IndieGoGo family and our first ever customers to share it.
Risks & Challenges
Some of the challenges we face manufacturing locally is slightly higher unit costs and sometimes longer production time lines. We're overcoming some of these challenges by making sure we are not producing wasteful units or amounts of inventory through pre-order campaigns like this one. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Some of you won't be able to contribute to this campaign at this time, but still have a strong desire to see more size inclusive and ethical clothing going to market for women, that doesn't mean you can't contribute in your own way:

You can get the word out about the line and make some noise about our pre-order campaign to friends, colleagues and family.
Or you can use any of the share tools, to share this campaign on any social media channels or by direct message and email (social share links at top of this page, by the video).

story:
My name is Catriona Stewart and I have been designing under the name Kitty Crème for the past year or two (it's all gradually changing to Catriona Stewart)

I've been producing latex for a while and studied lingerie design at uni which has enabled me to create supportive lingerie for women of various sizes, including underwired bras from 30AA to 38F! This is alongside other clothing such as dresses and catsuits in price ranges to suit everyone’s budget.

Please look through the video above and my facebook images to see the variety of clothing I can do: www.facebook.com/kittycreme 

I've had help from models and photographers to help me get to where I am today with local fashion shows and a lot of photo shoots, but I am eager to push this further - it's just the money side of things that's holding me back. With the donations it will allow me to explore the creative side of fashion within latex and diversify myself from other latex designers by producing more prints and laser cutting techniques for both men and women to enjoy. I want to push latex designing further and be able to be inspired by new shapes, prints and textures from the catwalks - as the high street does - and then push my work into the laps of other clothing companies for more sales.

I am just starting to explore menswear design within latex and want to create smart, sexy pieces that make men feel handsome and dominant and make women smile when they see them walk by!

I also want to be able to create a small bridal wear collection using cream latex that makes alternative style women think about the possibilities of their big day!

Here are some costings for this fund:

Latex: approx £600

Screen printing: approx £250

Laser cutting: approx £100

Photoshoot: approx £200

Model/fitting fees: approx £100

There are other costs too such as travel, cutting equipment, latex cleaner and glue, marketing, paying someone when I need an extra pair of hands etc but those above are what really need to be conquered first.

I like to push myself and be self reliant but unfortunately due to my disability I'm unable to work a full time job. I have a few orders coming in and I also hire out my samples so it helps to fund small projects, but this one I want to really use to push harder into the latex fashion scene and fetish/alternative markets. I aim to take my new collection as a catwalk to large fetish/alternative clubs and other places to promote my small but growing business as well as approach clothing shops with my smaller commercial pieces such as pencil skirts, stockings and lingerie.

I have thoroughly enjoyed being able to meet people through my work from various walks of life and I really enjoy this side of the work too. I just need to put in a lot of time, effort and money to take it to the next level of building my business.

 

If you can't contribute then please would you be able to just share my campaign on your blog, social networking and modelling/photography sites. I would appreciate this a lot!

story:
A great pair of Varvega boots is essentially quality footwear mindfully crafted. No compromise!  All of our handmade products undergo a steady process of creation and manifestation under the watch of our experienced artisans. 
 
We believe our shoes are heirlooms for the modern man to savour, as he embarks on the journey of life and accumulates experiences with every step taken. 
 
 
 

 

Each step in the process of making a Varvega shoe is done by hand. We take pride in paying extra attention to its details, from the welting to the stitching. It's a traditional way that we highly invest in, only because it adds to the character and longevity of our products.


Our boots are made using materials of the best quality, one of which is our signature Horween Chromexcel leather, which, to exist, goes through a meticulous vegetable tanning process in Chicago, USA. We love this leather because it is is strong enough to maintain a solid form, yet fluid enough to give comfort to the wearer. Using it means that our shoes require little breaking in. (Want to know more about Horween?) 

Auburn  leather craftsmen have cultivated the passion, knowledge, and skills required to produce the finest quality American leather. Using only U.S. domestic dairy cowhides, Auburn deliver optimum strength, colorfast and crocking resistance while maintaining mellow temper (feel) and for our leather laces, optimum “tie-ability.” (Want to know more about Auburn Leather?) 

Our use of Italian vegetable tanned leather surrounds the foundation of our boots: the midsole. The leather is very durable and able to withstand harsh conditions, terrains, and surfaces. Our utility of it represents our belief in durability.

Pictured above: our vegetable tan insole incorporating a cushion foam bed for extra comfort.

Varvega boots are distinguishable through their brass accents. We believe their rustic quality adds depth to each design. 

Another unique selling point: each synthetic rubber outsole and heel beneath a Varvega shoe is customised to exert the best grip onto the ground.

 

Goodyear Welt is an old-school blueprint for constructing durable and comfortable boots. At Varvega, this particular welt is styled in 270 degrees, with the Stormwelt detailing sealed together. This construction which is also known as Handwelt Constructio is incredibly easy to resole and water-resistant

Another blueprint that we abide by is the Double Stitchdown, also known as the Double Rows. It involves 270 degree parallel stitching that present the rugged looks of the boots. This construction give the best aesthetic value for the boots and it is also resole-able.

Each of our four designs have its own distinguished profile via its last.

V1910 D-Last for Woodsman
Wide forepart. Low toe profile. This last rounds your feet. 

V1920 D-Last for Horseman
Based on the style of the classic 1920s work boots, this last has a rugged look.

V1930 D-Last for Dirtman
Classic round toe profile with bulky heel.

V1940 D-Last for Craftsman
Classic slim toe profile exuding finesse.

Pledge now and get to customise a pair of Varvega Crafts Boots! Choose from four styles, four Horween Chromexcel colors, and two construction styles (Goodyear Welt/Double Stich Down). As a finishing touch and a token of our appreciation, your name will be on the insoles of your customised boots. 
 

The first 20 backers  will get to choose the Exclusive Horween Dark Olive CXL. from the selection  of leather. Other selection of  Horween Chromexcel leathers are: Brown CXL, Black CXL, Natural CXL

Once a target of $30,000 is reached, we will unlock a new material option: the Dainite British Sole. This sole is renowned for its high quality grip useful for cold weathers and rainy days.

Once we reach $50,000, we will be open for upper customisation, wherein by a leather is selected based on colour (note: this is only available with the Natural Chromexcel, Black Chromexcel and Brown Chromexcel leathers).

Step 1 :  Take out a pen, a ruler and a piece of  paper.

Step 2 : Place the paper against a wall. Stand with one foot on the paper, heel facing the wall.
Use your pen to outline your foot. (Remember to keep the pen straight)

Step 3 : Once the outline of your foot is drawn, draw two intersecting lines to measure the length and width of your foot. Then, measure the lines with the ruler.  

Step 4 : Check the sizing accordingly. For example: if the length of your foot (from your tallest toe to the edge of your heel) measures 27.5cm, it means you are wearing 9D or 43 EU. 

Please provide us your shoes or boot size to ensure accurate sizing/measures. For now, all lasts are of the D type. If your feet is much wider than than the standards, just contact us at info@varvega.com, we're happy to address the situation and propose a solution!

Handworks are personal. Due to their attention to details, artisans do not compromise the quality of their creations. This not only promises pleasing aesthetics, it also promotes durability and comfort. As such, it doesn't matter wherever our artisans come from. What matters is their ability to provide for people who walk the walk.

Our previous experiences of creating numerous MTO shoes and boots ensures that we have a trained eye to notice risks and challenges that arise throughout the creation and manifestation process.

Sizing is always the most important factor that makes or breaks fit. As such, it is important to us that you provide an accurate measurement of your shoe size when ordering a pair.

Another potential risk is time-consuming delivery (it takes about 6 to 12 weeks for a pair of freshly crafted boots materialise and develop, before reaching you). We have our raw materials on standby, in our anticipation of the reception towards this campaign. Once the pledge reach amounts to 90% of our target reach, we will jumpstart our production and notify you along the way. 


If you like our campaign, do share to your friends using Indiegogo sharing tools!

story:
"The world’s first travel ready punching bag & it won’t disturb the neighbors"

Our objective is to engineer the improvements from our previous two prototypes into a final market ready model, after which we will tour the nation filming the reaction of people testing out the Corner Bag. The results will be posted on Youtube. Interest and support will confirm the consumer base needed to help bring the Corner Bag to the market place.

The market ready prototype will allow Corner Bag to acquire the funding needed to make it a reality.

 

 

*Marketing tour will consist of a National Corner Bag challenge of people putting the product to the test with the video results posted on Youtube.

 

Corner Bag is the first travel ready punching bag. It uses the inner or outer corner of walls for support. It is lightweight, sets-up or stows away in seconds, and it won’t disturb your neighbors.

If you are familiar with punching bags there are no products on the market that are user friendly in places like apartments, condominiums or small homes. The Corner Bag was specifically engineered to fill that void. Corner Bag makes it possible to exercise using a punching bag that can handle more than you can dish out without disturbing the person in the room next to you. Once you have finished exercising you can leave it up or stow it in less than a minute. We have created a full contact, truly portable and user friendly punching bag which will offer more versatility, quality and features but at the same price of its competition.

Are you:

  • A parent with a child engaged in self-defense classes?
  • Unable to use a punching bag because you have limited space?
  • A personal trainer that could use a travel punching bag with your clients?
  • A professional athlete that would like to train on the go?
Unable to use a punching bag because you live in a condo or apartment?


Then you'll be interested in what the Corner Bag can do!

 

Light weight & portable (35 – 40 lbs)

No attachments to structure

Reduces joint stress

No gloves or wraps needed

Quiet – won’t disturb the neighbors

 

Prototype #1

 

Prototype #2

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Corner Bag evolves the home use punching bag and the commercial gym punching bags into an exercise tool that makes use of the smallest of dwellings. It includes features that make a professional but lightweight portable tool making punching bags available to everyone. If your home, office or place of travel has an inner or outer corner there is a place for the Corner Bag.

 

Corner Bag future projects include:

  •  Speed bag attachment
  •  Multiple form configurations for specialty practices
  •  Corner Bag for kids
  • Interactive training applications
  • A few first to the market services and modifications that need to be kept under wraps

 

    Where are we now?

    In the last 12 months, we completed our second prototype. We have a semi-production-quality prototype with all the functions tested and verified. We are very excited about the results!

    What do we need the funds for?

    Bringing a streamline product to the market involves a huge initial investment. We have been financing the development ourselves until now, but we need support for:

    • Manufacturing Engineer design time
    • Computer simulated design testing
    • Market quality prototype

    Planning

    July - Aug       

    Integrate improvements into design
    Computer simulated test of new design
    Finalize design


    Sep - Oct     


    Contract prototype fabrication
    Test finished product
    Create product demo video


    November


    National Marketing tour

 

First and foremost, all help is appreciated. All support, small or big, is welcomed. 

If you can, help spread the word!
Make the combat sports enthusiasts that you know happy by telling them about the campaign. Show that you don't only think of them when you need protecting! :)

Give us feedback!
We are happy about any kind of feedback you may have. There's still time to get your ideas into the product.

Use the comments form on here or drop us an email at: indiegogo@cornerbag.com

 

 

What is a Corner Bag?

Answer: A Corner Bag is a truly portable punching bag.

 

Why would anybody want a Corner Bag?

Answer: For years the trend in exercise equipment has been towards providing a product that is portable and compact for home use, contact sport equipment included. The Corner Bag has a space saving design that allows it to use both the inner or outer corner within a room for support. This product also has the ability to be disassembled within seconds without the use of tools so that it can then be placed within its own duffle bag for easy transport in the trunk of any compact car or to be placed in any conventional closet for out of the way storage.

 

Will this product disturb others and damage my walls?

Answer: No the product will not disturb others because it is engineered to collapse in upon itself which cushions the users punch absorbing the energy within the Corner Bag and with minimal energy transfer reaching the wall. The energy transfer would best be described as the impact effect created if someone were to hit a wall with a semi firm sofa cushion. Due to the cushioning attribute of the Corner Bag it can be used rigorously without causing structural or aesthetic damage to one’s home, office or etc.

 

What if I have some questions / feedback for you?

Answer: Great! Feel free to drop us an email at Indiegogo@cornerbag.com

 

Any risks along the road?

Answer: Hardware projects need careful planning for getting the supply chain and manufacturing process right. In fact, that's almost as much work as developing the actual features of a device.

 

________________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________________

Team on This Campaign:

Team Lead: Timothy Shelton

 

Team Tech: Oscar Diaz

 

Inventor: Trahelgi

 

 

 

Magnetic Thank you

 

 

16 oz Mug

 

 

Beanie

 

________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________ 

 

 

Thank you for your Support!

*Marketing tour will consist of a National Corner Bag challenge of people putting the product to the test with the video results posted on Youtube. 
 

Corner Bag is the first travel ready punching bag. It uses the inner or outer corner of walls for support. It is lightweight, sets-up or stows away in seconds, and it won’t disturb your neighbors.
If you are familiar with punching bags there are no products on the market that are user friendly in places like apartments, condominiums or small homes. The Corner Bag was specifically engineered to fill that void. Corner Bag makes it possible to exercise using a punching bag that can handle more than you can dish out without disturbing the person in the room next to you. Once you have finished exercising you can leave it up or stow it in less than a minute. We have created a full contact, truly portable and user friendly punching bag which will offer more versatility, quality and features but at the same price of its competition.
Are you:


A parent with a child engaged in self-defense classes?
Unable to use a punching bag because you have limited space?
A personal trainer that could use a travel punching bag with your clients?
A professional athlete that would like to train on the go?
Unable to use a punching bag because you live in a condo or apartment?
Then you'll be interested in what the Corner Bag can do! 
 

Light weight & portable (35 – 40 lbs)
No attachments to structure
Reduces joint stress
No gloves or wraps needed
Quiet – won’t disturb the neighbors
 
Prototype #1

  
Prototype #2 


  

 

 

 

  
  

  

  
  

The Corner Bag evolves the home use punching bag and the commercial gym punching bags into an exercise tool that makes use of the smallest of dwellings. It includes features that make a professional but lightweight portable tool making punching bags available to everyone. If your home, office or place of travel has an inner or outer corner there is a place for the Corner Bag.

 

Corner Bag future projects include: 

 Speed bag attachment
 Multiple form configurations for specialty practices
 Corner Bag for kids
Interactive training applications
A few first to the market services and modifications that need to be kept under wraps
 


Where are we now?
In the last 12 months, we completed our second prototype. We have a semi-production-quality prototype with all the functions tested and verified. We are very excited about the results!
What do we need the funds for? Bringing a streamline product to the market involves a huge initial investment. We have been financing the development ourselves until now, but we need support for:

Manufacturing Engineer design time 
Computer simulated design testing
Market quality prototype

Planning




July - Aug       


Integrate improvements into designComputer simulated test of new designFinalize design




Sep - Oct 


Contract prototype fabrication Test finished productCreate product demo video 








November


National Marketing tour




 

First and foremost, all help is appreciated. All support, small or big, is welcomed. 
If you can, help spread the word!Make the combat sports enthusiasts that you know happy by telling them about the campaign. Show that you don't only think of them when you need protecting! :)
Give us feedback!We are happy about any kind of feedback you may have. There's still time to get your ideas into the product.Use the comments form on here or drop us an email at: indiegogo@cornerbag.com
 

 
What is a Corner Bag? 
Answer: A Corner Bag is a truly portable punching bag.
 
Why would anybody want a Corner Bag?
Answer: For years the trend in exercise equipment has been towards providing a product that is portable and compact for home use, contact sport equipment included. The Corner Bag has a space saving design that allows it to use both the inner or outer corner within a room for support. This product also has the ability to be disassembled within seconds without the use of tools so that it can then be placed within its own duffle bag for easy transport in the trunk of any compact car or to be placed in any conventional closet for out of the way storage.
 
Will this product disturb others and damage my walls?
Answer: No the product will not disturb others because it is engineered to collapse in upon itself which cushions the users punch absorbing the energy within the Corner Bag and with minimal energy transfer reaching the wall. The energy transfer would best be described as the impact effect created if someone were to hit a wall with a semi firm sofa cushion. Due to the cushioning attribute of the Corner Bag it can be used rigorously without causing structural or aesthetic damage to one’s home, office or etc. 
 
What if I have some questions / feedback for you?
Answer: Great! Feel free to drop us an email at Indiegogo@cornerbag.com
 
Any risks along the road?
Answer: Hardware projects need careful planning for getting the supply chain and manufacturing process right. In fact, that's almost as much work as developing the actual features of a device. 
 
________________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________________
Team on This Campaign:

Team Lead: Timothy Shelton
 

Team Tech: Oscar Diaz
 

Inventor: Trahelgi
 
 

 
Magnetic Thank you

 
 
16 oz Mug

 
 
Beanie

 
________________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________________ 
 
 
Thank you for your Support!

story:
is an epic clothing brand ready to explode and definitely not for the faint hearted!

JIZZ will get you noticed!

JIZZ may even get you in trouble...

By pledging your support you get a generous range of insane lifetime perks and on top of that, you can also be regularly involved in the future development of this soon to be, customer driven global brand.

Our intro video (above) is where we see our impact, our power, our direction.

Do you fit the JIZZ lifestyle?




I have always been frustrated in bland and look - all - the - same clothing lines. It seemed as though all the designers had gone out to lunch one day and all agreed to make the same old clothing that looked the same if it was worn by a 19 or a 90 year old.

Many years ago when I started this concept, I wanted a clothing line that was epic, clever in its concept, easily recognisable, and borderline or something that would push the boundaries but not be overtly offensive and most importantly a youth brand!

After going through what seemed like a forest of sketch paper and a mountain of setbacks, I had to thank Mother Nature for the design inspiration as she did it first and JIZZ was born!

Since then there has been battle after battle, setbacks and frustrations, but I kept true to the cause and never gave up on bringing the JIZZ brand to life. Please check out my campaign video above.




You name it, JIZZ got it. Starting with the initial product line up and soon to have a full range of on line clothing and accessories.

Our reach will be global, our focus local.

Unlike other companies we will not hide behind community forums and faq's, we will always be approachable and available. Even via direct, regular contact with Banga via the founder's portal.

Tell us what you (our most important person) think. You can even submit your design ideas and if we include your designs in our product line, you will receive regular royalty payments for as long as your design is sold by us.

In addition to large production runs we can also CUSTOM DESIGN your JIZZ wear!

Unique designs and a capacity to do very small runs allow us to create genuine limited editions.

Give us your design or direction you are after or leave it to us to design you something unique!








We appreciate your pledge and we want to grow with you. In recognition of this we have made our perks generous and lifelong.

From our lowest to our highest perks, all have some form of lifelong benefit to you ranging all the way up to 50% off for life!

PLUS, if we reach our funding goal those lifelong discount perks are turbo charged.

Because we are doing things differently and offering lifelong Perks, let's spend some time explaining the benefits of the Perks offered.

$45 AUD -- Up to 5% off for life + Goodies!

You get one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on them)

PLUS: a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: 2.5% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal, turbo charge that discount to 5% off all JIZZ Wear for life! Postage included for perks. (Purchase limits apply please see below)


$65 AUD -- Up to 7.5% off for life ++ Goodies!

One JIZZ T-Shirt
PLUS: one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on them)
PLUS: a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: 5% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal turbo charge that discount to 7.5% off all JIZZ Wear for life! (Purchase limits apply please see below) Postage included for perks.


$85 AUD -- Up to 10% off for life +++ Goodies

X 2 JIZZ T-shirts

PLUS: one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on them)

PLUS: a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: 7.5% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal turbo charge that discount to 10% off all JIZZ Wear for life! (Purchase limits apply please see below) Postage included for perks.


$105 AUD -- Up to 12.5% off for life... NOW we’re talking!

X 2 JIZZ T-shirts

PLUS: one pair of standard JIZZ underwear

PLUS: one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on them)

PLUS: a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: 10% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal turbo charge that discount to 12.5% off all JIZZ Wear for life! (Purchase limits apply please see below) Postage included for perks.


$155 AUD -- Up to an amazing 15% off for life + Fantastic Perks!

X 2 JIZZ T-shirts

PLUS one pair of standard JIZZ underwear

PLUS: One JIZZ cap

PLUS: one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on)

Plus a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: You also gain access to our exclusive “Founder’s Portal” – where you go one-on-one with Banga via webinar and Skype. Giveaways and prizes are offered at our webinars for best/most creative JIZZ ideas!

PLUS: 12.5% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal turbo charge that discount to 15% off all JIZZ Wear for life! (Purchase limits apply please see below) Postage included for perks.


$240 AUD -- Up to a staggering 17.5% OFF for life!!!

X 2 JIZZ T-shirts

PLUS: One pair of standard JIZZ underwear

PLUS: a pair of JIZZ sunnies

PLUS: a JIZZ cap

PLUS: one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on)

PLUS: a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: You also gain access to our exclusive “Founder’s Portal” – where you go one-on-one with Banga via webinar and Skype. Giveaways and prizes are offered at our webinars for best/most creative JIZZ ideas!

PLUS: 15% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal turbo charge that discount to 17.5% off all JIZZ Wear for life! (Purchase limits apply please see below) Postage included for perks.


$6,800 AUD – The ULTIMATE “Oahu” Package!

You get it all…! Stay three (3) nights at a four-star Hawaiian resort on the island of Oahu for two people. We will fly you and a friend to Oahu, Hawaii, and put you up in a four-star resort. Room, all meals, activities, and round-trip airfare is included.

You will be invited to party, err I mean, “help in our market research” for the JIZZ Wear range. You will be featured in our marketing documentary, and your images will be used in our global viral-video marketing campaign!

Party with the models, and get up to some radical sh*t of EPIC proportions!

While you’re in Oahu, try hang gliding, para-sailing, rock climbing, skin diving, dirt bike riding, quad bikes, surfing, 4WD, etc.

Even if you never done some of these activities before, you’ll have the JIZZ to keep you going through 3 nights of partying with our hot models!

You also get:

X 7 JIZZ T-shirts

X 7 pairs of standard JIZZ underwear

X 2 JIZZ sunnies

X 3 JIZZ cap

PLUS: one epic personalised pair of JIZZ Underwear (with your name or initials sewn on) PLUS: one more pair for a friend

PLUS: a JIZZ key ring

PLUS: You also gain access to our exclusive “Founder’s Portal” – where you go one-on-one with Banga via webinar and Skype. Giveaways and prizes are offered at our webinars for best/most creative JIZZ ideas!

PLUS: 25% off all JIZZ Wear for life. If we meet our funding goal turbo charge that discount to 50% off all JIZZ Wear for life! (Purchase limits apply please see below) Postage included for perks.

Look forward to late 2015 or early 2016 for this Top Package as the delivery date. Have your passports ready!



*Purchase limits apply, as follows…

In any 12-month calendar period, you can purchase up to $1,500 worth of JIZZ retail products and apply your discounts.

Product purchases and discounts are applied to the email address that you nominate.

Your discounts are forever, meaning that every year you can purchase up to $1,500 worth of retail of JIZZ products and apply your specially-discounted
rates.




The Founders Portal is where you go one on one with Banga, the founder of the founder of JIZZ wear, via webinar and Skype. Giveaways and prizes are offered at our webinars for best/most creative JIZZ ideas!

Unlike other clothing brands, we want to hear from you on a regular basis. Scope ideas and designs, give us feedback and most of all, stay in touch!


Q. How will I organise my perks and personalised underwear?

At the end of the capital raising period we will contact you and you scan/email us your signature or initials that you want sewn onto your one pair of personalised JIZZ underwear. You also select the size/s, male or female, colours and design of your other JIZZ products at this time.


Q. When will my Perks be delivered?

 As you may appreciate, individual, custom design products will take some time to organise. Product delivery is anticipated in late October or early November 2014. We will always try and get you your perks on an ASAP basis.

T-shirts and/or underwear and other JIZZ products can be either male or female or a combination of both.

Postage/delivery is included for all perks. Delivery address will of course be required.

The Ultimate Oahu, Hawaii package will be in delivered approximately late 2015 or early 2016.

Passports required for non-USA residents. Perk includes economy return flight for two from the Americas, the European Union, or Asia/Pacific region. Also included will be accommodation at a four star resort in Oahu, plus all activities and meals. We will be combining new product launch with a mini doco we will be making. You are invited to join in and be part of the fun...

BTW, after you have pledged if you share our campaign with your friends we will give you $5.00 refund for every referral. See below for further
details.




When you support JIZZ you'll be helping all kinds of animal charities. At the end of each calendar year we will donate a portion of profits to four (4) animal charities.

We will change to another four animal charities at the end of each and every year to try and help out as many good causes as we can.

In keeping with our local philosophy, we will try and donate to some localised, volunteer run animal charities/rescue organisations and some larger global organisations.

As an example, at the end of our first year of trading I would love to donate to the following four unbelievably great causes:

www.Hopeforpaws.org
Dog rescues watch and try not to cry

www.seashepherd.org
Do we need to say anything else

www.twinniespelicanandseabirdrescue.com
Unbelievable what these guys do

www.animalsasia.org
In total awe to what these guys have achieved

I am really excited about this! I can hardly wait for that moment in time (with your help by the end of 2015?) when we proudly announce our donations to the above worthy causes via blog, web site, twitter, press release etc.




Our goal is AUD 65K. What does 65K do? It will fulfil a lifelong ambition, it will allow us to complete our range and order products in greater numbers thus reducing costs and production timelines.

It will allow us to create a marketing campaign that can, at the moment, only be dreamed off. It will allow us to reach a critical mass in the shortest possible time and therefore also allow us to reach our goals of donations to worthy causes.

I am acutely aware and grateful for your pledges and all funds will be dispersed in a timely and responsible manner.

Don't forget, if we meet our funding goal all of your forever discounts are turbo charged to the next level.


Q. What happens if we can only get to say AUD 30K?

Good question. Whatever amount we eventually end up raising we can fulfil our perks and obligations. I have assembled a range of manufacturers both large and small and whether it's a production run of 50 or 5000 pieces or more we can do it.

Not meeting our funding goal makes the process slower (The process of being a global brand) and limits our immediate product range but don't worry, T shirts, Caps, Sunnies, Underwear and personalised Underwear as per the perks can and will be fulfilled as these are our minimum product range.

Roughly speaking 65K would be divided into the following, 50K design and manufacture, 15K marketing.





YOU! After many years, most of the hard work has been done. But we now need your support to take us from a brand that only does a few pair at a time to a brand that is global and has a full product range.

If you want to be part of the growth of JIZZ we invite you to pledge, join and enjoy a lifetime of discounts and participate in the fruits of founders portal and have real input into your brand.

If you want to just pledge and enjoy a lifetime of discounts that's great
too!

We can do this alone...
but it's more fun with you!


How can I contribute to the campaign?

As we are raising money in Aussie Dollars we can only accept Pay Pal via Indiegogo as per Indiegogo's rules. Anyone can contribute, you just need to have a PayPal account to pay the perk. If you do not have a PayPal account but have a credit card, you can use the "Pay as guest" feature in PayPal. 

For instructions on how to pay as a Guest on PayPal, please visit: 

https://www.paypal.com 


$10 REFUND FOR EVERY REFERRAL!

Share our campaign with your friends. If that person pledges to our campaign through you, we will refund you $10.00

As an example

Pledge any of the JIZZ perks and then refer as many people as you want by sharing your pledge and your unique URL.

For each person that pledges through your share URL, we will credit you $10.00 Refer as many times and as many people as you like.

At the end of our campaign we will refund you based on the number of your referrals.

PLEASE Note: You have to share using your personal URL link otherwise we won't know who you have referred or if they have pledged.


Help JIZZ Explode! Spread the word...


Other Ways You Can Help

Write a personal email to your friends, especially anyone who loves fashion or is tired of their current wardrobe.

Have a YouTube or Video Channel? Give our video a shout out or post it

Write a blog article

Post us on social media!

Sign up for our Newsletter

Roughly  speaking 65K would be divided into the following, 50K design and manufacture, 15K marketing. 


YOU! After  many years, most of the hard work has been done. But we now need your support  to take us from a brand that only does a few pair at a time to a brand that is  global and has a full product range.
If you  want to be part of the growth of JIZZ we invite you to pledge, join and enjoy a  lifetime of discounts and participate in the fruits of founders portal and have  real input into your brand.
If you  want to just pledge and enjoy a lifetime of discounts that's great too!

We can do this  alone...
    but it's more fun  with you!

How can I contribute to the campaign?
As we are raising money in Aussie  Dollars we can only accept Pay Pal via Indiegogo as per Indiegogo's rules.  Anyone can contribute, you just need to have a PayPal account to pay the perk.  If you do not have a PayPal account but have a credit card, you can use the "Pay as guest" feature in PayPal. For instructions on how to pay as a Guest on PayPal, please visit: https://www.paypal.com 
$10 REFUND FOR EVERY REFERRAL!
Share our campaign with your friends. If that  person pledges to our campaign through you, we will refund you $10.00
As an example
Pledge  any of the JIZZ perks and then refer as many people as you want by sharing your  pledge and your unique URL.
For each person that pledges through your share URL, we will credit you $10.00 Refer as many times and as many people as you like.
At the end of our campaign we will refund you based on the number of your referrals.
PLEASE Note: You have to share using your personal URL link otherwise we won't know who you have referred or if they have pledged.
Help JIZZ Explode! Spread the word...
Other Ways You Can Help

 Write a personal email to your friends, especially anyone who loves fashion or is tired of their current wardrobe.
 Have a YouTube or Video Channel? Give our video a shout out or post it
 Write a blog article 
 Post us on social media!
 Sign up for our Newsletter

story: Simply put I'd like to open a Boutique with my 15yr old daughter who's my 2nd of 6. She's extremely talented and creative. Very much into fashion and design and has a portfolio out of this world. Published at age 11 for her beautiful poem, she's always had a knack for creativity and expanding her mind outside of the box in which she was never born to fit into. As a model style & fashion has always been apart of my life and I have always had the need to give my edge to others and make them look and feel as good as I do. I see the talent in my daughter and she has a dream of bringing her magnificent designs and ideas to life and I naturally want to fulfill that desire and nurture it to life in every way possible and we will do it together.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Connally and I am a small-scale ethical fashion designer. What this means is that every piece I make is made of sustainable materials that are produced in farms and mills in the UK. Each of those fabric resources follow strict social and ecolocigal responsibility standards. After training at Central Saint Martins, I am currently based in London.
As a child, I travelled with my missionary parents across different countries, and was struck by the negative impact that the disposable clothing industry has on the globe. It also made me appreciate how much work that goes into making a well-constructed garment and its value: traditional tailoring and sewing techniques that last a lifetime.
I have been designing made-to-measure couture and ready to wear garments and showed my first full collection at Vancouver International Fashion Week. NICHE magazine sponsored my registration and gave me a platform to show my work to an international audience. I made everything myself by hand, and it was a very successful debut. I use rich textures and architectural silhouettes and design with confident, international women of all shapes and sizes in mind.
 I now have the opportunity to show my work at PLITZS New York Fashion Week in Beijing this June and create a new collection to show my Spring/Summer 2015 collection at the next Vancouver International Fashion Week. I also am eligible to apply for London Fashion Week with my Fall/Winter 2015 collection following those first two fashion shows. The exposure and  business connections will be a fantastic way to bring ethical fashion to centre stage.

What We Need & What You Get

Together, I need to raise $9700 (£4600) to be able to accept these opportunities to show my collections. The breakdown of costs is:

*$1200-flights to Beijing

*$4800-registration for PLITZS fashion show in Beijing (this includes hotel, models, shoes, hair, makeup, lighting, sound, photography, videography and backstage equipment)

*$1000-flights to Vancouver

*$1800-registration for Vancouver Fashion Week (this includes models, shoes, hair, makeup, lighting, sound, backstage equipment)

*$400- accommodation, public transportation and basic food costs in Vancouver 

*$300-purchase of a second hand overlocking (serging) machine to produce the stretch and swimwear portions of the Spring/Summer collection. (New ones cost between $800-$3000 from a poor quality plastic model to an industrial metal machine).

This leaves me with just $200 to buy materials to make the Spring/Summer collection, which will still be made entirely by myself from the patterns to the construction of the pieces.

As a thank you for supporting this campaign, you and/or your company will be promoted over my social media outlets (Facebook, twitter, instagram, etc) and you can also choose from a variety of thank you perks listed to the side. There are options for every donation level, from thank you notes, tickets to my shows, laptop cases to custom couture.

The Impact

Every dollar makes a huge impact not only on the success of these shows, but also makes a strong statement that we are ready to step up and expect ethical fashion on a global stage. Your contributions go to support the families and farmers that produce the cloth, the time and effort that go into cutting and sewing each piece and allow small businesses to continue growing and operating at high sustainable and social standards. It also speaks volumes about the human cost of cheap clothing and the importance of quality over quantity.

  • My previous fundraising campaigns and events over the past three years have collectively raised $23,000 and global media attention. 
  • We are all connected--your actions speak louder than words. If we wouldn't want to see our brothers, sisters or children working in a sweatshop, it's important to put our money where our hearts are. Every human wears clothing and your donation makes a positive global impact.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Please share this campaign with your friends, family and colleagues. A single dollar makes a huge difference, and you never know who may be open to giving their spare change!

Spread the word on your social media outlets--there are buttons on this page to share via Facebook, twitter, LinkedIn and other avenues. 

And that’s all there is to it! We can achieve so much together !

story:
I believe that if you want to do something GOOD in the world, for people and the environment, that fashion is the right path for doing so. 


This is why:

  • Seventy-five million people are working in this industry worldwide.
  • Everybody needs clothes to wear, whether for functional or decorational reasons.
  • Thirty percent of the clothes produced is a waste of resources.
  • The textiles industry is the second biggest water consumer worldwide.
  • Five percent of the total landfill consists out of textiles.
  • Millions of clothing manufacturers are working in inhumane conditions.
  • Millions of consumers are getting insecure about their bodies because clothes do not make them feel confident and protected.

... but most importantly because...

  • There is a way to shift fashion from a harming to a contributing industry. I promise.
Here's is presentation I gave at Tedx that explains exactly what good fashion is and how it can be achieved.


Why a video-course?

Because it gives you an easy access to the finding of my research and the tools of the design system, no matter where you are situated. 

  • No need for traveling 
  • No need for planning in a meeting or a seminar
  • No need for working closely with me for months 

The design system will help your brand to:

  • Build a community of customers
  • Test the designs twice to ensure success
  • Prevent waste of resources during the production
  • Prevent waste of financial investments
  • Make more profit
  • Create something GOOD in the world!


I will keep the research and developments going on my part, but to REALLY make a difference we need to work together to develop the system further based on practice.


The more people join the movement, the more we can achieve.


You can help to develop this project by contributing financially and joining the movement.

The money is needed for the development and the filming of the video-course, which in turn will make the findings available to a much larger group of fashion creators.


This Is What I Can Offer You

For Free: Join The Movement!

  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion. You gain access to the video's when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.


For €10,00!

  • The video-course with 10 video's will offer you two and half hours of material to kickstart good fashion with your brand. I will offer you a planning, information from my research, information from actually applying the system in practice and much more. The video will be very practical, so you can start implementing the tools right away. The price is low intentionally so that everybody can receive a good base knowledge about the design system and the business model.
  • The E-Book of Paradigm Shift In Fashion with tips and tools after a research of four years. 
  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.

For €35,00

  • The signed paperback of Paradigm Shift in Fashion.
  • The E-Book of Paradigm Shift In Fashion with tips and tools after a research of four years.
  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.
  • The shipping costs are included.


For €100,00

  • One hour consultancy session with me. I will give you personalized tips for your brand and answer all your questions regarding the design system.
  • The video-course offering you two and half hours of material to kickstart good fashion with your brand. I will offer you a planning, information from my research, information from actually applying the system in practice and much more. The video will be very practical, so you can start implementing the tools right away.
  • The E-Book of Paradigm Shift In Fashion with tips and tools after a research of four years. 
  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.

For €150,00

  • Five webinars until the end of 2015 updating you about the further developments based on the ongoing research. The video-course offers a good base and the webinars will help to develop to a next step because I will be sharing my new findings with you and answering your questions live.
  • The video-course with 10 video's will offer you two and half hours of material to kickstart good fashion with your brand. I will offer you a planning, information from my research, information from actually applying the system in practice and much more. The video will be very practical, so you can start implementing the tools right away.
  • The E-Book of Paradigm Shift In Fashion with tips and tools after a research of four years. 
  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.


For €500,00

  • Webinars and interview-video's for 12 months updating you about the further developments based on the ongoing research. The video-course offers a good base. The webinars and the interview-video's will help to develop to a next step because I will be sharing new findings and case studies with you.
  • The video-course that will offer you two and half hours of material to kickstart good fashion with your brand. I will offer you a planning, information from my research, information from actually applying the system in practice and much more. The video will be very practical, so you can start implementing the tools right away.
  • The E-Book of Paradigm Shift In Fashion with tips and tools after a research of four years. 
  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.


For €1000,00

  • A full day course at your headquarter where I will share all my findings up until the point when I give the course to your brand. It will be interesting for your design and marketing team because I will explain how they can work together:
    -     to prevent unnecessary expenses for the design, the production and the communication.
    -     to integrate sustainability into design and communication.
    -     to offer maximum value to the customers.
    -     to get inspiration for the collection directly from the customer's lives.
    -     to communicate about the sustainable practices of the brand to the customers.
  • Webinars and interview-video's for 12 months updating you about the further developments based on the ongoing research. The video-course offers a good base. The webinars and the interview-video's will help to develop to a next step because I will be sharing new findings and case studies with you.
  • The E-Book of Paradigm Shift In Fashion with tips and tools after a research of four years. 
  • A community of like minded people for support on Facebook and LinkedIn.
  • One Q&A video per week about how to achieve good fashion when you become a member of the group on Facebook or on LinkedIn.


The Impact

Clothes play a huge part in our lives. Through this industry so much can improve in the lives of people who buy clothes and also in the lives of people who make them.

Fashion brands play a crucial part in the fashion chain because they are the ones who create. The decisions they make in the creation stage influence hundreds, thousands and sometimes even millions of lives.

What needs to change in order to achieve good fashion is THE MINDSET. It is about shifting the focus from PROFIT to VALUE creation. Once this happens, more profit will be made, while more people will experience true joy in fashion and more people will be able to build their life towards abundance.

Let's move towards a good fashion industry together.

story:
How far will Obama's support for the Iraqi Kurds go?

With ISIS threatening Iraq's north, both the Kurds and the Yezidis are desperate for help—and it's not coming from Baghdad

Kurds need military assistance to fight ISIS as well as humanitarian aid to help the Kurds deal with the more than one million Iraqis displaced by the fighting who are taking shelter in their territory. For its part the U.S. is sending in 130 new military advisors to help bolster Kurdish efforts to save the Yezidis and push back the militants. The UK has been providing humanitarian support in the form of airdrops and along with France promising arms support. 
The political struggle in Baghdad has hampered the already-weak Iraqi army’s ability to fight the radical Sunni militants who now control swathes of the country. The national forces have already failed against ISIS in the field. Thousands of Iraqi soldiers fled their posts in June as the militants approached, shedding their uniforms and dropping their weapons—weapons that ISIS is now turning against them and the peshmerga.

Secure Our Investment, Help Us Fight Back! 

Why Iraq's Kurds Are Demanding Independence.

Iraqi Kurdistan is made up of three provinces in Iraq's north that have practically been governed autonomously since 1992. The Iraqi Kurds suffered particularly under Saddam Hussein and fought alongside U.S. troops in 2003 to topple his regime in Baghdad.

A regional Kurdish parliament was formed in 2005, and now the federated region's institutions have legislative and executive power in certain areas such as the regional budget, security and education. However, many rights promised to the Kurds in Iraq's constitution were ignored by Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki's government, which has been accused of being sectarian and dominated by the interests of Maliki's fellow Shiite Muslims.

10% Of All Contributions Will Be Used To Support Kurdish Refugees Crisis.

story:
We have designed a unique t-shirt for each of the 50 United States using the State name and State outline/shape.  By selling these shirts we want to provide for as many people who are in need of clothing as we can. 

For every shirt you purchase we give one to someone in need in your state.

At the end of the campaign we are going to double the number of shirts we give to those in need in the State with the most shirt sales.  So rather than a buy one give one they will get a buy one give two.

The number of people in need of clothing (especially during cold winter months) in the United States is a lot greater than many suppose.  There are many homeless individuals on the streets and families who have fallen on hard times or lost everything from fires, floods and other disasters.  School districts and teachers are consistently listing clothing items as one of the top items in great need for their students. 
From keeping someone living on the street warm to allowing someone who just lost everything they owned to not have to worry about a need as basic as not having clothes to wear your help today will make a difference in another’s life.

Purchasing

Besides getting an awesomely designed t-shirt that is comfortable to wear by purchasing any of our perks you will be directly helping make a difference in the lives of those in need of clothing.  If you find yourself financially able to support this cause and receive an awesome shirt in return please, please, grab some of our offerings.

Sharing

Regardless of your decision to purchase one of our offerings please share this campaign with everyone you can. We are trying to touch every State in America and bless the lives of those currently in need.

We will keep you updated on the States we still need to reach.  Please use your influence in email and on twitter, facebook, pinterest and any other social media platforms that you are a part of to spread the message.

Our background is in screen printing, embroidery and direct to garment printing.  We love to create unique designs but have always wanted to make a bigger impact for good in the world which is why we are starting Clothe America.

Put simply our purpose is to clothe those who stand in need of clothing.

Thank You for your help!

those in need in the State with the most shirt sales.  So rather than a buy one give one they will
get a buy one give two. 
The number of people in need of clothing (especially during
cold winter months) in the United States is a lot greater than many suppose.  There are many homeless individuals on the
streets and families who have fallen on hard times or lost everything from
fires, floods and other disasters. 
School districts and teachers are consistently listing clothing items as
one of the top items in great need for their students.  

From keeping someone living on the street warm
to allowing someone who just lost everything they owned to not have to worry about
a need as basic as not having clothes to wear your help today will make a
difference in another’s life.


















Purchasing

Besides getting an awesomely designed t-shirt that is comfortable
to wear by purchasing any of our perks you will be directly helping make a
difference in the lives of those in need of clothing.  If you find yourself financially able to
support this cause and receive an awesome shirt in return please, please, grab
some of our offerings. 
Sharing
Regardless of your decision to purchase one of our offerings
please share this campaign with everyone you can. We are trying to touch every State in America
and bless the lives of those currently in need.
We will keep you updated on the States we still need to
reach.  Please use your influence in email
and on twitter, facebook, pinterest and any other social media platforms that
you are a part of to spread the message.


Our background is in screen printing, embroidery and direct to garment printing.  We love to create unique designs but have always wanted to make a bigger impact for good in the world which is why we are starting Clothe America.
Put simply our purpose is to clothe those who stand in need of clothing.
Thank You for your help!

story:
Preorder Now at Wiivv.com

 

 

This isn’t just an innovation in footwear. It’s a revolution in an industry plagued by mass-produced products, rigid offshore supply chains, and the inability to capitalize on the full potential of 3D printing. Instead, we are talking about one-off custom products at scale and manufactured locally. 

Unlike the big guys, stuck on aesthetics and expensive 3D prototypes, Wiivv is making every shoe custom fit to you from our factory in San Diego, California. It’s the biggest leap in footwear since foam!

 

 

Access our award-winning foot capture app on your iOS or Android smartphone to digitally map your feet for your Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals. 

Wiivvs are designed for your specific feet, giving you unparalleled comfort and improved biomechanics that no other sandal can provide. Of course, you can personalize them as well.

  

 

 

 

  

 

Of the 7 billion people on this planet, person to person, from left to right, your feet are unique. We believe your footwear should be too!

Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals are biomechanically designed to fit your unique feet—relieving joint discomfort, foot fatigue and even plantar fasciitis—so you can live and move comfortably.

 

  

    

 

 

 

  

Choose from four strap colors and multiple arch colors. Straps are interchangeable so you can switch them up!

 

 

 

   

 

Traditional flat flip flops are really bad for us. That’s no secret. So we said, f*ck that. Let’s design a sandal that not only looks good, it actually supports your body’s biomechanics throughout the day.

Traditional Flip Flops

  • Lack of arch support can cause issues in your feet, ankles, knees, hips and lower back.  
  • Toe thongs can hurt like hell and cause blisters. 
  • Poorly-fitting straps mean sliding feet, “toe scrunch” and soreness. 
  • Lack of cushioning means more impact on your body.

Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals

  • Custom fit 3D printed arches support your feet and lower body.  
  • Triple-density foam footbeds give all-day comfort. 
  • Deep, compressible heel cups absorb shock as you walk.
  • No-rub toe thongs with custom placement based on your foot width-- bye, bye blisters!
  • Custom-fit straps hold and support your feet with every step.

 

 

 

Customize and order your own Custom Fit Sandals with our proprietary foot-capture technology.

  

    

We digitally map over 200 data points on each foot. This data allows us to pinpoint your unique foot length, width and arch shape.

 

In less than 5 seconds this 2D data is accurately converted into 3D models of your unique arch supports, which are 3D printed at our facility in San Diego. Our adaptive manufacturing process allows us to use your foot measurement data to customize your unique toe thong and strap placements (both US patent pending) so you can experience true custom comfort.

Every pair of Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals is quality-checked and verified by biomechanical experts before being beautifully packaged and shipped right to your front door.

 

Switching Out Your Straps

It’s easy to switch out your straps to suit your style. They are also machine-washable.

 

   

  

Wiivv is driven by innovation and the feedback of our customers. Our products are the result of scientific research, multiple design iterations, data gathering and rigorous product testing. We work with leaders and experts to ensure our products are changing the footwear industry.

 

We leveraged our experience developing the groundbreaking Wiivv Custom Fit 3D Printed Insoles—including our proprietary customization technologies, biomechanics expertise, tens of thousands of foot scans, and relentless commitment to design perfection—to create a sandal that supports your biomechanics.

Wiivv’s Science Advisory Board is made up of the following independent experts who have validated our cutting-edge process and methodology.

 

 

 

We durability-tested Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals at the Lululemon White Space Innovation Lab and the Fortius Sport and Health Center in Vancouver, Canada. The sandals were tested at temperatures as high as 50 degrees Celsius and as low as -10 degrees Celsius to ensure they can meet your needs.

After two years of throwing everything you can at them, your Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals will still be the most comfortable sandals you have ever worn.

 
 

 

 

 

Wiivv footbeds are 100% closed-loop recyclable. Return your sandals to us at the end of their lives. The material will be used to make new sandals, eliminating waste and reducing emissions. Wiivvs are 3D printed and locally assembled at our facility in San Diego and sold directly to customers, reducing the environmental impact of shipping.

 

Rewards

 

  

Wiivv Wants To Create New Manufacturing Jobs In Your Country

Wiivv will open a 3D manufacturing facility in any eligible country that pledges 25,000 pairs of Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals. (Eligible countries are Australia, Canada, UK, Ireland and New Zealand) Since we already have a factory in the United States, we will need 50,000 pairs of Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals pledged from American backers in order to open a second manufacturing facility on home soil.

Sounds crazy, right? It actually fits perfectly with our commitment to local manufacturing, fast turnarounds and keeping shipping costs low. Help accelerate our vision of locally-made Wiivvs by backing us today!

 

   

In order to make and ship the groundbreaking Wiivv Custom Fit Sandals, we need to produce the tooling to make them in a full range of foot sizes. We have already sourced the materials and defined the manufacturing process. This is the next step in our journey to make affordable, custom fit footwear a reality, made right here in the USA. We need your help—we can’t do it without you.

Wiivv got our start by crowdfunding last year——launching Wiivv Custom Fit 3D Printed Insoles with people like you who shared the vision.

You helped us break the record for the most crowdfunded 3D-printed product EVER.

 

We've proven that we can deliver on schedule. Our first Indiegogo campaign ended in March 2016 and we shipped all our orders by the end of August 2016. Since then we’ve fulfilled orders for over 10K pairs of Wiivv Custom Fit Insoles to six different countries and are now averaging a scan-to-door turnaround time of seven days. Our customer response has been AMAZING.

The Wiivv Custom Fit Sandal has gone through a year of R&D with over 50 product iterations during the process. It’s been rigorously tested. And to cover every base, we offer a 30 Day Happiness Guarantee or your money back.

 

 

 

Fulfillment will begin December 2017. Shipping rates are as follows:

 

   

 

 

The Wiivv team based out of Vancouver (Canada) and San Diego (USA), are a tribe of biomechanical engineers, product and visual designers, software engineers, developers, marketers and more. We share a love for creating truly innovative products that improve people’s lives. Our team brings expertise and knowledge from having worked at these leading companies.

 

 

   

Our goal is to make perfectly and uniquely customized human products—and by that we mean products that fit you. Match you. Make you more comfortable, healthier and happier. Because if something’s not made just for you, it’s made for no one at all.
 
Wiivv wants to give you the tools to be your exceptional self. We want to help you squeeze a bit more awesome out of every step. Because we know that when our feet are comfortable, supported and grounded we can all do and be more.
 
Join us as a backer and you will be making affordable, accessible custom footwear a reality. This is the biggest and boldest undertaking in our young company's history and we need your help now more than ever.
 
THANK YOU INDIEGOGO FOR YOUR CONTINUED SUPPORT!
 
Team Wiivv 
 
#KeepGoing

story:
Hi, I'm Mia Morgan creator of The Fashion Alchemist.  I've been successful as a fashion stylist for over 15 years and have worked on hundreds of fashion shoots and styled a countless number of A-list celebrities. I can't name them all here but you can view my work at miamorgan.com

The Fashion Alchemist is my first project designing and launching a collection of my own.  As a fashion insider I've been exposed to many of the best creations in the world and I appreciate timeless pieces with a personal signature.  With the Fashion Alchemist I will be working with indigenious cultures to bring their traditional crafts to the fashion world.  I'm starting by traveling to Peru this winter to develop my first line with the artisans from this region. This tribe creates patterns based on the the ancient healing songs of the Shaman.  I've personally received the most incredible healing of my life from them - as did all of us who were there - beyond anything we could have ever imagined.  People received deep and lasting healing on the physical, emotional and spiritual level. This is exactly what the world needs right now and exactly what I am excited to share.   Prior to now I've never been able to take time off away my busy styling schedule but I believe that the time is now for me to finally take a leap. With your support we can bring these fashions into the world and your contribution will make this a reality.

With $10,000 I will travel to Peru this winter and begin the development of the sample collection.  I will bring these back to New York this Spring.  $10,000 will allow me to get it started but with $50,000 I can really get things off the ground.  I'll be able to hire a small team to help me develop the collection further, ensure retail placement and create a fully functioning online boutique.

All of these creations are hand-made and will have an energetic pattern attached to it.  You can think of this as a way to bring what you want into your life like healing, protection, love and prosperity.  Depending on your contribution, I will bring back a special item just for you.  Some of these items will include, scarves, coasters, pillow covers and accessories.  I've already booked my trip so your funding will go directly to the development of the line.  If I don't reach my entire goal I will still be able to get started on the development and bring back items for you as I am already on my way to Peru.

In addition to providing an essential livelihood for women in their villages (through supporting their embroidery work), 33% of the proceeds will go towards supporting the Alianza Arkana, a grassroots alliance which supports the people of the Amazon and it's traditions and 33% will go to the craftmakers themselves.  Supporting the Amazon is essential to having a cleaner and healthier environment for the entire planet.  We don't have a lot of time to waste.

Even if you can't contribute financially, please help to spread the word by posting on your facebook page or twitter.  You can use the indigogo share tools to help me spread the word.  Every little bit counts to help bring The Fashion Alchemist to life.  Thank you for your time.

xo, Mia

story:
So after five years of busting my butt I'm finally winning awards, attending fashion weeks in other cities, gaining private clients....On top of that I've had other offers leading to more opportunities. The problem is that I don't have enough for expenses. I am a mother of four and this is pretty much my only source of income, aside for small odd jobs. I am pretty resourceful and don't like asking for handouts,but I am looking for investors for my small business! Investing in my company will mean many things:

1) You will be supporting a REAL American business! I don't outsource and manufacturing all of my clothing in the USA!

2) Funding means not just my efforts but to help create jobs too, I need help and hire locally.

3) I am the only independently owned business that designs and makes transgender clothing, women and menswear!

4) Money raised will go to five opportunity fashion shows in which buyers will actually be present at.

5) You will get really good karma for it!
