story:
Meet Baggizmo Wiseward. A wallet that is specially designed to improve the security of credit cards and protect personal documents using integrated technology.

The world’s smartest and most technologically advanced bi-fold wallet, acting as an individual’s best defense against today’s advanced hackers, pickpockets and our own forgetful minds - with 10 smart functions.

Wiseward can receive up to 15 credit cards and still remain slim, pocket-sized and easy to use.

Following its first successful crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter in 2015, Baggizmo produced and delivered the first series of design bags enabling a more practical and functional way of carrying electronic devices. It was this bag that gave impetus for the development of a new product, Baggizmo Wiseward, which is using integrated technology to improve the protection of personal property when carried around by its owner.

Baggizmo Wiseward is intended for urban people – primarily those who adopt new technologies, but also those who want a more secure and more functional wallet that protects its contents from theft. It is ideal for those who keep forgetting where they have left their wallet or cell phone – this product will certainly make their life a little bit easier.

***
Check out our FASHION video
***

.

 

::::::::::: RFID PROTECTION

The crooks of today don't have to be very intelligent or dexterous - all they have to do is stand near you to steal precious data from your credit cards. Luckily, this is where Wiseward jumps in. You see, the RFID chips embedded in your cards work by using radio waves to communicate, and that's what makes it possible to read them without actual physical contact. But, that also means that someone with a skimmer device can easily scan through your pocket, without you realizing it. 

 

Fortunately, radio waves can be interrupted and blocked, and that’s exactly how Wiseward wallet works: it encases your credit cards in a material that interferes with radio waves. No radio waves – no skimming; you don't have to fear anymore while riding on a crowded bus, train or subway, or while standing in a queue close to other people.

To make things more practical, Wiseward has special two-zone card sections: one with RFID protection, and the other without protection. The section without RFID protection enables you to use the cards that must stay unblocked all the time - so you don't have to pull them out of the wallet if you want to open your garage, enter a subway station etc. 

.

::::::::::: MOBILE APP & BLUETOOTH CONNECTION

We know you are really attached to your wallet, and there's nothing wrong with it. That's the reason we attached some really cool functions to Wiseward; for example, it is always closely connected with your mobile phone via Bluetooth, using two-way communication.

 

When Wiseward is connected with your mobile, a special application takes care of it, armed with a bunch of smart features like geolocation, proximity detection, fall detection, detection of the wallet's position in the room and the sound alarm signaling that the wallet has been lost or stolen.

.

Remember those I can't find my #$%&* wallet or phone moments? You can breathe freely now, because with Wiseward wallet these moments are history.

.

 

Baggizmo Wiseward APP features includes: battery status; wallet movement detection notifying you if it falls; a feature signalling by push notification and/or sound alarm that the wallet is almost out of reach; detection and tracking of wallet usage by indicating its open/closed status; wallet within the range with visual tracking info and last-seen feature; NFC programming option, RGB light personalization color wheal with the light-color-changing color option and UV lamp detector; wallet and/or mobile phone detection with mobile sound alarm by touching wallet and vice versa, personalization with unique wallet ID and custom naming of your wallet; the option of registering more wallets on a single device. .. and maybe even more :)

The Wiseward application will be included in smart wallet pack and will be available from Google Play and Apple Store. You just synchronize your Wiseward with your smartphone and you’re good to go. 

Baggizmo Wiseward APP makes sure you always got your eye on your wallet.

 

 

::::::::::: MAGNET SENSOR

Wiseward wallet has another ace up its sleeve: a magnet sensor connected with your mobile phone, for detecting if it's folded or not, like when someone disrupts your privacy by touching the wallet or tries to open it for some reason while you are away. For all the above we have a song: U Can't Touch This!

 

 

::::::::::: GYROSCOPE + ACCELEROMETER + PIEZO BUZZER ALARM

Gyro… accelero… what? Don't worry, translated in plain English it goes for clever little gizmos that are always on an alert, helping your wallet conclude that somebody is fiddling with it or trying to run away with it. Luckily, smart is the buzzword when it comes to Wiseward: the smart buzzer sound alarm, together with Vibrate or Push notification function on your mobile phone, will alarm you if it changes its position in a suspicious way… or if it is accidentally dropped on the ground while you walk, run, or ride a bike. Just relax and do your thing, Wiseward will be safe and sound.

 

 

::::::::::: UV LAMP DETECTOR

Credit card rules, but the cash is still the king - that's why this UV lamp detector in your Wiseward will be of good use, either when you check the bills of your own domestic currency, or when you travel abroad and get in contact with all those strange looking banknotes: just inspect them under the UV light and learn if they are bona fide or not.

 

::::::::::: PROGRAMMABLE NFC CHIP

The heart of your Wiseward is an NFC chip that can easily be programmed to store various information - it means that you can make your wallet do all sorts of things like, for instance, to serve as an electronic business card, or as a pass for entering an office or parking garage.

.

::::::::::: WIRELESS CHARGING

Although Wiseward is equipped with a long-life battery, you should never let it run out of juice - that's why we fitted it with simple and cableless inductive charging. With Wiseward APP you can extend the duration of your wallet's battery by disabling some other functionalities.

Wiseward is compatible with any wireless charging pads certified by Qi standard.

 

 

::::::::::: RGB ILLUMINATION

LED there be light in your wallet! Wiseward is equipped with a small LED lamp that turns on and illuminates its interior when you open the wallet – a function that sometimes really comes in handy. 

It also has a cute bonus: this lamp is programmable by a mobile app, so it can be switched on and off and it can illuminate your Wiseward with a customized color.

.

.

Baggizmo Wiseward has been designed in Croatia and is completely made in Europe.

.

FSC® certificated eco-friendly innovative high-quality durable materials, that are water repellent, soft and pleasant to touch.

Made in Italy > originality, beauty and high-quality textures, emphasizing the essence of the Made in Italy fashion and style.

.

.
Two different patterns, each in 3 colors to choose from

Minimalistic diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt material on the inside. You will get an email to select your color at the end of the project.

Minimalistic true blue diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt mint green material on the inside.

Minimalistic cardinal red diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt ivory beige material on the inside.

Minimalistic jet black diamond shaped pattern material on the outside and smooth matt jet black material on the inside.

Noble blue tweed pattern material on the outside and smooth matt midnight blue material on the inside.

Sandy beige tweed pattern material on the outside and smooth matt ivory beige material on the inside.

Vintage brown tweed pattern material on the outside and smooth matt chocolate brown material on the inside.

 .

LIMITED EDITION
= gadget bag + smart wallet - both produced only in 120 pieces and with signed certificate

.

Baggizmo Wiseward is a new contemporary version of the classic men's bi-fold wallet, slim fit and pocket size, minimalistic and easy to use. Of course, it can fit perfectly in the Baggizmo gadget bag wallet compartment.

.
Due to the design of its compartments, it's only 0.4" (10 mm) thick when filled optimally (8 cards and cash).

L1 = 3.7" (9.5 cm), L2 = 7.8" (20 cm), L3 = 9" (10 cm).
Weight: approx. 55 grams

Wiseward can hold up to 10 credit cards in two RFID protected sections, plus up to 5 cards in another section, intended for non-protected cards. The section without RFID protection enables you to use cards that must stay unblocked all the time - so you don't have to pull them out of the wallet if you want to open the garage, enter the subway station etc.

Wiseward can receive up to 15 credit cards and still remain slim, pocket-sized and easy to use.

The USD, EUR, GBP... banknotes can easily fit in the cash slot. As for the coins, just use the vertical card pocket – up to 5 coins can fit in it.

.

.

TECH specification:

.

An awesome Baggizmo Wiseward T-shirt and a big thank you from Baggizmo team.

One Baggizmo Wiseward smart wallet! SAVE $24 on the retail price! Available in two pattern styles and in six different colors.

Get a Baggizmo Wiseward in a special edition gift packaging! SAVE $24 on the retail price and get classy textile reusable packaging and a mini With compliments card. Available in two pattern styles and in six different colors.

Two Baggizmo Wiseward - the pair of smart wallets for you and your friend, family member or business partner. SAVE $70 on the retail price! Available in two pattern styles and in six different colors.

One smart wallet and one gadget bag. SAVE $60 on the retail price of the wallet and the bag! Smart wallet available in two pattern styles and in six different colors. Gadget bag available in three textile colors.

One Limited edition smart wallet and one Limited edition gadget bag. Both produced only in 120 pieces and with signed certificate of the first Limited edition series of the Baggizmo Wiseward. Classy!

Set of 20 personalized smart wallets. Choose custom branding with your logo or without it. With the cost of 75$ per wallet SAVE on the retail price and get classy textile reusable packaging and a With compliments card! Available in two pattern styles and in six different colors.

 

The full retail price for Baggizmo Wiseward will be $119, so you're getting a great deal by supporting us on Indiegogo. We will not be selling Baggizmo Wiseward in retail until all Indiegogo rewards have been shipped.

.

Funds for this project will be used to produce the Baggizmo Wiseward and other rewards materials. The design and prototype work is complete, but we will need to finish software development, make a sample test, purchase materials (i.e. fabric etc.), and to cover labor costs for a large production run.

.


Free shipping for the USA, $5 shipping worldwide!

  • From USA warehouse
  • Worldwide shipping
  • Premium express courier shipping
  • Tracking code included

 

If you are a member of the media and you would like to cover our story or arrange an interview – please, contact us at wiseward@baggizmo.me or download our Media Kit.

.

You can’t have a great project without a great team. And even if we could, we wouldn’t want to ;) That's why we gathered a team of top-notch professionals to deliver you the best possible brand and product.

About us 
Baggizmo project was initiated by Ladislav Jurić in late 2014 with the development of a men’s bag intended for various devices (gadgets) and things we carry around on a daily basis. The first series of Baggizmo bags was financed by our Kickstarter backers in June 2015 and the bag was delivered to our supporters on time. The bag is still produced and is available via Baggizmo online shop and a network of global distributors. 

We have invested a lot of effort, time and passion in the preparation of the presentation materials for Baggizmo Wiseward. It was a very demanding, but fun and exciting process, and we hope we have managed to convey all the benefits of Baggizmo Wiseward.

Baggizmo team members:

Ladislav Jurić _ Founder, CEO, product development manager
Izvorka Jurić _ Product development and branding manager
Ante Medić and Dajgoro Labinac _ Electronics development
Maša Milovac and Kristina Volf _ Product design
Tomislav Petković _ Prototype development
Plava Tvornica _ Mobile application and user experience development
Igor Poturić _ Creative communication, copywriting
Mladen Šarić _ Fashion photography
Mladen Šarić, Timy Šarac _ Fashion video
Zdravko Šarčević, Davor Bjelanović, Siniša Hajduk _ Kickstarter video
Mario Huljev _ Sales and marketing assistant
Matija Tolić _ Website development, digital marketing & user support
Marina Ravlić _ Social network marketing, assistant & support for Kickstarter campaign
Stela Kovačić _ Graphic design, infographics & product photos
Zlatko Kelemenić _ Graphic design & visual presentation (video, gif animation etc.)
Tatjana Bartaković - Nacional Public Relations (Croatia)

and Marek Cieśla, Jonathan Greechan, Mike Suprovici, Sonja Batušić, Ana Šerić, Martina Validžić, Robert Zuber, Tina Đurišić, Bob Taylor, Damir Cimprešak Cimpy, Ela Arapović, Zvonimir Andrić, Saša Joković, Saša Joka, Lea Petanović, Filip Pušec, Leon Vignjević, Duško Čavić, Ivan Jelušić, Vlatko Matijević, Srđan Kovačević, Daniel Devčić, Ana Garić, Mira i Igor Serdarević, Mirza Kurtović, Jelena Gvozdanović, Founder Institute, Razvojna agencija Zagreb, Tehnološki park Zagreb and MSU Zagreb who helped us in many ways.

We would like to thank the whole team for their effort and enthusiasm.

 .

Any help spreading the word would be AWESOME.

Please share our story with anyone you think might appreciate the project. It would mean the world to us.

Share our campaign through the buttons below. Sharing is caring!

.

Questions?

If you have any questions or concerns, please shoot us an email at wiseward@baggizmo.me and we will answer as soon as possible!

.

We can’t tell you how much we appreciate you supporting us and telling the world about Baggizmo Wiseward - a wallet-meet-gadget story!

.

Meet Baggizmo Wiseward. A wallet that is specially designed to improve the security of credit cards and protect personal documents using integrated technology.The world’s smartest and most technologically advanced bi-fold wallet, acting as an individual’s best defense against today’s advanced hackers, pickpockets and our own forgetful minds - with 10 smart functions.Wiseward can receive up to 15 credit cards and still remain slim, pocket-sized and easy to use.Following its first successful crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter in 2015, Baggizmo produced and delivered the first series of design bags enabling a more practical and functional way of carrying electronic devices. It was this bag that gave impetus for the development of a new product, Baggizmo Wiseward, which is using integrated technology to improve the protection of personal property when carried around by its owner.Baggizmo Wiseward is intended for urban people – primarily those who adopt new technologies, but also those who want a more secure and more functional wallet that protects its contents from theft. It is ideal for those who keep forgetting where they have left their wallet or cell phone – this product will certainly make their life a little bit easier.***Check out our FASHION video***. ::::::::::: RFID PROTECTIONThe crooks of today don't have to be very intelligent or dexterous - all they have to do is stand near you to steal precious data from your credit cards. Luckily, this is where Wiseward jumps in. You see, the RFID chips embedded in your cards work by using radio waves to communicate, and that's what makes it possible to read them without actual physical contact. But, that also means that someone with a skimmer device can easily scan through your pocket, without you realizing it.  Fortunately, radio waves can be interrupted and blocked, and that’s exactly how Wiseward wallet works: it encases your credit cards in a material that interferes with radio waves. No radio waves – no skimming; you don't have to fear anymore while riding on a crowded bus, train or subway, or while standing in a queue close to other people.To make things more practical, Wiseward has special two-zone card sections: one with RFID protection, and the other without protection. The section without RFID protection enables you to use the cards that must stay unblocked all the time - so you don't have to pull them out of the wallet if you want to open your garage, enter a subway station etc. .::::::::::: MOBILE APP & BLUETOOTH CONNECTIONWe know you are really attached to your wallet, and there's nothing wrong with it. That's the reason we attached some really cool functions to Wiseward; for example, it is always closely connected with your mobile phone via Bluetooth, using two-way communication. When Wiseward is connected with your mobile, a special application takes care of it, armed with a bunch of smart features like geolocation, proximity detection, fall detection, detection of the wallet's position in the room and the sound alarm signaling that the wallet has been lost or stolen..Remember those I can't find my #$%&* wallet or phone moments? You can breathe freely now, because with Wiseward wallet these moments are history.. Baggizmo Wiseward APP features includes: battery status; wallet movement detection notifying you if it falls; a feature signalling by push notification and/or sound alarm that the wallet is almost out of reach; detection and tracking of wallet usage by indicating its open/closed status; wallet within the range with visual tracking info and last-seen feature; NFC programming option, RGB light personalization color wheal with the light-color-changing color option and UV lamp detector; wallet and/or mobile phone detection with mobile sound alarm by touching wallet and vice versa, personalization with unique wallet ID and custom naming of your wallet; the option of registering more wallets on a single device. .. and maybe even more :)The Wiseward application will be included in smart wallet pack and will be available from Google Play and Apple Store. story:
This campaign is over... But you can still pre-order at ADV3NTURE.com!
​

Pre-order  today and get Early Bird Prices and Free Shipping!

The ADV3NTURE Hoodie is a hoodie with built-in features designed for travelers. It's perfect for a journey around the world, or a trip across town. It's stylish and incredibly comfortable and will immediately become your favorite hoodie. It's been praised by the leading names in travel.

"The ADVENTURE Hoodie is the only travel clothing you need"
 Condé Nast Traveler

"The perfect accessory for busy travelers"
 Lonely Planet

"The ADV3NTURE Hoodie converts into an amazing travel pillow"
Travel + Leisure

"Smart-looking casual wear"
 USA Today

"Stylish and exceedingly comfortable"
 Men's Gear


We are an apparel design company made up of individuals that are passionate about creating amazing garments that you'll fall in love with. We've spent years of research and design, triumphs and mistakes, and listening to our thousands of previous customers to make a product that you can live in.  We want you to fall in love with your hoodie and be a customer/friend for life.

ADV3NTURE is a new line of adventure products from world traveler, entrepreneur and TV host Zane Lamprey. The "3" represents three things: Travel, Exploration, and Living Life to the Fullest".

The ADV3NTURE HOODIE  is first and foremost an everyday hoodie that is comfortable and of the highest quality. Secondly, it's about creating a something that's stylish to wear for any occasion. Then, and only then, is it about seamlessly integrating cool features that are useful in everyday life.

Order your ADV3NTURE Hoodie or Jacket through Indiegogo and you can take advantage of Early Bird Pricing, Free Shipping (in the US) and receiving your product way before they become available to the public. Your hoodie will ship in January of 2017.

 

ADV3NTURE HOODIE "CLASSIC"

The ADV3NTURE HOODIE CLASSIC collection are all made with a soft hood-liner, along with the 9 pockets and 14 features that we're proud of. The hoodie is made with a medium/heavy weight functional 300g/m2 fabric from a Cotton/Polyester blend. The hood is lined with a extremely soft grey flannelette.

The CLASSIC Hoodies are available in the colors below (SMOKE & FIRE, BLACK & BLUE, TRIPLE BLACK, NAVY GREY & FOREST GREEN.

CLASSIC Smoke & Fire (heather grey with red accents)

CLASSIC Black & Blue (black with royal blue accents)

CLASSIC Triple Black (black with black accents)

CLASSIC Navy Grey (heather navy with dark grey accents)

CLASSIC Forest Green (heather forest green with dark green accents)

BLACK & BLUE - Black with royal blue zipper and accents

SMOKE & FIRE - Athletic Grey with red zipper red accents

 

ADV3NTURE HOODIE LIMITED

The ADV3NTURE HOODIE LIMITED versions are the same structure as the CLASSIC, but are made with premium fabrics. What is a "premium fabric"? In the case of the Herringbone, it's a very soft woven fleece material. With the Black Camo and Olive Camo, it's a fleece material with a unique dying and printing process. All of the Limited Hoodies are made with a medium/heavy weight functional 300g/m2 fabric from a Cotton/Polyester blend. The hoods are lined with a extremely soft grey flannelette.

They’re just as comfy at home or tailgate party as they are for a night out on the town! The LIMITED Hoodies are available in the colors below (BLACK CAMO, OLIVE CAMO, DARK HERRINGBONE & LIGHT HERRINGBONE).

LIMITED Black Camo (black camo with black accents)

LIMITED Olive Camo (olive camo with olive and orange accents)

LIMITED Dark Herringbone (woven herringbone with black accents)

LIMITED Light Herringbone (woven herringbone with grey accents)

HERRINGBONE - Very soft, woven Herringbone with black zipper and hood liner.

BLACK CAMO - Pigment-dyed Black camo pattern with black zipper and hood liner.

 

ALL-WEATHER ADV3NTURE JACKET

                  

The All-Weather ADV3NTURE JACKET is made with DWR (durable water-resistant) fabric and is lined with ridiculously soft Sherpa fabric in the body, hood and side pockets. It has the same features of the other Adventure Hoodies, but is made with a waterproof treated Polyester/Spandex shell with a weight of 120g/m2. Along with the waterproof treated exterior, there is also an additional permeability film that provides additional water-resistance and insulation. The body, hood and side zippered pockets are lined with incredibly soft (like, baby bunny soft) Sherpa fabric. The combined weight of the shell and lining are 360g/m2.

The All-Weather Jackets are available in the colors below (BLACK, CHARCOAL & NAVY).

 

 

ADV3NTURE JACKET - Black All-Weather ADV3NTURE Jacket with Black zipper

 

POCKETS & FEATURES

There are nine (9) pockets and fourteen (14) features that are seamlessly incorporated in the ADV3NTURE HOODIE. We set out to create a hoodie that is full of innovations, but is primarily a stylish high-end hoodie that you will want to wear every day.

NINE (9) POCKETS

The ADV3NTURE HOODIE has nine pockets. While each pocket was designed for a purpose, what you use it for is up to you. Each person and each adventure is unique, so use our descriptions as suggestions. And if you find any other uses for the pockets, let us know!

ZIPPERED SIDE POCKETS (2) - Unzip to warm your hands, or zip up to secure your belongings. They zip up (not down), so the rubber zipper pull tucks behind the pocket flap. (In the All-Weather Jacket, they're lined with incredibly soft Sherpa material)

 

FRONT CARGO POCKETS (2) - These pockets are essential to the ADV3NTURE HOODIE. They’re convenient enough to drop things into (camera, phone, wallet, maps, cash, change, etc), and big enough for odd-sized items (big headphones, maps, granola bars, children's toys, crayons, etc). And they are secured with two plastic-covered metal snaps.

 

ZIPPERED PASSPORT POCKET - You’ll never fumble for your passport (or wallet, or cash, or I.D.), because you’ll know that it’s secured close to your chest in a zippered pocket. This pocket has a rubber zipper pull.

INSIDE WATER-RESISTANT POCKET - Adventure is about an element of uncertainty. You never know when a water-resistant inside pocket will come in handy, but it certainly will! This is the perfect pocket for your phone and earbuds.

NEOPRENE KOOZIE POCKET (1) - This is one of the carry-overs from The Drinking Jacket. But, now the pocket is sealed at the bottom, and is the perfect size for a phone (Android or iPhone 6+). It provides a padded pocket for your cell phone OR is an insulated place to hold your beverage, while also keeping it chilled.

ARM POCKET (1) - This is also a carry-over from the Drinking Jacket, but we switched arms to make it more convenient to 90% of the population (right-handed people - not that south paws can’t use it!).

MINI-PEN POCKET (1) This unique pocket holds a mini-pen, because you never know when you’ll need a writing implement. The pocket holds pens up to 4" long. There are several inexpensive mini-pens that fit in this pocket.

FOURTEEN (14) FEATURES

The ADV3NTURE HOODIE has 14 distinct features, although it could be argued that it actually has more. While each feature was designed with a specific purpose in mind, we know you'll come up with other use for them!

 

SUNGLASS HOLDER - People most often lose their sunglasses when day turns to night or sunny skies turn cloudy and they don’t have anywhere to put their sunglasses. With the sunglass holder, you have a place to easily store or access your sunglasses, so you don’t leave them on a table, in a car, or wherever you would have put them down.

BOTTLE-OPENER ZIPPER - The top zipper is a bottle opener. It's much smaller than the bottle opener on the Drinking Jacket, but your bottle opener is still there when you need it.

 

REFLECTIVE CABLING - There is reflective cabling sewn into the front button pockets and on the hood (from the front to the back). They are covered with a thin body-color material to make it barely visible during the day. But, in our proprietary process than maintains 91% of its reflectivity, you will be seen at night even in very dim light.

 

REFLECTIVE LOGO - The Monkey (Pleepleus) logo on your hoodie is reflective. We used a tinted reflective ink to make our logo subtle and blend in with the fabric color (of all of the ADV3NTURE HOODIE), but it still maintains 95% of its reflective properties. Let our logo be seen when you want/need to be seen!

 

FOLDABLE GLOVES - The cuffs of the hoodie fold out to serve as gloves. They’ll provide a cozy home for your hands when the weather turns cold. They’re also handy for keeping your beverage cold and your hands warm.

 

BEVERAGE GRIPS - The pattern on the gloves provides more grip when holding a beverage. But they also add more grip for times when you didn’t know you needed it.

 

RETURN HOME FEATURE - OK, it's not as much a sophisticated electronic GPS component as it is a place to write your phone number or email address, but it's arguably just as effective. Write your info in the jacket and, if you leave your ADV3NTURE HOODIE somewhere, the finder will know how to contact you!

 

UNDERARM VENTS- The subcutaneous fat in your body acts as a natural insulator. You have less fat in your armpits, which makes them serve as the your torso’s cooling center. So, a simple vent has been added under the armpits to allow your body to remove excess heat.

 

VENTILATION ZIPPER - The addition of a bottom zipper enables you to cool off, without having to take off your hoodie. Unzipping just the top zipper can also work, but it may cause your hoodie to slip off your shoulders. By unzipping the bottom zipper, you can cool off, while keeping your hoodie in place.

 

 OVER-SIZED HOOD - The hood is 5” larger than a standard hoodie, and is lined with super-soft fabric. This enables you to pull the hoodie over your eyes, to shut out the light and help you sleep.

 

ADJUSTABLE HOOD SNAPS - The hood is over-sized so it can cover your eyes when you want to take a nap. But, there is a button in the back of the hood that let's you adjust the size, so it doesn't cover your eyes other times that you're using the hood.

 

 EXTRA SOFT HOOD LINING - The hood is lined with extra soft fabric which adds and extra level of insulating. When you're traveling, it creates a nice, soft, home-away-from-home.

 

DRAWSTRINGS - Use the drawstrings to adjust the hoodie, as well as blocking out the light, while you pull the hoodie over your eyes for a nap.

 

SHERPA-LINED JACKET - The body of the jacket is lined with Velveteen Sherpa fabric that is as soft as a baby bunny (we actually tested it, which may have just been an excuse to go play with baby bunnies). It provides a layer of insulation and a layer of luxurious softness.

 

SHERPA-LINED HOOD - The hood is lined with the same Sherpa fabric as the body. When you pull it over your head, it envelopes your head in softness.

 

SHERPA-LINED SIDE POCKETS - The zippered side pockets are lined in the same Sherpa material to provide an extra soft place to warm your hands. Your cold hands will thank you.

 

QUILTED ARM-LINING - The sleeves are lined with a quilted in a soft cotton/polyester blend that provides a cozy and warm place for your arms, even if you're wearing a T-shirt underneath and have bare arms.

 

RIDICULOUSLY SOFT PILLOW CONVERSION - The ADV3NTURE HOODIE and ADV3NTURE JACKET quickly and easily convert into a pillow. Roll the jacket into the oversized hood and snap it shut. If rolled inside-out, it creates a super-soft pillow. If you roll it outside-in, your jacket becomes compact to fit in your bag.

 

IMPORTANT STUFF

SIZING - We're offering Men's and Women's sizes of the ADV3NTURE Hoodie and ADV3NTURE Jacket. The sizes for Men's and Women's are comparable to a standard hoodie. To find your perfect size, grab your favorite hoodie (soon to be your second favorite hoodie!) and lay it on a flat surface. Grab a tape measure and measure the dimensions that you see in the image below. Then find the size that most closely matches it from the 22 sizes we offer. If you have a question, let us know. We'd love to hear your input!

US & Imperial Measurements

 

Metric ("International") Measurements

QUALITY IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT - We are working with one of the top apparel manufacturers to produce the ADV3NTURE Hoodie and Jacket. They produce top-quality garments, and this garment is no different. We have chosen premium fabrics for the hoodies, and they are being sewn with premium threads and stitching.

TEMPERATURE RANGE - The ADV3NTURE Hoodie CLASSIC and LIMITED are medium-weight hoodies which are ideal for cool days 48°F (9C)° to the high 69°F (20°C). The ADV3NTURE Jacket is made with a water-resistant shell and Sherpa lined body, hood and pockets, along with quilted fabric in the arms. It's ideal for temperatures from 33°F (1°C) to 64°F (18°C). However, with proper layering underneath, the Jacket could be worn in temperatures below freezing.

SHIPPING - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link for a survey. For the ADV3NTURE HOODIE, we’re going to start manufacturing 5 DAYS after the campaign is concluded. If you do not fill out your survey on time, you may need to choose a different color than your first choice.

RETURNS - If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or received the wrong size, you have 30 days to exchange the hoodie. Just follow the directions on the packing slip. If, once you receive your hoodie, you wish to change the size/color (and an alternate is available), there is a $15 fee to cover us shipping you a new hoodie. Just email the address on the packing slip within 30 days of receiving the hoodie. All of the details and customer service info will be included in your order.
story_txt:
This campaign is over... But you can still pre-order at ADV3NTURE.com!​Pre-order  today and get Early Bird Prices and Free Shipping!The ADV3NTURE Hoodie is a hoodie with built-in features designed for travelers. It's perfect for a journey around the world, or a trip across town. It's stylish and incredibly comfortable and will immediately become your favorite hoodie. It's been praised by the leading names in travel."The ADVENTURE Hoodie is the only travel clothing you need" Condé Nast Traveler"The perfect accessory for busy travelers" Lonely Planet"The ADV3NTURE Hoodie converts into an amazing travel pillow"Travel + Leisure"Smart-looking casual wear" USA Today"Stylish and exceedingly comfortable" Men's GearWe are an apparel design company made up of individuals that are passionate about creating amazing garments that you'll fall in love with. We've spent years of research and design, triumphs and mistakes, and listening to our thousands of previous customers to make a product that you can live in.  We want you to fall in love with your hoodie and be a customer/friend for life.ADV3NTURE is a new line of adventure products from world traveler, entrepreneur and TV host Zane Lamprey. The "3" represents three things: Travel, Exploration, and Living Life to the Fullest".The ADV3NTURE HOODIE  is first and foremost an everyday hoodie that is comfortable and of the highest quality. Secondly, it's about creating a something that's stylish to wear for any occasion. Then, and only then, is it about seamlessly integrating cool features that are useful in everyday life.Order your ADV3NTURE Hoodie or Jacket through Indiegogo and you can take advantage of Early Bird Pricing, Free Shipping (in the US) and receiving your product way before they become available to the public. Your hoodie will ship in January of 2017. ADV3NTURE HOODIE "CLASSIC"The ADV3NTURE HOODIE CLASSIC collection are all made with a soft hood-liner, along with the 9 pockets and 14 features that we're proud of. The hoodie is made with a medium/heavy weight functional 300g/m2 fabric from a Cotton/Polyester blend. The hood is lined with a extremely soft grey flannelette.The CLASSIC Hoodies are available in the colors below (SMOKE & FIRE, BLACK & BLUE, TRIPLE BLACK, NAVY GREY & FOREST GREEN.CLASSIC Smoke & Fire (heather grey with red accents)CLASSIC Black & Blue (black with royal blue accents)CLASSIC Triple Black (black with black accents)CLASSIC Navy Grey (heather navy with dark grey accents)CLASSIC Forest Green (heather forest green with dark green accents)BLACK & BLUE - Black with royal blue zipper and accentsSMOKE & FIRE - Athletic Grey with red zipper red accents ADV3NTURE HOODIE LIMITEDThe ADV3NTURE HOODIE LIMITED versions are the same structure as the CLASSIC, but are made with premium fabrics. What is a "premium fabric"? In the case of the Herringbone, it's a very soft woven fleece material. With the Black Camo and Olive Camo, it's a fleece material with a unique dying and printing process. All of the Limited Hoodies are made with a medium/heavy weight functional 300g/m2 fabric from a Cotton/Polyester blend. The hoods are lined with a extremely soft grey flannelette.They’re just as comfy at home or tailgate party as they are for a night out on the town! The LIMITED Hoodies are available in the colors below (BLACK CAMO, OLIVE CAMO, DARK HERRINGBONE & LIGHT HERRINGBONE).LIMITED Black Camo (black camo with black accents)LIMITED Olive Camo (olive camo with olive and orange accents)LIMITED Dark Herringbone (woven herringbone with black accents)LIMITED Light Herringbone (woven herringbone with grey accents) HERRINGBONE - Very soft, woven Herringbone with black zipper and hood liner.BLACK CAMO - Pigment-dyed Black camo pattern with black zipper and hood liner. ALL-WEATHER ADV3NTURE JACKET
                  The All-Weather ADV3NTURE JACKET is made with DWR (durable water-resistant) fabric and is lined with ridiculously soft Sherpa fabric in the body, hood and side pockets. It has the same features of the other Adventure Hoodies, but is made with a waterproof treated Polyester/Spandex shell with a weight of 120g/m2. Along with the waterproof treated exterior, there is also an additional permeability film that provides additional water-resistance and insulation. The body, hood and side zippered pockets are lined with incredibly soft (like, baby bunny soft) Sherpa fabric. The combined weight of the shell and lining are 360g/m2.The All-Weather Jackets are available in the colors below (BLACK, CHARCOAL & NAVY).  
All-Weather Black JACKET (black DWR jacket with black accents)

All-Weather Charcoal Grey JACKET (grey DWR jacket with grey accents)

All-Weather Navy Blue JACKET (navy blue DWR jacket with navy blue accents)
 ADV3NTURE JACKET - Black All-Weather ADV3NTURE Jacket with Black zipper POCKETS & FEATURESThere are nine (9) pockets and fourteen (14) features that are seamlessly incorporated in the ADV3NTURE HOODIE. We set out to create a hoodie that is full of innovations, but is primarily a stylish high-end hoodie that you will want to wear every day.NINE (9) POCKETSThe ADV3NTURE HOODIE has nine pockets. While each pocket was designed for a purpose, what you use it for is up to you. Each person and each adventure is unique, so use our descriptions as suggestions. And if you find any other uses for the pockets, let us know!ZIPPERED SIDE POCKETS (2) - Unzip to warm your hands, or zip up to secure your belongings. They zip up (not down), so the rubber zipper pull tucks behind the pocket flap. (In the All-Weather Jacket, they're lined with incredibly soft Sherpa material) FRONT CARGO POCKETS (2) - These pockets are essential to the ADV3NTURE HOODIE. They’re convenient enough to drop things into (camera, phone, wallet, maps, cash, change, etc), and big enough for odd-sized items (big headphones, maps, granola bars, children's toys, crayons, etc). And they are secured with two plastic-covered metal snaps. 
 ZIPPERED PASSPORT POCKET - You’ll never fumble for your passport (or wallet, or cash, or I.D.), because you’ll know that it’s secured close to your chest in a zippered pocket. This pocket has a rubber zipper pull.
 INSIDE WATER-RESISTANT POCKET - Adventure is about an element of uncertainty. You never know when a water-resistant inside pocket will come in handy, but it certainly will! This is the perfect pocket for your phone and earbuds.

The pocket holds pens up to 4" long. There are several inexpensive mini-pens that fit in this pocket.

 SUNGLASS HOLDER - People most often lose their sunglasses when day turns to night or sunny skies turn cloudy and they don’t have anywhere to put their sunglasses. With the sunglass holder, you have a place to easily store or access your sunglasses, so you don’t leave them on a table, in a car, or wherever you would have put them down.
Pictured : Sherpa-lined ADV3NTURE JACKET
PILLOW CONVERSION - You never know when you’ll need a pillow! Missed a flight, long car ride, boring lecture, or maybe you just want to lay on the grass with your four-legged friend? Your adventure hoodie easily folds up into a pillow (way more effective than the chintzy ones they offer on airlines) that provides a substantial place to rest your head. It’s also a convenient way to transport your hoodie, when you don’t need it. The pillow converts both ways, so you can have a super soft pillow (with the lining on the outside), or a more durable pillow (with the lining on the inside) if you don't want to get the lining dirty in public places.

Let our logo be seen when you want/need to be seen! FOLDABLE GLOVES - The cuffs of the hoodie fold out to serve as gloves. They’ll provide a cozy home for your hands when the weather turns cold. They’re also handy for keeping your beverage cold and your hands warm. BEVERAGE GRIPS - The pattern on the gloves provides more grip when holding a beverage. The All-Weather ADV3NTURE JACKET is lined with incredibly soft Sherpa fabric in the hood and body. What is Sherpa fabric? It is a super-plush "fleecy pile" which is most often used to make stuffed animals, blankets and pillows. It is, in a word, luxurious.

story:
THE ALL NEW BOVARRO  AUTOMATIC WATCH HAND ASSEMBLED IN SWITZERLAND

 

New BLACK MOON LIMITED EDITION pledge tiers now available for Black Friday Weekend!

An automatic Swiss made watch inspired by Apollo 11

As children, we always dreamed about space. Our eyes would see something down heart on Planet Earth but inevitably return to the stars, looking up and wondering if we would ever get there ourselves. Then, in July 1969, we did: the astronauts of Apollo 11 led us to the moon. Although the footsteps were few, we took them together. That was all of us, up there, exploring that big black wonder from our dreams. That was all of us, escaping the confines of gravity.

 

 

Earlier pledge tiers and LTD editions are selling out fast. Thanks to all the awesome backers. 

 

 Now, the Moon 1969 watch, a Bovarro Swiss-made automatic timepiece, is here to celebrate that achievement. Designed to resemble the hatch on the Apollo 11 spacecraft, bezels and all, this is a watch that is both unique and functional.

 Initially we created the bezel to look exactly like the hatch with the 42 screws, but the look on the watch did not quite come out as nice, so we decided to reduce the screws around the bezel down to 8 , and shape the crown like the knob on the right side of the hatch, and the look of the watch came out exactly the way we planned.

Bovarro Collections come in 3 Series / 2 Sizes:

 

Gold Watch Limited Edition Series  for the Golden 1969 History:

The Limited Edition Gold Series Watches will come with Solid 18 K Gold  Case (42 or 44 mm), Gold Back Case, Gold Crown and Gold Strap Buckle.  

You can chose any of the above series in Solid 18 K Gold Case.

  And a Piano finish luxury box to store this prestigious History

Limited Edition Models (#0,00,1-500) will be available combined in all the models. You will choose your watch after the campaign and we will engrave the number on the case. None Limited Edition Watches will come with hard back case with the Moon Engravings. 

 The easy to read black dial of the Lunar Series boasts luminescent hours dots at 12, 3, 6 and 9 o'clock positions and, luminescent moon at 6 o'clock and date window at 3 o'clock.

Orbit models come with a more minimalist index free dial. The Orbit model has larger luminescent hour dots at 12, 3, 6 and 9 o'clock positions.

Celestial model dials hour marks have been omitted to make it look more minimal. 

All 3 models come in both 42 and 46 mm cases.

Stretch Goal #3

When reached $170,000 every watch will come with a set of strap removing tools.

Stretch Goal #1 REACHED!

Now all backers will receive an extra pair of Genuine Leather Straps at no cost. 

 Stretch Goal #2

Initially this stretch goal was st at $160,000. But to thank all our backers and spice things up, we have decieded to reduce it by $20,000 down to $140,000! We believe in team work. So please spread the word by shaing this project with everybody you know.
  

 

 

 

Precisely made, each of Bovarro's components are crafted out of the highest-grade parts and materials available; the Bovarro Moon 1969 watches come in  46mm and 42 mm  diameter with 24mm  and 22 mm lugs. The double-domed sapphire crystal is durable and scratch-proof. Water-resistant up to 100 meters; the screw down crown is engraved with Bovarro's double "RR" logo.

SPECS AND DIMENSIONS  

All 3 Series: Lunar / Orbit / Celestial  

Case: 

46mm with 24 mm lugs / 14 mm thick  

42 mm with 22 mm lugs / 12.6 mm thick  

Material: Brushed 316L Stainless steel (case, crown and buckle) or 18K Solid Gold

Crystal: Double Domed Sapphire with Anti Reflective coating  

Strap: German Made / Italian Leather  

Water Resistance: 100 meter (10 BAR)  

Engraved logo on crown, buckle and back case 

 

 Italian Leather - German Made Straps: We sourced the highest quality leather material from Italy which will be shipped to Germany for sewing and manufacturing the Straps. These straps will be available in black or brown.

 

 

 

 

 

The 25 jewel ETA 2824-2 decorated movement will keep your time  accurate for a very long time. 

Hours, minutes, sweep second. 

Self-winding mechanism with ball bearing

Date, corrector

Stop second device

Regulator system ETACHRON and regulator corrector

28.800 vibrations per hour; 4 Hz

25 Jewels

Why ETA 2824-2?

We have considered many important factors to chose the movement that we would need for the Bovarro Watches: reliability, longevity and accuracy.
ETA is the largest and most well known  supplier of movements in Switzerland, which supplies movements to famous Swiss luxury brands.

Reading time with Bovarro Moon 1969 is easy due to its minimal design.The moon and round indexes on the dial are topped with strong luminescent coating so you can easily read the time in the dark.

In Action:

 

WHY DOUBLE DOMED SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL

We want your Bovarro watch to last for generations, so we decided to choose the best and hardest crystal there is - Double Domed Sapphire Crystal.
Sapphire is the most expensive glass crystal material and the most scratch resistant. It is a very hard, transparent material made of crystallizing aluminum oxide at very high temperatures.
 
Double Domed: The arch on both sides of the Sapphire Crystal  makes it better able to dissipate the forces of impact, and once treated with an inner A/R coating it looks almost like a quality lens the dial really "pops" sharp and clear.
 

 

Swissness is the key to a superior quality watch. All Bovarro watches are Swiss Made and will come with a Authenticity of Swiss Made watch certificate.

 

 

 

With pride  We stand behind our watches and are committed to class A service. Each Bovarro watch will come with a limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of two (2) years after receiving your watch.

 Great things come in nice packages. Bovarro watches will arrive to your door in high quality polished piano finish black wooden box. Kickstarter backers will also receive a 5 cm moon model so you can share this great Lunar history with the ones around you

 

 

 

 

 We have estimated the delivery to be in May, but we might be able to deliver the watches about 2-4 weeks sooner. This is just an estimation.

Bovarro has been created by  Bob and Ary, two brothers and designers from Vancouver. With 3 successful Kickstarter campaigns under out belt, we have shipped over 2,500 Ferro watches over the past two years. Thanks to Kickstarter backers that made it possible. Because of your past support, we are now able to present to you our very fist Swiss Made watch.

 Here is just a few of what some backers and other folks had to say about our past watches:Some nameas are covered for privacy reasons.

 

 

As the final design / tech drawings , prototyping and testing phases have been successfully accomplished, we are finally confident and ready to manufacture the watches for our backers. We have the manufacturer and other part suppliers ready to make the watches with our green signal. All we need is your support. In order to bring Bovarro watches to your wrists, we need to meet our factory's minimum order quantity requirement; and this will only be possible with your support. By making a pledge, you will secure a high quality Bovarro Swiss Made Watch  at a special Kickstarter price.   

Thank you all for taking your time to view this project . We hope that you are as passionate as we are about the Bovarro  watches and make your pledge in order to receive your super awesome unique watch(es).

Please share this project with your family and friends.

 

 

 

 

 

PLEASE CLICK HERE TO ACCESS BOVARRO PRESS KIT
 

 

.

Then, in July 1969, we did: the astronauts of Apollo 11 led us to the moon. Although the footsteps were few, we took them together. That was all of us, up there, exploring that big black wonder from our dreams. That was all of us, escaping the confines of gravity.

 

 

Earlier pledge tiers and LTD editions are selling out fast. Thanks to all the awesome backers. 
 

 Now, the Moon 1969 watch, a Bovarro Swiss-made automatic timepiece, is here to celebrate that achievement. Designed to resemble the hatch on the Apollo 11 spacecraft, bezels and all, this is a watch that is both unique and functional.

 Initially we created the bezel to look exactly like the hatch with the 42 screws, but the look on the watch did not quite come out as nice, so we decided to reduce the screws around the bezel down to 8 , and shape the crown like the knob on the right side of the hatch, and the look of the watch came out exactly the way we planned.

Bovarro Collections come in 3 Series / 2 Sizes:

 
Gold Watch Limited Edition Series  for the Golden 1969 History:
The Limited Edition Gold Series Watches will come with Solid 18 K Gold  Case (42 or 44 mm), Gold Back Case, Gold Crown and Gold Strap Buckle.  
You can chose any of the above series in Solid 18 K Gold Case.

  And a Piano finish luxury box to store this prestigious History

Limited Edition Models (#0,00,1-500) will be available combined in all the models. You will choose your watch after the campaign and we will engrave the number on the case. None Limited Edition Watches will come with hard back case with the Moon Engravings. 

 The easy to read black dial of the Lunar Series boasts luminescent hours dots at 12, 3, 6 and 9 o'clock positions and, luminescent moon at 6 o'clock and date window at 3 o'clock.

Orbit models come with a more minimalist index free dial. The Orbit model has larger luminescent hour dots at 12, 3, 6 and 9 o'clock positions.

Celestial model dials hour marks have been omitted to make it look more minimal. 
All 3 models come in both 42 and 46 mm cases.
Stretch Goal #3
When reached $170,000 every watch will come with a set of strap removing tools.

Stretch Goal #1 REACHED!
Now all backers will receive an extra pair of Genuine Leather Straps at no cost. 

 Stretch Goal #2
Initially this stretch goal was st at $160,000. But to thank all our backers and spice things up, we have decieded to reduce it by $20,000 down to $140,000! We believe in team work. So please spread the word by shaing this project with everybody you know.

         
      
Precisely made, each of Bovarro's components are crafted out of the highest-grade parts and materials available; the Bovarro Moon 1969 watches come in  46mm and 42 mm  diameter with 24mm  and 22 mm lugs. The double-domed sapphire crystal is durable and scratch-proof. Water-resistant up to 100 meters; the screw down crown is engraved with Bovarro's double "RR" logo.

SPECS AND DIMENSIONS  
All 3 Series: Lunar / Orbit / Celestial  
Case: 
46mm with 24 mm lugs / 14 mm thick  
42 mm with 22 mm lugs / 12.6 mm thick  
Material: Brushed 316L Stainless steel (case, crown and buckle) or 18K Solid Gold
Crystal: Double Domed Sapphire with Anti Reflective coating  
Strap: German Made / Italian Leather  
Water Resistance: 100 meter (10 BAR)  
Engraved logo on crown, buckle and back case 

 

 Italian Leather - German Made Straps: We sourced the highest quality leather material from Italy which will be shipped to Germany for sewing and manufacturing the Straps. These straps will be available in black or brown.

 

 

 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 
 

The 25 jewel ETA 2824-2 decorated movement will keep your time  accurate for a very long time. 

Hours, minutes, sweep second. 
Self-winding mechanism with ball bearing
Date, corrector
Stop second device
Regulator system ETACHRON and regulator corrector
28.800 vibrations per hour; 4 Hz
25 Jewels

Why ETA 2824-2?
We have considered many important factors to chose the movement that we would need for the Bovarro Watches: reliability, longevity and accuracy.
ETA is the largest and most well known  supplier of movements in Switzerland, which supplies movements to famous Swiss luxury brands.

Reading time with Bovarro Moon 1969 is easy due to its minimal design.The moon and round indexes on the dial are topped with strong luminescent coating so you can easily read the time in the dark.

In Action:

 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 

 
WHY DOUBLE DOMED SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL
We want your Bovarro watch to last for generations, so we decided to choose the best and hardest crystal there is - Double Domed Sapphire Crystal.

Sapphire is the most expensive glass crystal material and the most scratch resistant. It is a very hard, transparent material made of crystallizing aluminum oxide at very high temperatures.
 
Double Domed: The arch on both sides of the Sapphire Crystal  makes it better able to dissipate the forces of impact, and once treated with an inner A/R coating it looks almost like a quality lens the dial really "pops" sharp and clear.
 

 

Swissness is the key to a superior quality watch. All Bovarro watches are Swiss Made and will come with a Authenticity of Swiss Made watch certificate.

 

 

 

With pride  We stand behind our watches and are committed to class A service. Each Bovarro watch will come with a limited warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of two (2) years after receiving your watch.

 Great things come in nice packages. Bovarro watches will arrive to your door in high quality polished piano finish black wooden box. Kickstarter backers will also receive a 5 cm moon model so you can share this great Lunar history with the ones around you

 

 

 

 

 We have estimated the delivery to be in May, but we might be able to deliver the watches about 2-4 weeks sooner. This is just an estimation.

Bovarro has been created by  Bob and Ary, two brothers and designers from Vancouver. With 3 successful Kickstarter campaigns under out belt, we have shipped over 2,500 Ferro watches over the past two years. Thanks to Kickstarter backers that made it possible. Because of your past support, we are now able to present to you our very fist Swiss Made watch.

 Here is just a few of what some backers and other folks had to say about our past watches:Some nameas are covered for privacy reasons.

 

 

As the final design / tech drawings , prototyping and testing phases have been successfully accomplished, we are finally confident and ready to manufacture the watches for our backers. We have the manufacturer and other part suppliers ready to make the watches with our green signal. All we need is your support. In order to bring Bovarro watches to your wrists, we need to meet our factory's minimum order quantity requirement; and this will only be possible with your support. By making a pledge, you will secure a high quality Bovarro Swiss Made Watch  at a special Kickstarter price.   

Thank you all for taking your time to view this project . We hope that you are as passionate as we are about the Bovarro  watches and make your pledge in order to receive your super awesome unique watch(es).
Please share this project with your family and friends.
 
             
      
PLEASE CLICK HERE TO ACCESS BOVARRO PRESS KIT 
 
.

story:
The ultimate lightweight jacket that also helps kids in need. 
When you purchase one jacket, one will also be gifted to a kid in need within 50 miles of you.

We are crowdfunding now so that the jackets will be ready for you and the kids in time for fall and back to school!  

Welcome to comfort. The Northward Jacket from Equinox & Solstice is ready to keep you and a kid warm, dry and feeling great in all types of weather. Cozy enough for chilly days and breathable enough on warm days, the Northward Jacket is your go-to jacket for everyday use.

Stretch nylon fabric makes comfort and proper fit a top priority. You’ll feel like it’s made for you! Equinox & Solstice always offers free shipping and free returns in the U.S. so you can make sure it fits you and your life without any pressure.

Windproof and breathable, the Northward Jacket is made for weather from 15-75 degrees Fahrenheit. You’ll stay warm even when the temperature drops suddenly and remain comfortable when the weather heats up. The jacket also has an elastic drawcord hem and adjustable Velcro cuffs for added protection against the elements if needed.

It will also protect your valuables with convenient zippered pockets, including on your arm, as well as internal pockets.

Water resistant, the Northward Jacket also includes a rain visor, an attached hood, and sealed seams with a peripheral cord adjustment, so you stay dry and comfortable on the wettest of days. So, go out into the rain! Nothing can stop you now.

Perfect for your busy life, this jacket is portable and packable.  Easily compactable into a small space, it’s also lightweight at less than 2 lbs and wrinkle resistant.

With over 15 million youths living at or below the poverty line in the United States, most do not have adequate attire for changing seasons, let alone something that they can be proud of wearing. Not having the proper attire leads to:

  • Exposure to the elements: Dehydration, hypothermia, aggravated allergies and skin conditions or worsening pre-existing medical conditions.
  • Going Hungry: 73% of low-income families cut back on food to provide household goods, including clothing, for their children.
  • Embarrassment and Truancy: Children avoid school to minimize ridicule and teasing, and parents worry about keeping their kid safe from the weather.
  • Harder Time in School: Studies have shown that clothing need directly leads to behavioral problems and academic distress. 

We are going into production ASAP after the campaign to make sure that the jackets are ready for delivery for back to school!

We have teamed up with 170+ non-profits in communities throughout the US to ensure we get the jackets into the right hands and are adding more daily.

We have dedicated resources working directly with non-profits to reach kids in need as quickly as possible. If we don’t have a partner in your area, do not worry, we will have one ASAP!


Equinox & Solstice Outdoor Company started with one vision in mind—helping as many kids as possible weather life's many storms.

The original idea was the brainchild of our fearless leader Alex who was inspired by a teen in need. This teenager was dealing with some incredibly difficult circumstances that left them without warm clothing. After aiding this young person, Alex realized that this situation is far too prevalent in this country. Every day kids are going to school without a jacket to protect them from the elements. At that moment he decided to do his part to put an end to this epidemic in America. With that singular goal in mind, Alex conceived the idea of creating a one to one business model that would provide weather appropriate clothing to customers and kids in need. After constant discussion and draft after draft of business models, E&S was born. We have done our best to make sure that we are as prepared as possible. All of the logistical details have been worked out and we are only waiting for the funding from this campaign to start production. 

Manufacturing/Delivery Delays may happen. Recognizing this as a potential issue, we have partnered with professional logistic specialists Inovatex Apparel to assure smooth manufacturing and delivery timelines.

In rural areas, few non-profits have the ability to reach kids and it may be difficult for us to meet the donation within 50 miles of the customer, but we will get as close as possible. Not only do we have the flexibility to work with any IRS designated 501(c)(3), we are willing to work with non-profits as suggested by our customers.

We have a small amount of working capital in a high-cost marketplace. Of course, this is the reason we are launching our jacket through Indiegogo. We are already preparing to meet with interested investors once the campaign has concluded, depending on the success of the campaign.

We have a minimum order quantity of jackets per color and we may have to substitute colors if we don’t meet those minimums. In the remote chance that this scenario should arise, we will work with each affected customer to guarantee satisfaction up to and including refunding the purchase amount.
If I have questions not addressed in this FAQ, what can I do?
Email us at support@eandsoutdoor.com or call us at (800) 265-0235 and we’ll get you an answer. 

Will you ship worldwide?
With few exceptions, yes! Please recognize that all our non-profit allies are USA based so your donated jacket will not be given to a kid in your home country. Please contact us if you have any questions!

Is shipping really free?
No fooling, shipping really is free if you are in the U.S.! If you are international, please contact us and we can calculate your exact shipping price. So you don't pay more than you need to for shipping.

Does Wear One, Share One apply to the jacket and the backpack?
Yes! Every product we offer is accompanied by a donated product. If you purchase a jacket, one will be given to a kid in need. If you purchase a backpack, one will also be given to a kid in need.

How is the non-profit ally selected for my donated jacket?
We always work with the non-profit ally that is closest to where your jacket was delivered. They must also work directly with kids that are in need of resources.

Does it cost anything to be a non-profit ally?
Nope! We have made the donation process easy and seamless for our allies because we know they already work too hard and we want to get the jackets in the hands of the kids that need them as quickly as possible. If you’re a 501(c)(3) and you want to become a non-profit ally in the E&S network, please call (800) 265-0235 or email ali@eandsoutdoor.com.

Can I choose a non-profit agency to donate through?
Probably! We can work with any IRS recognized 501(c)(3) in the USA. If you want to designate an agency to distribute your donation, please leave us a note with the name of the organization during checkout or forward a copy of your sales receipt to support@eandsoutdoor.com with the name and location of the organization you want to be donated though. Please make sure that the organization of your choice works with kids in need.

Can I donate a jacket to a specific kid?
Anything is possible, but we do try to avoid this as it can get very complicated. If this is an issue for you, we suggest you contact us via email at support@eandsoutdoor.com.

Is my purchase or donation tax deductible?
Unfortunately, not at this time.

Will I be notified when my donated jacket is delivered to a kid in my community?
Yes! We will let you know that your donation has been redeemed, where it was redeemed, and by whom (first name only). Please keep in mind that the privacy of our customers and gift recipients is incredibly important to us, so we won’t give out any identifying information.

Can I track my delivery status?
We will be updating our backers regularly during production, and we will send out tracking information once we fulfill orders.

Do you offer a group discount or business discount?
We do have a B2B program for community-driven businesses that want to support kids and families in their communities. Please contact info@eandsoutdoor.com for more information.

What does “Northward” mean?
Northward is another name for the Spring or vernal equinox.

When can I expect to receive my Northward jacket?
For those who purchased their first product through Indiegogo, you will receive your jacket in September 2018! Our goal is to be ready for back-to-school and to have jackets in the hands of the kids before the changing of the season. Believe us, it will be worth the wait!

Are the jackets waterproof?
The Northward jacket is water-resistant, not waterproof.

  • Waterproof = Impervious to water in almost all volumes.
  • Water-resistant = is able to provide protection from water in smaller volumes.

What colors do the jackets come in? 
Right now, they come in navy blue and brick red. We are hoping to offer a third option during the campaign if everything goes great! Stay tuned!

Are the jackets unisex or do they come in women's cuts?
The jackets are unisex and look great on both men and women!

What sizes do the jackets come in?
They come in sizes XS to XXL. There is a sizing chart above with exact measurements so you can pick the best fit!

When do I choose my size and color of my jacket?
At the end of the campaign, we will reach out to you to make sure we get your color and size.

What is the Nascent backpack?
The Nascent backpack is an exclusive product for this Indiegogo campaign. We are delivering product during back-to-school, so wanted to provide that extra resource for kids in need. 

How many colors does the Nascent backpack come in?
We are only offering it in one color, which is heather gray. If you need a backpack in the future and want to continue to make a positive impact in the lives of kids, we encourage you to check out State Bags in Brooklyn, NY (www.statebags.com).

If I purchased the backpack/jacket combo, will I receive them at the same time?
Yes, you will! Expect delivery in early September 2018.

Can I return or exchange the product after the purchase?
If you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, you will have 30 calendar days to return or exchange it from the date you received it. If you found defects in material and workmanship, please contact support@eandsoutdoor.com.

I love this campaign! What can I do to help?!
We are so excited that you are excited! One of the biggest ways you can help is to spread the word about our campaign so we can help as many kids as possible! Please tweet, Facebook, Instagram, call or semaphore your friends and family to purchase and share!

-----------------------------

Special Thanks to:

Photography by The Crystal Image, Crystal McWhirt, photographer – Instagram @tcistudio – www.tcistudio.com

Models:

Madeline Birdashaw – Instagram @maddiebirdashaw
Josiah Moreno – Snapchat @lordcameldeer
Madyson Summers – Instagram @madsums99
Derrick Hurst -Twitter @DerrickLHurst 

Videography:
Alex Bentzinger – Instagram @alex_bentzinger – www.alexbentzinger.com

Actors:
Mark – Eliseo Arreola – Instagram @eliseoarr

Mikayla – Hadley Studer – Instagram @hadleystuderr

Mikayla’s Mom – Kim Struder – Instagram @kimberly_studer

Communities in Schools Spokesperson:
Malissa Martin – http://cismidamerica.org/

Our Indiegogo Campaign allies:

BBBS of Northern Wisconsin: http://bbbsnew.org
BBBS of Greater KC: https://www.bbbskc.org
BBBS of Northern Nevada: http://www.bbbsnn.org
BBBS of Greater Wyoming www.wyobbbs.org
Boys & Girls Club of Greater Ventura: http://bgclubventura.org
Boys & Girls Club of Rochester: https://www.bgcrochester.org
CIS of Jacksonville: http://cisjax.org
CIS of Mid America: http://cismidamerica.org

story:
Anywhere Tools is a major addition to Keyport's modular everyday carry system by introducing a series of new tech and tool modules along with another way to carry them - the Anywhere Pocket Clip. The Pocket Clip and improved modular stacking system gives you a whole new array of carry options for Keyport Modules in addition to attaching them to the Keyport Pivot and Keyport Slide 3.0. The Keyport system is the most advanced EDC solution available because of its one-of-a-kind modularity, its broad range of customization choices, and its wide variety of carry options.

Anywhere Tools are part of a system designed upon the principals of  convenience, utility, and style. Our goal is to transform your everyday carry from a bulky, oddly shaped, noisy assemblage of things you always haul around with you to a fully customized set of tools and tech that accompany you on all of your adventures without getting in the way.

Modular - Take only the items you want with you. No need to schlep a bulky, jingly jangly, pocket full of keys and other oddly shaped personal items alongside a fixed tool with several implements you will rarely, if ever, use.

Stackable - Several of the modules are stackable (we call them mid-modules) meaning you can carry more than one together on a single pocket clip. Both the MOCA II and the NEBA Knife Modules are mid-modules which allows other modules to be stacked on top of them. Mid-modules are easily identified by their machined aluminum scales with the three square holes. The Pocket Flare Mini-Flashlight and WeeLINK Cable Charger are outer modules, which means that they can stack on top of a mid-module but cannot be stacked upon as they form the top or outer most layer.

Stylish - Anywhere Tools provide a cleaner, more personalized, minimalist approach to your everyday carry.

Keyport Compatible - All of the modules in this campaign are compatible with both the Keyport Slide 3.0 (sold separately) and the Keyport Pivot. Equal parts modular key organizer + custom multi-tool + exclusive lost & found recovery service all-in-one, Keyport devices complete the ultimate fully customizable everyday carry system.

Think of it as a sophisticated alternative to Batman's utility belt... minus the extra 10 pounds, the shiny yellow belt, and the need to wear tights to pull off that whole look.

Integrated Your Valuable Feedback  Like our previous Kickstarter campaigns, we have integrated a great deal of your feedback from our initial set of tools along with feedback on other products in the marketplace to make our latest products stronger, more versatile, and more useful.

Constructed of one piece hardened spring steel, the Anywhere Pocket Clip uses the same cutting-edge modular attachment feature as the Keyport Pivot and Slide 3.0.  The unique no-fastener design allows you to attach and detach modules in a literal snap. It can also be used as a money clip. All modules that fit the Pivot and Slide 3.0 are compatible with the Pocket Clip.

MOCA™ II Module

Designed especially with Slide owners in mind, the MOCA II (11-In-1) is an update on our MOCA 10-In-1 Multi-Tool. We have updated the design to feature a unique stowage latch, a 180 degree stop, and refined the tip to include both a Phillips and a flathead screwdriver, along with an improved cord cutter that slices through boxes, cords, and nearly anything else with ease. The MOCA II is a mid-module, so you can stack other modules or Side Plates on top of the scale for extra comfort and personalization.

Tools included: Bottle Opener • Flathead Screwdriver • Phillips Head Screwdriver • Cord Cutter • Box Opener • Scoring Tool • Hex Bit Driver • 1/4 inch Wrench • 5/16 inch Wrench • 3/8 inch Wrench • 1 inch Ruler + 1 cm Ruler

NEBA Knife™ Module

Named in honor of our fallen team member, Nebiyu Detti, this high quality edc pocketknife carries on his name and spirit. Whenever anyone needed a little help, Neb was always there with his signature slogan, "I got you." The NEBA Knife continues in this tradition with a stylish, beefier pocketknife that will serve you well in a pinch. The slip-joint knife features a 2" clip point blade and an improved spring mechanism with a half stop and jimping for extra grip. With the Pocket Clip attached it is very comfortable to hold with no unpleasant hot spots. The NEBA Knife is also a mid-module, so you can stack other modules or Side Plates on top of it.

 

Pocket Flare™ Module

An upgrade from our base mini-flashlight unit, the Pocket Flare is over two times brighter (27 lumens vs. 12 lumens max output) and features lamp mode, a lantern-style light around the entire base of the module to cast a wider light than that of the front beam. We also replaced the slider button with a push button. The Pocket Flare is rechargeable via USB micro, displaying red during charge mode and green when fully charged.

WeeLINK™ Charger Cable Module

Everyone these days appears to be carrying multiple charger cables stuffed in their backpack, purse, or even pocket. Yet, as the old saying goes, it feels like there is never one around when you need it most. Enter the WeeLink Charger Cable Module. Available in USB to Micro USB, USB to Lightning, and USB to USB-C, WeeLINK charger cables are easily accessible to keep all of your most important devices powered up.

 

ParaPull

Alongside the Anywhere Pocket Clip, we designed two products that work in concert to complement the system.

The ParaPull is a short paracord zipper pull style lanyard that makes it easy to pull your Pocket Clip out when you need to get a handle on it.  The ParaPull works equally well connecting loose items to either a Pivot or a Slide.

 

RuSH Multi-Purpose Tool

Remove / Screw / Hang - The RuSH Multi-Purpose Tool makes removing modules, particularly stacked modules, a piece of cake. The RuSH Tool doubles as a suspension clip and features a bottle opener and flathead screwdriver to tighten / loosen the Pivot screw. In addition, the RuSH Tool can be stowed in a Pivot without having to disassemble it.

 

We are going to use BackerKit to administrate the fulfillment process after the campaign. Once we migrate to BackerKit, we will send you out a survey that will help us to review and break down your pledge into the specific rewards you ordered along with their associated costs.

  • April & May - Integrate consumer feedback, finalize design for manufacturing, finalize quotes (4 weeks)
  • May 20 thru 31 - Place tooling and production p.o.’s
  • June & July - Complete production tooling, first shots (8 weeks)
  • August - Initiate pilot runs of each product, initial beta testing, assuming production tweaks are minor, move ahead with production runs (4 weeks)
  • September - Production runs (6 weeks)
  • October - Final QC, package, and ship to backers (2 weeks)
  • October 31 - Complete fulfillment to all Kickstarter backers
  • November - Complete fulfillment to all Indiegogo backers

Because of the large number of independent items in production at the same time (6), we will fulfill each order as soon as all of those products for that particular order have been received, tested, and packaged.

Unless we encounter an unforeseen issue which delays one or more products more than four weeks from the estimated end of the campaign, we will not be splitting shipments.

 

Join our VIP Email List

At Keyport, we think of our supporters as extended members of our team, and we want to hear from you.

Please make sure to sign up for our VIP email list which includes giveaways, discounts, and access to limited edition runs.

Follow Us and Help Spread the Word on Social Media
story_txt:
Anywhere Tools is a major addition to Keyport's modular everyday carry system by introducing a series of new tech and tool modules along with another way to carry them - the Anywhere Pocket Clip. The Pocket Clip and improved modular stacking system gives you a whole new array of carry options for Keyport Modules in addition to attaching them to the Keyport Pivot and Keyport Slide 3.0. The Keyport system is the most advanced EDC solution available because of its one-of-a-kind modularity, its broad range of customization choices, and its wide variety of carry options.Anywhere Tools are part of a system designed upon the principals of  convenience, utility, and style. Our goal is to transform your everyday carry from a bulky, oddly shaped, noisy assemblage of things you always haul around with you to a fully customized set of tools and tech that accompany you on all of your adventures without getting in the way.Modular - Take only the items you want with you. No need to schlep a bulky, jingly jangly, pocket full of keys and other oddly shaped personal items alongside a fixed tool with several implements you will rarely, if ever, use.Stackable - Several of the modules are stackable (we call them mid-modules) meaning you can carry more than one together on a single pocket clip. Both the MOCA II and the NEBA Knife Modules are mid-modules which allows other modules to be stacked on top of them. Mid-modules are easily identified by their machined aluminum scales with the three square holes. The Pocket Flare Mini-Flashlight and WeeLINK Cable Charger are outer modules, which means that they can stack on top of a mid-module but cannot be stacked upon as they form the top or outer most layer.Easily stack Modules w/our no-fastener system - Anywhere Pocket Clip + NEBA Knife + WeeLINK Cable Charger Module = Custom Wearable Multi-Tool
Quick and Easy On / Off - Modules are easily added or removed from the Pocket Clip, Pivot or Slide with our RuSH Module Removal Tool or a heavy-duty paperclip, pen, or other device with a simple point.Removing modules is a snap with the RuSH Module Removal Tool
Wide Range of Uses - There are so many ways to carry Anywhere Tools... on a pocket clip, on multiple pocket clips, dangling from a carabiner, on a keychain, on a backpack, on a purse, with a Keyport Pivot, or with a Keyport Slide 3.0.Stylish - Anywhere Tools provide a cleaner, more personalized, minimalist approach to your everyday carry.Keyport Compatible - All of the modules in this campaign are compatible with both the Keyport Slide 3.0 (sold separately) and the Keyport Pivot. Equal parts modular key organizer + custom multi-tool + exclusive lost & found recovery service all-in-one, Keyport devices complete the ultimate fully customizable everyday carry system.Anywhere Tech and Tool Modules are also compatible with the Keyport Slide 3.0 & Keyport Pivot (sold separately)
