story:
VienneMilano Luxury Hosiery is the first luxury hosiery brand dedicated to thigh-high stockings. We started in 2011 with a dream: to reintroduce luxury hosiery to the USA to help every woman feel and be fabulous.

In the past few years, we have learned many lessons. We came to the hosiery industry as outsiders, but with great passion and lots of work, we now know the trade: from where to source the best materials, yarns, lace, silicone bands, etc., to which manufacturers can deliver great quality, to how to design fabulous packaging. We are tested and ready.

Now we have come to Indiegogo to seek your help for the big push forward! By backing our campaign, you will empower VienneMilano to offer many more designs, styles and colors; to manufacture the Basics Collection, more affordable for everyday use; to develop color-calibrated photography which reveals just how each piece and color contribute to every woman's beauty, regardless of her skin tone; will publish a style guide; and so much more. And most importantly, you will do your part to help every woman feel and be fabulous.


Thigh-high stockings or simply thigh highs are hosiery pieces held in place by a band. Unlike grandma's pantyhose, thigh highs go up to the thigh, not to the waist.

1. So Sexy.Your legs will look fabulous, and you will feel and be fabulous. And one more secret: with thigh highs, your butt will never look flat.

2. Stay Up, Always. Bands are laced with silicone, not elastics: they will stay up, always, and give you great freedom of movement, all day, and all night.

3. Highest Quality. Hand-crafted in Italy using premium materials: yarns, laces, silicone, etc. Hypo-allergenic, very durable, yet quite affordable.

4. Many Options. With many styles, colors, and thicknesses, you will always find a pair that suits the occasion, time of day (and night!) or weather.

5. Fab Gift Box. First impressions do matter: be it a gift for yourself or your beloved, you totally need a fabulous gift box. We got you covered.

We have fabulous perks available for you, and with VienneMilano thigh highs, you (or your beloved) will look fabulous. But there is more: you will also do good, and feel good about it, by helping us support underprivileged women and spreading the conversation on women equality. Here's how:

As a backer, you will receive two of our "Every Woman is Fabulous" Pin with every perk. One for you, one to give. Wearing the pin will show your support for equality and empowerment. It will be a great conversation starter for that very important conversation we should all be having.





Vienne Cheung
Founder

Vienne followed her passion for fashion and travel to... fine hosiery. For years, she traveled the world seeking the best fashion and accessories. In Milano, Italy she fell in love with premium hosiery, then unavailable in the US. The rest is history: she left her cushy corporate job, and plunged her soul (and legs!) into VienneMilano.

Filippo Beretta
Bald Finance Guy

Serial entrepreneur and independent professional, with a passion for bringing new (business) stories to life. Throughout his career, Filippo has contributed to the startup of a few tech ventures, and has advised dozens more as the co-founder of a well-recognized professional services firm.

Jerrica Tan
Awesome Ops Lady

An engineer by training and entrepreneur by passion, with diverse experiences in specialty products, market access, and supply chain operations. With a keen eye for detail, she combines her engineering background with business acumen to make sure everything in our supply chain just works, every time.

Rafael Sanches
Silicon Valley Star

Rafael is a hard-core software engineer and inspired marketer, who uses his passion for technology to create thoughtful, beautiful user experiences in the consumer space. Over the years, Rafael has build extremely successful mobile apps in the consumer space, with millions of users.

Ludovico Cafarelli
Bearded IT Man

Some say “Italians do IT better”. Ludovico is a natural born geek. During his career (over 20 years under his quite sizable belt) he has become an accomplished software developer and a master of mobile and web tech. He commandeers a flotilla of buccaneer developers. $Pirate.GetTreasure();

Samuel Vartan
Fashionista

Samuel Vartan is a world-renowned fashion designer. His designs and aesthetics are influenced by Art Deco and actresses from the 1950s and 1960s. The overall goals of his collections are to respect women and their bodies and to embody effortless, flowing elegance.

Samantha Shih
Fashionista

Our resident menswear expert, because hosiery is much loved by men, too (oh yeah!) Samantha is the founder of 9tailors, a custom clothing company focused on hand-made premium formal menswear. She knows and cares about superb design, beautiful fabrics, great craftmanship, and exceptional service. 

Ray Anderson
Fashionista and Photographer

Ray is a world-famous fashion photographer who has worked for major brands such as Hermes, Kenzo, Celine as well as up and coming ones such as TCA Mens Couture, Talisa Qi, and Roksanda. Ray intends to reveal VienneMilano's elegant, playful, and sexy spirit with shoots across Italy and major US cities.

Rugby
Wise Guy




What are Thigh Highs? 

"Thigh-High Stockings" or simply "Thigh Highs", and for those across the pond simply "Stockings" or sometimes "Stay Ups",  are hosiery pieces held in place by a band. Unlike grandma's pantyhose, thigh highs go up to the thigh, not to the waist. 

How are the Permanent, Signature, and Basics Collections Different?

VienneMilano's Permanent Collection includes pieces (currently six) which have consistently been our customers' favorites and our best sellers. Permanent Collection pieces are available every year, in every season, and are normally priced at $29.95 per pair. (You can get 50% off or more by pre-ordering during this Indiegogo campaign, check out the Perks.) 

Every year, VienneMilano presents a Signature Collection: a few more fashion-forward, eccentric, and often colorful pieces. Signature Collection pieces are normally one-offs (buy them before they are gone!) and priced from $29.95 up to  $69.95 or more for paticularly elaborate pieces, such as our Limited Edition Ottavia Lace from the Signature 2011 Collection.

Should we reach the $40K stretch goal, VienneMilano will also design and produce a Basics Collection: very good quality pieces, for everyday use by every woman, at a very affordable price. Our initial target is to offer two pieces (one black, one nude) at $9.95 per pair. The Basics Collection pieces may have smaller lace on the bands and use forego some of the embellishments, but will still feature all the details (silicone bands, premium yarns, etc.) that make VienneMilano fabulous.

Why are VienneMilano Stockings Made in Italy?

VienneMilano is a small American business, so our natural inclination would be to source our products in the USA. However, for hosiery and indeed all things fashion, Italy is the world's capital: the best materials, the finest craftsmanship, and the greatest experience is there. And we want to bring the best to our customers, without compromise or borders. Plus, Italy is forever romantic and oh-so-fabulous! You can join us there with the Fashionista: Fly to Italy perk. 

Why Thigh Highs Are Much Better than Pantyhose?

Compared to pantyhose, thigh highs are much more comfortable, more fitted, more sanitary, and obviously much sexier. Thigh highs go up to the thigh, not to the waist: as such, they do not flatten your curves under fitted skirts, dresses or pants. Furthermore, thigh highs allow you to choose whether to hide, reveal, or hint at their lacy band. You are in control, and will feel fabulous in every occasion.

Do Thigh Highs Need a Garter Belt?

No. VienneMilano stockings feature silicone bands that will hold them in place without the need of a garter belt. But of course, if you wish to create a more alluring and intimate style, you can certainly add a garter belt. The garter will not be needed to help with VienneMilano stockings, but who knows, it may help with love!


Why the Silicone Band?

Some low-quality thigh highs use elastics and have a tendency to fall down at the most inopportune moment... Not so with VienneMilano: our thigh highs are securely held in place by silicone bands. When worn properly all the way up to the upper thigh, VienneMilano stockings will stay up, all day, and all night.

Are VienneMilano Stockings Really Hypo-Allergenic?

Yes. We have selected some of the very best manufacturers in the industry, and their production process is state-of-the-art. For the technically inclined, our bands are covered by the OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certificate and comply with the very strict Registration, Evaluation, Authorization and Restriction of Chemicals (REACH) legislation (XVII) of the European Union.

How is VienneMilano's Gift Box Totally Fabulous?

Because it totally is! But don't take our word for it... take a look at this Unboxing Video created by one of our fans.


What Can I Wear Thigh Highs With?

VienneMilano hosiery can enhance just about any outfit, be it casual, formal, or fun. Try wearing thigh highs with a dress or a skirt suit, and you may fall in love. Try wearing them with lingerie or ... nothing, and that special someone will definitely fall in love, too. 

Also, when we reach the $130K stretch goal, our founder Vienne will start penning a fabulous style guide, which will be published in both hard-cover paper and digital editions, and will showcase many fashion-forward, creative ways to add a little VienneMilano fabulous sass to your outfits.


Can I Wear Thigh Highs with Pants?

Of course! Thigh highs under pants can be a little secret: they will keep you warmer in the winter, help you show off your curves under skinny pants, and make for a very nice, unexpected surprise for that special someone.

Which Shoes Look Best with Thigh Highs?

In general we suggest pairing thigh highs with closed-toe shoes. However, some of our hosiery is designed with an invisible toe, and will work with your favorite open-toe shoes. By backing our campaign (especially if you select the  Become a Designer, Fashionista: Fly to Boston, and Fashionista: Fly to Italy) you can help us design hosiery just like you want it, including more pieces with invisible toe.

How to Take Care of Thigh Highs?

Always be gentle when putting on or taking off your thigh highs. Removing any jewelry which can get in the way and making sure your finger and toe nails are smooth (treat yourself to that mani/pedi...) will also protect your thigh-high stockings from runs and holes. You can also increase the life of your hosiery by storing it properly (for example, in our VienneMilano's Fab Gift Box).

How to Wash Thigh Highs?

Cheap hosiery is a disposable, one-night-stand affair. Bad for the environment, bad for your legs. Instead, VienneMilano stockings are durable and can be washed and reused many times.

Gently wash your VienneMilano hosiery either by hand (recommended) or in the washing machine in a garment bag. If by hand, soak in mildly soap, lukewarm water, then rinse until you have removed any soap. If with the washing machine, use the delicate setting with cold water only. 

After washing, lay thigh highs flat (on a towel, for example) to air dry. Do not hang your thigh highs, and whatever you do, never tumble dry, ever.

Oh! They Ripped. Now What?

Only true love can last forever, but VienneMilano thigh highs can last a very long time, especially if properly care for. That said, bad luck happens and all thigh highs may rip. When it's time, it's time: buy another pair or two! 

If you kept reading this far, you really love all the details. We love you too.


How to Choose Style(s) and Size on Pre-Orders?

In August, upon receipt of the products from our manufacturers in Italy, all backers who pre-ordered hosiery will receive via email (at the email address used to participate in the Indiegogo campaign) a link to select their style(s) and size, update their mailing address if necessary, and dispatch their pre-order, and more.

When Will Pre-Orders Ship?

Upon completion of the Indiegogo campaign, we will work with you (especially if you have chosen the Become a Designer perk) to finalize the design for VienneMilano's 2016 Signature Collection. We then expect to place orders in late May and to receive products by late July. We then expect to ship pre-orders placed during the initial campaign (i.e. by May 7, 2016) before the end of August and pre-orders placed during the InDemand period (i.e. on or after May 8, 2016) by the end of September 2016.

Will Pre-Orders Ship Free?

Yes, if your selected delivery address is within the USA. For deliveries to the EU, we charge a flat fee of $10 per delivery. For deliveries to the rest of the world, we charge a flat fee of $30 per delivery. Should we reach the Loving Europe stretch goal, we will rebate the delivery fee to the EU down to zero and offer free shipping to both the USA and EU.

Will Pre-Orders Ship Worldwide?

Yes. All orders to the US and EU will ship DDP (Delivered Duty Paid), i.e. to your doorstep. All other international orders will ship DDU (Delivered Duty Unpaid.) This means that we are responsible for shipping charges and insurance up to the agreed-upon destination. You are instead responsible for additional local transportation (if needed) beyond the port-of-entry and for all local custom clearance, customs tariffs, duties, and fees, and similar.

Will You Accept Returns on Pre-Orders?

No. Our manufacturing run will be based on the results of the Indiegogo campaign, and all pre-orders and perk purchases are considered final and non-refundable. But they make for fabulous gifts!

What is Ottavia Lace?

Ottavia Lace is a vintage piece from VienneMilano's first Signature Collection, initially presented in 2011. Our supplies of Ottavia are now extremely limited, and we are offering them as a treat for our Indiegogo backers.

Ottavia is a very unique piece, a truly luxurious product for the most special of occasions. Hosiery is normally woven out of artificial fibers such as spandex and nylon on circular knitting machines. Instead, Ottavia is entirely made of the finest hand-stitched, rolled, cotton Italian lace, from toe to thigh. You can see some photos of our models with Ottavia in the Gallery.

What is the Deal for Fashionista: Fly to Boston?

With the Fashionista: Fly to Boston, you will acquire the opportunity to collaborate with our founder Vienne and with our fashionistas to design and name some of the pieces in our 2017 Signature Collection. We will fly you to Boston (from anywhere in the world) for a three-day design workshop, which we expect to take place in late October or early November 2016. We will also host you in a lovely, luxury  accommodation for two nights.

Here's a few extra things to keep in mind: 1) We will pay for one ticket, in economy class, using a major airline of our choice. If you wish to fly business or first class, or bring a friend or significant other, or use another airline of your preference, you will have to pay for the extra costs yourself. 2) If you will be flying in from outside the USA, you will be responsible for complying with US immigration law. We cannot and will not offer legal advice on how to pursue a US visa. 3) We will do our best to accommodate everyone's schedule with ample advance notice. However, should you be unable to participate in the workshop due to scheduling issues, immigration issues, or other reasons, the perk purchase is non-refundable. 

What is the Deal for Fashionista: Fly to Italy?

With the Fashionista: Fly to Italy, you will acquire the opportunity to collaborate with our founder Vienne and with our fashionistas to design and name some of the pieces in our 2017 Signature Collection. We will fly you to Milan, Italy (from anywhere in the world) for a four-day stay, including a two-day design workshop and a visit to our manufacturers. We expect the trip to take place in the late Spring of 2017, tentatively in April or May 2017. We will also host you in a lovely, luxury accommodation for three nights.

Here's a few extra things to keep in mind: 1) We will pay for one ticket, in economy class, using a major airline of our choice. If you wish to fly business or first class, or bring a friend or significant other, or use another airline of your preference, you will have to pay for the extra costs yourself. 2) If you will be flying in from outside the EU, you will be responsible for complying with European immigration law. We cannot and will not offer legal advice on how to pursue a Shenghen visa. 3) We will do our best to accommodate everyone's schedule with ample advance notice. However, should you be unable to participate in the workshop due to scheduling issues, immigration issues, or other reasons, the perk purchase is non-refundable. 



$30K: Start Goal

VienneMilano will co-design its upcoming Signature Collection together with backers, and offer a total of 12 new pieces: 6 in the Permanent Collection and 6 in the 2016 Signature Collection. VienneMilano will also deploy a new and much improved web store, featuring a new e-commerce engine and a beautiful "Web 3.0" responsive template. VienneMilano will also completely revamp its imagery with the help of Ray Anderson and other super talented fashion photographers. And most importantly, VienneMilano will help every woman feel and be fabulous.


$40K: Basics Collection

VienneMilano will design and manufacture a new Basics Collection: very good quality pieces, for everyday use by every woman, at a very affordable price. Our initial target will be to offer two pieces (one black, one nude) at a target price of $9.95 per pair. The Basics Collection pieces may have smaller lace on the bands and use forego some of the embellishments, but will still feature all the details (silicone bands, premium yarns, etc.) that make VienneMilano fabulous.


$50K: Expanded 2016 Collection

VienneMilano will expand its 2016 Signature Collection to include 3 more pieces, also co-designed with our backers, for a total of 9 Signature Collection pieces.


$70K: Super Expanded 2016 Collection

VienneMilano will expand its 2016 Signature Collection to include 3 more pieces, also co-designed with our backers, for a total of 12 Signature Collection pieces.


$90K: Color Matching

VienneMilano will use advanced color calibration and will shoot photography with multiple models for every piece, with the purpose of showcasing just how each piece and color can uniquely enhance each woman's legs based on her skin tone.


$100K: Fashion Show Party

VienneMilano will throw a fabulous Fashion Show Party in November 2016 in Boston, to celebrate the success of our Indiegogo campaign and our love for our backers and for every woman. For reference, our Launch Party in November 2011 was held at the InterContinental Boston and was a 500+ people affair with Hollywood Stars, Diplomats, many models, great music, and lots of fun. We could not make this without you: that is why every backer will get a free ticket and you are all invited.


$130K: Vienne's Fab Guide

Our founder Vienne will collaborate with VienneMilano's fashionistas to write a style guide showcasing how every woman can feel and be fabulous with great hosiery, through many detailed outfits, for many different occasions. VienneMilano will publish Vienne's Fab Guide in both hard-cover and digital formats, and every backer will receive a free digital copy.


$200K: Loving Europe

VienneMilano will setup a distribution center in Europe, and will be able to offer fast, free shipping to all customers in the European Union, just like we presently do for customers located in the USA. London, Paris, Milan, here we come!
story_txt:
VienneMilano Luxury Hosiery is the first luxury hosiery brand dedicated to thigh-high stockings. We started in 2011 with a dream: to reintroduce luxury hosiery to the USA to help every woman feel and be fabulous.
In the past few years, we have learned many lessons. We came to the hosiery industry as outsiders, but with great passion and lots of work, we now know the trade: from where to source the best materials, yarns, lace, silicone bands, etc., to which manufacturers can deliver great quality, to how to design fabulous packaging. We are tested and ready.



Now we have come to Indiegogo to seek your help for the big push forward! By backing our campaign, you will empower VienneMilano to offer many more designs, styles and colors; to manufacture the Basics Collection, more affordable for everyday use; to develop color-calibrated photography which reveals just how each piece and color contribute to every woman's beauty, regardless of her skin tone; will publish a style guide; and so much more. And most importantly, you will do your part to help every woman feel and be fabulous.





Thigh-high stockings or simply thigh highs are hosiery pieces held in place by a band. Unlike grandma's pantyhose, thigh highs go up to the thigh, not to the waist.







1. So Sexy.Your legs will look fabulous, and you will feel and be fabulous. And one more secret: with thigh highs, your butt will never look flat.







2. Stay Up, Always. Bands are laced with silicone, not elastics: they will stay up, always, and give you great freedom of movement, all day, and all night.







3. Highest Quality. Hand-crafted in Italy using premium materials: yarns, laces, silicone, etc. Hypo-allergenic, very durable, yet quite affordable.







4. Many Options. With many styles, colors, and thicknesses, you will always find a pair that suits the occasion, time of day (and night!) or weather.







5. Fab Gift Box. First impressions do matter: be it a gift for yourself or your beloved, you totally need a fabulous gift box. We got you covered.







We have fabulous perks available for you, and with VienneMilano thigh highs, you (or your beloved) will look fabulous. But there is more: you  will also do good, and feel good about it, by helping us support 
underprivileged women and spreading the conversation on women equality. 
Here's how:





As a backer, you will receive two of our "Every Woman is Fabulous" Pin with every perk. One for you, one to give. Wearing the pin will show your support for equality and empowerment. It will be a great conversation starter for that very important conversation we should all be having.













































Vienne CheungFounder
Vienne followed her passion for fashion and travel to... fine 
hosiery. For years, she traveled the world seeking the best fashion and 
accessories. In Milano, Italy she fell in love with premium hosiery, 
then unavailable in the US. The rest is history: she left her cushy corporate job, and plunged her soul (and legs!) into VienneMilano.

bringing new (business) stories to life. Throughout his career, Filippo 
has contributed to the startup of a few tech ventures, and has advised 
dozens more as the co-founder of a well-recognized professional services
 firm.

operations. With a keen eye for detail, she combines her engineering 
background with business acumen to make sure everything in our supply chain just works, every time.

Rafael is a hard-core software engineer and inspired marketer, who uses his passion for technology to create thoughtful, beautiful user experiences in the consumer space. Over the years, Rafael has build 
extremely successful mobile apps in the consumer space, with millions of
 users.

become an accomplished software developer and a master of mobile and web
 tech. He commandeers a flotilla of buccaneer developers. $Pirate.GetTreasure();

cares about superb design, beautiful fabrics, great craftmanship, and 
exceptional service.

VienneMilano's elegant, playful, and sexy spirit with shoots across 
Italy and major US cities.

What are Thigh Highs? 
"Thigh-High Stockings" or simply "Thigh Highs", and for those across the pond simply "Stockings" or sometimes "Stay Ups",  are hosiery pieces held in place by a band. Unlike grandma's pantyhose, thigh highs go up to the thigh, not to the waist. 
How are the Permanent, Signature, and Basics Collections Different?
VienneMilano's Permanent Collection includes pieces (currently six) which have consistently been our customers' favorites and our best sellers. Permanent Collection pieces are available every year, in every season, and are normally priced at $29.95 per pair. (You can get 50% off or more by pre-ordering during this Indiegogo campaign, check out the Perks.) 
Every year, VienneMilano presents a Signature Collection: a few more fashion-forward, eccentric, and often colorful pieces. Signature Collection pieces are normally one-offs (buy them before they are gone!) and priced from $29.95 up to  $69.95 or more for paticularly elaborate pieces, such as our Limited Edition Ottavia Lace from the Signature 2011 Collection.
Should we reach the $40K stretch goal, VienneMilano will also design and produce a Basics Collection: very good quality pieces, for everyday use by every woman, at a very 
affordable price. Our initial target is to offer two pieces (one 
black, one nude) at $9.95 per pair. The Basics 
Collection pieces may have smaller lace on the bands and use forego some
 of the embellishments, but will still feature all the details (silicone
 bands, premium yarns, etc.) that make VienneMilano fabulous. 
Why are VienneMilano Stockings Made in Italy?
VienneMilano is a small American business, so our natural inclination would be to source our products in the USA. However, for hosiery and indeed all things fashion, Italy is the world's capital: the best materials, the finest craftsmanship, and the greatest experience is there. And we want to bring the best to our customers, without compromise or borders. Plus, Italy is forever romantic and oh-so-fabulous! You can join us there with the Fashionista: Fly to Italy perk. 
Why Thigh Highs Are Much Better than Pantyhose?
Compared to pantyhose, thigh highs are much more comfortable, more fitted, more sanitary, and obviously much sexier. Thigh highs go up to the thigh, not to the waist: as such, they do not flatten your curves under fitted skirts, dresses or pants. Furthermore, thigh highs allow you to choose whether to hide, reveal, or hint at their lacy band. You are in control, and will feel fabulous in every occasion.
Do Thigh Highs Need a Garter Belt?
No. VienneMilano stockings feature silicone bands that will hold them in place without the need of a garter belt. But of course, if you wish to create a more alluring and intimate style, you can certainly add a garter belt. The garter will not be needed to help with VienneMilano stockings, but who knows, it may help with love!




Why the Silicone Band?
Some low-quality thigh highs use elastics and have a tendency to fall down at the most inopportune moment... Not so with VienneMilano: our thigh highs are securely held in place by silicone bands. When worn properly all the way up to the upper thigh, VienneMilano stockings will stay up, all day, and all night.

Are VienneMilano Stockings Really Hypo-Allergenic?
Yes. We have selected some of the very best manufacturers in the industry, and their production process is state-of-the-art. For the technically inclined, our bands are covered by the OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certificate and comply with the very strict Registration, Evaluation, Authorization and Restriction of Chemicals (REACH) legislation (XVII) of the European Union.

story:
Nowadays, the cost of watch production is becoming increasingly more and more expensive. Furthermore, when watches are shipped to retail stores, the price is often marked up to 10 times (or even more for well known brands) of the production cost. It is becoming increasingly difficult to find a quality wrist watch for a reasonable price. Our objective at Preciso was to create a stylish, versatile, high quality and affordable timepiece for everyday wear - for the everyday man. Our answer? Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch.



There were 3 main goals Preciso wanted to achieve in our new watch:

1. Style – a classic style integrated with modern design elements. The Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch is designed to be super slim - suitable for everyday wear. The clean minimalistic watch face is a bow to modernity.

2. Quality – Preciso watches are not to be merely refined and elegant, but also robust and durable. Preciso has carefully selected the materials required for the Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch. The watch features premium components including SWISS MADE movement, surgical grade stainless steel and sapphire crystal.

3. Affordable Price – at Preciso, we want quality watches to be at an affordable price. We deal with the suppliers directly. No agents or middle men means we can pass on the savings to our customers. The kickstarter prices for the Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch is less than 200 USD.

Case Body: 316L surgical grade Stainless Steel with 2 tone finishing (polish and brush). The diameter of the case is 39 mm, and the total thickness is only 6.65 mm

Crown: 316L stainless steel with engraved Preciso logo

Movement: Swiss made Ronda 6004.D 5 jewels movement, it has small seconds dial at the 6 o’clock position and date function at the 3 o’clock position, with EOL (End of Life) function

Hands: Diamond Cut steel colour hour and minute hands, and metallic blue colour small second hand

Dial: White/Black enamel 2 layers dial with simple minute tracks. Excellent material to give a timeless look to the watch

Strap: 20mm width Genuine cow skin leather with stainless steel buckle. Black and brown leather straps versions are available

Steel Band: Solid dual tone polished stainless steel band, with push release button deployment clasp

Crystal: Scratch resistant Sapphire Crystal

Water Resistant: 50 metres

Case Back: Stainless steel with engraved Preciso logo

Battery Life: 2 years


White Dial Version


Black Dial Version


Preciso Watch is developing stainless steel band version, and we need your support in Indiegogo to complete our first order.  This is a solid dual tone polished stainless steel band, with push release button deployment clasp.  Solid stainless steel band has better appearance, and more durable compare with metal folded band.  Backers can choose this version and our limited Black Steel Version, currently only available in Indiegogo.

Stainless Steel Band Version


Stainless Steel Band In Polished and Brushed Finishing

Deployment Clasp With Push Release Button 

Black Steel Version

We completed our first batch of orders early this year, and we would like to continue to develop more versions for Preciso Watch.  Indiegogo has kindly offer us to continue our funding on their platform, so we can continue to deliver quality watches to backers.  
Positive Feedbacks from backers:




Risks & Challenges

We are reliable and experienced in handling tight delivery schedules. However, there are always unforeseeable issues that may affect our production planning. We will ensure that all our supporters are kept in the loop and provided with frequent updates to enhance the visibility and transparency of our production progress. The project will be monitored closely by the team to ensure that it runs smoothly and all watches will be movement and water resistant tested before they leave our hands to ensure our customers receive a flawless product.

Preciso means a lot to us. We have faith this project will succeed. In order to do so, we need your support to bring this project to life.
story_txt:
Nowadays, the cost of watch production is becoming increasingly more and more expensive. Furthermore, when watches are shipped to retail stores, the price is often marked up to 10 times (or even more for well known brands) of the production cost. It is becoming increasingly difficult to find a quality wrist watch for a reasonable price. Our objective at Preciso was to create a stylish, versatile, high quality and affordable timepiece for everyday wear - for the everyday man. Our answer? Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch.
 
There were 3 main goals Preciso wanted to achieve in our new watch:
1. Style – a classic style integrated with modern design elements. The Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch is designed to be super slim - suitable for everyday wear. The clean minimalistic watch face is a bow to modernity.
2. Quality – Preciso watches are not to be merely refined and elegant, but also robust and durable. Preciso has carefully selected the materials required for the Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch. The watch features premium components including SWISS MADE movement, surgical grade stainless steel and sapphire crystal.
3. Affordable Price – at Preciso, we want quality watches to be at an affordable price. We deal with the suppliers directly. No agents or middle men means we can pass on the savings to our customers. The kickstarter prices for the Preciso - Super Thin Classic Watch is less than 200 USD.






Case Body: 316L surgical grade Stainless Steel with 2 tone finishing (polish and brush). The diameter of the case is 39 mm, and the total thickness is only 6.65 mm
Crown: 316L stainless steel with engraved Preciso logo
Movement: Swiss made Ronda 6004.D 5 jewels movement, it has small seconds dial at the 6 o’clock position and date function at the 3 o’clock position, with EOL (End of Life) function
Hands: Diamond Cut steel colour hour and minute hands, and metallic blue colour small second hand
Dial: White/Black enamel 2 layers dial with simple minute tracks. Excellent material to give a timeless look to the watch
Strap: 20mm width Genuine cow skin leather with stainless steel buckle. Black and brown leather straps versions are available
Steel Band: Solid dual tone polished stainless steel band, with push release button deployment clasp
Crystal: Scratch resistant Sapphire Crystal
Water Resistant: 50 metres
Case Back: Stainless steel with engraved Preciso logo
Battery Life: 2 years




White Dial Version


Black Dial Version



Preciso Watch is developing stainless steel band version, and we need your support in Indiegogo to complete our first order.  This is a solid dual tone polished stainless steel band, with push release button deployment clasp.  Solid stainless steel band has better appearance, and more durable compare with metal folded band.  Backers can choose this version and our limited Black Steel Version, currently only available in Indiegogo.

Stainless Steel Band Version




Stainless Steel Band In Polished and Brushed Finishing
Deployment Clasp With Push Release Button 

Black Steel Version



We completed our first batch of orders early this year, and we would like to continue to develop more versions for Preciso Watch.  Indiegogo has kindly offer us to continue our funding on their platform, so we can continue to deliver quality watches to backers.  
Positive Feedbacks from backers:















    Risks & Challenges 
We are reliable and experienced in handling tight delivery schedules. However, there are always unforeseeable issues that may affect our production planning. We will ensure that all our supporters are kept in the loop and provided with frequent updates to enhance the visibility and transparency of our production progress. The project will be monitored closely by the team to ensure that it runs smoothly and all watches will be movement and water resistant tested before they leave our hands to ensure our customers receive a flawless product.
Preciso means a lot to us. We have faith this project will succeed. In order to do so, we need your support to bring this project to life.

story:
What is Jelly Doux?

Jelly Doux is  a high quality handmade-fashion earpieces that features a sleek, edgeless, compact, and minimalist design. It takes everything that made the previous Jelly Galaxy great, and advance it to a new level.  No matter what is in your playlist, Jelly Doux assure you will love what you hear.

After the successful funding on Indiegogo this March, our previous handbuilt product, Jelly Galaxy, has provided us valuable feedback from our customers, as well as insight into the consumer product landscape, and in-depth knowledge about the intricacies of manufacturing and the value of a manufacturing relationship. The Jelly Doux is the next generation of handmade manufacturing, earphones or otherwise, and we have taken all we’ve learned from our past products and experiences and applied those to every aspect of how we designed, developed and manufacture Jelly Doux.

--------------------------------------------

Design

--------------------------------------------

Earphones have accompanied us very commonly in our daily routine. But not all users can choose an earpieces that fit perfectly, which is a common issue to female and children. Originated from Asia, we understood the need of having an earpieces that’s not only well functioning and fashionable, but also fit perfectly in all ear sizes, especially for asian female and children, whose ear canals are too small for regular earphones. Now, the frustration is finally ended with Jelly Doux.

Minimalist and compact design easily fit all ear sizes

The smooth, continuous unibody design created for Jelly Galaxy comes to Jelly Doux. It takes the simplest minimalism as its core design. Housings are carefully built to have no recognizable lids or edges. An unibody design that brings you the smoothest touch from top to bottom.

Edgeless and Smooth surface

Canals is designed shorter than eartips, allowing Jelly Doux fit perfectly in your ears, as a result, better sound isolation.

With the maximum Outer Diameter of 1 cm, Jelly Doux easily sits below your concha, allowing it fit entirely in your ear, so music would be more enjoyable than ever!  

Various colors

More than 70% of Jelly Doux is covered in fabric. In many meanings, fabric represents the true beauty of handcraft and countless possibilities of customization. In  earphones manufacturing industry, fabric is very practical in preventing tangle. Those qualifications have convinced us to apply this amazing material to Jelly Doux.

Doesn’t like any controller on markets, Jelly Doux use fabric as a replacement for common 3 button controllers. Inside it is a glass fiber reinforced acrylic pad specially designed to dissipate force, so no more edgy buttons that hurt your finger tips. On top is fabric cover that enhances your finger placement and comfortability. With this design, Jelly Doux really pushes handmade earpieces to a new level.

Small, compact and astonishing! Jelly Doux has a wide range of themes with countless unique patterns, thank to our newly discovered handmade technique. The hardest part is to enhance the deep effect on the background. For each color has its own specific characteristics, mixing formula and techniques have to be different for each one. We have been working unceasingly the last six months to find the technique that not only shows the eye-catching nature of Jelly Doux but also be able to manufacture as efficient as possible.

Stunning. Sophisticate. Gorgeous

Logo is not painted, but embedded directly on housing

12 formula, 12 stunning finishes with 12 different stories, 100% pure casting made and no cheap peeling paint. We have consulted top stylists to pick up colors that can be easily mixed with your daily outfits. With more than 180 combinations, Jelly Doux is not just an earphones, it’s a wonderful accessory to accompany your everyday routine. No matter what style you are, Jelly Doux will make you stand out from the crowd.

--------------------------------------------

Features

--------------------------------------------

With Jelly Doux’s smart controller, your music enjoyment will never be  disrupted by any reason. Specially designed to support all common Operating Systems available on market, Jelly Doux works well despites what smartphone you’re using, so you can easily share this amazing earphones with your friends!

Unibody design and advanced coating technology create a rain-proof and sweat-proof cover that protect housings from any environment, and even make it more durable in micro level.

Just like Jelly Galaxy, the lid and body are precisely abraded in hours to achieve the smoothness that you can’t even distinguish edges between them. These processes require absolute concentration. Due to unique texture on each earphones, our artisans need to stay focus on each one to locate their special texture, and enhance them through abrading and polishing. In that way, we deliver to you specially handmade earphones that no mass produced product is capable of.


Despite Jelly Doux’s compact design, inside it are powerful 8mm Dynamic drivers with custom built-in canals, which help produce extra deep, rich bass without overwhelm other frequencies. It may seem a bit in contrast to Jelly Doux’s tiny housings, but it actually fulfills the earpieces’ sound quality. "Big things come from small packages".

--------------------------------------------

Sophisticated Finishes

--------------------------------------------

As mentioned, each theme has its own unique texture, therefore each one of them has to get through different processes. Jelly Doux uses more than 25 different colors and 5 types of emulsions as raw materials. And each component and material is precisely quantified in dekagram level to assure the best results.

Color mixing is the hardest part. Finished products need to have unique patterns on unified themes, which means they have to be both different and the same. This process requires the most experienced artisans to handle. Even one small mistake can cause the entire production to fail.

After all the crucial details have been done. It takes another 1 hours to polish and 2 more to finally finish before packed and stored. So, everytime you wear it, you can be proud that your Jelly Doux is a 26-hour-of hard work and passion. It is unique, and it is specially made for you


--------------------------------------------

Progress

--------------------------------------------

We just finished our final prototypes last week and it functions very well. And importantly, the filter we customly ordered makes the sound even better! It is really the best affordable price range earphones we ever had.

However, Jelly Doux currently is nothing more than a prototype and concept. But we've already designed, developed, engineered, and rigorously tested the product on the front end to avoid delivery delays and unhappy backers. It’s a time-consuming progress but worth the price. Now we know we can deliver Jelly Doux on time and on schedule with the best quality for you.

We started Doux Project based on valuable feedbacks from our beloved customers and backers on Jelly Galaxy. All of your reviews and feedbacks were taken carefully and precisely delivered to Jelly Doux. Better sound, more stunning themes and upgraded controller to suit your most daily needs.

  • March - Design and Engineering begins
  • May - First prototypes and feedback analysing
  • July - Reconfig design and engineering
  • 7 July - Second prototypes and feedback analysing
  • 24 July - Reconfig design and engineering
  • August - Reconfig design and engineering
  • September - Final prototypes and Toolings
  • 31 October -  Indiegogo
  • December - Begin manufacture
  • 1/2016 to 2/2016  - Jelly Doux Ships (*expected)

--------------------------------------------

The Perks

--------------------------------------------

1 - Standards: Comes in 12 gorgeous themes and 2 fabric cables.

  • 12 unified themes


  • Standard Fabric Cables

--------------------------------------------

2 - Vogue: Want more? In Vogue edition, every thing is all up to you! You can change the cable, housings, Y-split and other details into colors that suit you most. Is it a gift? Then just tell us what you want to say! Your message will be embedded on Doux’s controller with anti-peeling guaranteed.  Just $10 more, you can make full customization on Jelly Doux. Let’s shine your style!

* Attention: Belows are tables of colors available for customization. And please be aware that message contains no more than 12 letters. We will update more services as soon as possible :)

  • Optional themes for Housings, Y-Split, Controller and Input Jack

  • Vogue Fabric Cables

* Please leave message about your customization as detailed as possible, so we can serve you well :)

--------------------------------------------

Challenges

--------------------------------------------

At current phase, we just have finished our very first final prototypes and started tooling for manufacturing. However, the materials as well as resources to build proper tools are cost and time consuming, especially finding an OEM that fits Jelly Doux's needs. The remaining budget is going low and each one of our member has contributed their last savings to back this project up. After Jelly Galaxy, we learnt that if we don't give 100% on something, we won't achieve anything. Yes it may sound odd, but it is what bonds us together as a team, a family of Joinhandmade.

--------------------------------------------

Our Team

--------------------------------------------

After 4 years working in this project, our team realized that we can actually do more than what we think if we are not afraid to fail. Keeping that in mind, we’ve dedicated ourselves  to provide amazing features to make your personal time more styleful and enjoyable.

--------------------------------------------

FAQs

--------------------------------------------

How do I support Jelly Doux?

  • The only way to get one right now, is through our Indiegogo page right here! People who back the project on Indiegogo, will get the very first Jelly Doux and will save money over the retail price. And please don’t forget to message us your phone number if shipping address is in Vietnam to prevent any potential delay.  

Do I pay for shipment?

  • Yes! We will send you your pair of Jelly Doux earphones wherever you are in the world! Shipment fee is already included in the perk and we guarantee it will be yours in 10 working days! (from the date of delivery, of course :))

When Will I Receive My Order?

  • All orders are timestamped and we will ship on a first ordered, first served basis. This means that the first contributors will get their Jelly Doux  first, according to when the orders were received. So the sooner you get your order in, the sooner you’ll have your new Doux !

    --------------------------------------------

    Thank you for your view & support :)

    --------------------------------------------

story:
Have you ever had a sleeping baby and wondered if they were wet?  Have you ever had the snow suit on and didn't want to take it off to check because you were in a store.  This patent pending detector takes the guess work out of your babies diaper.  Simply press the button and hold it up to the diaper.  A light will indicate when the diaper needs changing.

I am an engineer and a parent and I hate checking for wet diapers.  There is really no good way to do it especially in a store.  This diaper detector works with capacitive touch with the USB connector as the electrode..  I used the components from a USB drive to keep it low cost.  It runs on a coin cell battery which is included. 

My main goal for this project was to benefit people that work in nursing homes.  If I hit my funding goal I can get a low price on the plastic enclosure and the PCb which will allow me to get this into more peoples hands that can really use them and sell it for the price of 10 dollars.

I am an engineer for an industry leader in consumer electronics designing hardware.  I specialize in capacitive touch and I have designed all aspects of the campaigns that you are seeing.  These are products I use to bring electronics to life.  I have 15 years of engineering experience and graduated with both a mechanical and electrical engineer.  I have had several projects be successful on other crowdfunding web sites.

story:
- INTRODUCING GEHRICH -


Considered Design

Each GEHRICH piece is an original design led by our designer and co-founder, Samantha Gehrich. Our designs are considered in both form and function, with a strong focus on creating timeless styles that make you look and feel exceptional.

Quality & Materials

We love natural fibres! And we try to use them in everything we do. If you like exceptional quality and luxury then you will love and appreciate the quality we put into each and every GEHRICH piece.

Sustainable Collections

We believe in the theory that less is more and we champion quality over quantity. Collection sizes and production numbers are purposely limited by us in order to create a more exclusive and sustainable brand.

Ethical Operation

At GEHRICH we are dedicated to operating in an ethical and socially responsible way, We choose to manufacture the majority of our pieces in Australia and support local industry wherever possible.  

Personality  

We won't sell you a fantasy. We live, work and play in the real world. We value courtesy and like our customers, we expect responses to questions, assistance with a problem and transparency where it counts.


- THE DESIGNER -

Read about Samantha Gehrich


- OUR STORY -

In 2013 we decided to take what was a small home based label offering outerwear to a limited number of loyal customers and try to turn GEHRICH into a global luxury brand with a difference..... 

A brand that can take a stand against fast-fashion! 

We wanted GEHRICH to be built on sustainable values and offer people the chance to own exceptional quality fashion pieces that are thoughtfully crafted and constructed to stand the test of time. 

Over the past two years we have invested in set-up, our first collection and all required branding but now we need your help! 

Our goal is to engage with our customers, fashion lovers and people that share in our vision and crowdfunding is the perfect platform for this. Raising money to expand GEHRICH is important but equally important is the chance to engage with people, grow our global following and grow awareness of our brand and values. If you believe in our vision and would like to support GEHRICH, please keep reading and check out the fantastic perks we have to offer! 



- WHAT THE MONEY WILL BE USED FOR -

The money we receive will help us....

1. Fulfill fabric orders with our Australian and International suppliers.

2. Pay for production of our AW15 Collection in Australia.

3. Pay for garment trimmings, collection photography and talent.  

4. If we exceed our goals we could use some money to expand our marketing reach and take on opportunities to show our collections at local and international fashion shows.


- SHARING IS CARING -
Your support can help us grow awareness for GEHRICH globally! 
We need to gain attention from potential customers, fashion buyers and retailers worldwide. If you believe in our vision and love our products then you can really make a huge difference just by talking about GEHRICH and sharing our story with friends across your social networks.


- THE PERKS -

PERSONALISED LETTERPRESS THANK YOU CARD 

Signed by GEHRICH founder and designer - Samantha Gehrich


YOUR NAME LISTED ON OUR WEBSITE

We want to show the world how much we appreciate our investors!


JOIN THE DESIGN TEAM

Want to get involved with GEHRICH and help create a limited edition coat for our 2016 collection?..... here is your chance. We'll even list you as co-designer on our website next to the coat when it launches!


BRAND AMBASSADOR

For your unbelievable commitment to GEHRICH we are going to make you our brand ambassador for a season!


MERINO WOOL SCARVES

Our scarves are milled in Tasmania at one of the last remaining woollen mills in Australia. Made from super fine 100% merino wool.


MELBOURNE SILK SCARF

Limited Edition scarf that pays homage to the amazing city of Melbourne. 

100% Silk.


AW15 COLLECTION - Women's




AW15 COLLECTION - Men's


MELBOURNE COLLECTION - Women's

You can choose any of these coats for our $550.00 perk!**
** "The Carlton" and "The Brunswick" can only be chosen for our $1,000.00 Perk

View Collection Details


MELBOURNE COLLECTION - Men's

View Collection Details

RISKS & CHALLENGES

As with any business, there are risks and challenges involved and in fashion the main challenges come from dealing with suppliers, garment manufactures and finally supplying finished garments to customers. Throughout the past 12 months and the production of our first collection we have been able to build strong working relationships with suppliers and manufacturers. We have worked to solve potential issues and put in place a reliable supply chain that presents far less risk. 

As for our AW15 collection - with your help we hope to be able to manufacture and have finished garments ready for delivery in late April 2015. Timing issues can arise but we have factored an allowance for minor delays in manufacturing and our supply chain in the estimated delivery dates. 


PRODUCTION PLAN

February 17th - Confirm previous holds and orders on fabric and trimmings.
February 26th - Campaign closes.
March 2nd - Finalise styles, markers and production orders. 
March 9th - Commence production. 
April 14th - Final quality inspections.
April 21st - May 5th - Ship out orders to our backers!


- PLEASE NOTE -


Duty/Tax charges: If you live outside of Australia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty or Tax charges associated with importing our goods. Please check with your local customs/tax offices. 

Customs: Anything we send to you should not be an issue for customs and should clear easily but these services can vary from country to country. Some countries are known for being very slow with customs so please be patient. We will do our best to help you with any customs issues should they arise. 

Delivery time: In manufacturing there is always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. While we are confident of our supply chain and the time allowances for hold ups, sometimes issues can be out of our control. Should any problems arise we will let you know and do our absolute best to make sure we can supply rewards by the estimated date or even before.


Thank you for supporting GEHRICH.
 

gehrich.co
story_txt:
- INTRODUCING GEHRICH -


Considered Design
Each GEHRICH piece is an original
design led by our designer and co-founder, Samantha Gehrich. Our designs are
considered in both form and function, with a strong focus on creating timeless
styles that make you look and feel exceptional.

Quality & Materials
We love natural
fibres! And we try to use them in everything we do. If you like exceptional
quality and luxury then you will love and appreciate the quality we put into
each and every GEHRICH piece.
Sustainable Collections
We believe in the
theory that less is more and we champion quality over quantity. Collection
sizes and production numbers are purposely limited by us in order to create a
more exclusive and sustainable brand.
Ethical Operation
At GEHRICH we are
dedicated to operating in an ethical and socially responsible way, We choose to
manufacture the majority of our pieces in Australia and support local industry
wherever possible.  


Personality  
We won't sell you a
fantasy. We live, work and play in the real world. We value courtesy and like
our customers, we expect responses to questions, assistance with a problem and
transparency where it counts.







- THE DESIGNER -

Read about Samantha Gehrich






- OUR STORY -
In 2013 we decided to take what was a small home based label offering outerwear to a limited number of loyal customers and try to turn GEHRICH into a global luxury brand with a difference..... 

A brand that can take a stand against fast-fashion! 
We wanted GEHRICH to be built on sustainable values and offer people the chance to own exceptional quality fashion pieces that are thoughtfully crafted and constructed to stand the test of time. 
Over the past two years we have invested in set-up, our first collection and all required branding but now we need your help! 
Our goal is to engage with our customers, fashion lovers and people that share in our vision and crowdfunding is the perfect platform for this. Raising money to expand GEHRICH is important but equally important is the chance to engage with people, grow our global following and grow awareness of our brand and values. If you believe in our vision and would like to support GEHRICH, please keep reading and check out the fantastic perks we have to offer! 




- WHAT THE MONEY WILL BE USED FOR -
The money we receive will help us....
1. Fulfill fabric orders with our Australian and International suppliers.
2. Pay for production of our AW15 Collection in Australia.
3. Pay for garment trimmings, collection photography and talent.  
4. If we exceed our goals we could use some money to expand our marketing reach and take on opportunities to show our collections at local and international fashion shows.


- SHARING IS CARING -


Your support can help us grow awareness for GEHRICH globally! 
We need to gain attention from potential customers, fashion buyers and retailers worldwide. If you believe in our vision and love our products then you can really make a huge difference just by talking about GEHRICH and sharing our story with friends across your social networks.


- THE PERKS -
PERSONALISED LETTERPRESS THANK YOU CARD 
Signed by GEHRICH founder and designer - Samantha Gehrich




YOUR NAME LISTED ON OUR WEBSITE
We want to show the world how much we appreciate our investors!







JOIN THE DESIGN TEAM
Want to get involved with GEHRICH and help create a limited edition coat for our 2016 collection?..... here is your chance. We'll even list you as co-designer on our website next to the coat when it launches!







BRAND AMBASSADOR

For your unbelievable commitment to GEHRICH we are going to make you our brand ambassador for a season!





MERINO WOOL SCARVES
Our scarves are milled in Tasmania at one of the last remaining woollen mills in Australia. Made from super fine 100% merino wool.


MELBOURNE SILK SCARF
Limited Edition scarf that pays homage to the amazing city of Melbourne. 
100% Silk.


AW15 COLLECTION - Women's
















AW15 COLLECTION - Men's












MELBOURNE COLLECTION - Women's
You can choose any of these coats for our $550.00 perk!**
** "The Carlton" and "The Brunswick" can only be chosen for our $1,000.00 Perk



View Collection Details 



MELBOURNE COLLECTION - Men's






View Collection Details



RISKS & CHALLENGES

 As with any business, there are risks and challenges involved and in fashion the main challenges come from dealing with suppliers, garment manufactures and finally supplying finished garments to customers. Throughout the past 12 months and the production of our first collection we have been able to build strong working relationships with suppliers and manufacturers. We have worked to solve potential issues and put in place a reliable supply chain that presents far less risk. 
As for our AW15 collection - with your help we hope to be able to manufacture and have finished garments ready for delivery in late April 2015. Timing issues can arise but we have factored an allowance for minor delays in manufacturing and our supply chain in the estimated delivery dates. 

PRODUCTION PLAN
February 17th - Confirm previous holds and orders on fabric and trimmings.
February 26th - Campaign closes.
March 2nd - Finalise styles, markers and production orders. 
March 9th - Commence production. 
April 14th - Final quality inspections.
April 21st - May 5th - Ship out orders to our backers!



- PLEASE NOTE -


Duty/Tax charges: If you live outside of Australia, you will be responsible for any applicable duty or Tax charges associated with importing our goods. Please check with your local customs/tax offices. 


Customs: Anything we send to you should not be an issue for customs and should clear easily but these services can vary from country to country. Some countries are known for being very slow with customs so please be patient. We will do our best to help you with any customs issues should they arise. Delivery time: In manufacturing there is always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. While we are confident of our supply chain and the time allowances for hold ups, sometimes issues can be out of our control. Should any problems arise we will let you know and do our absolute best to make sure we can supply rewards by the estimated date or even before.




Thank you for supporting GEHRICH.
 

gehrich.co

story:
About Hold Your Colour Clothing

Over the last 7 years I have done all of my own cutting, sewing, accounting, designing, shipping and handling, etc. I have reached the point where I sew up to 10 hours a day for at least 5 days a week. I would love to be able to supply to many stores interested in my product. I want to keep expanding my customer base, but at the moment I can not manage making it all by hand. I have designed a new collection of the most comfortable and fashionable "easy wear", comprised of a couple different tank tops, dresses, pants, sports bras, rompers, etc. As well as, a couple mens items including loose-fitting pants, shorts and tank tops. I have fine-tuned my patterns to fit and look best on a variety of people, so I can accommodate more body types, which will in turn boost my customer base. This first collection for production will be made from organic cotton, bamboo and/or hemp jersey stretch knits.

 I will also be continuing to make handmade garments…including hoodies and jackets. I will be getting unique textiles and fabrics from different small businesses all over the world to use in my custom gear. It is fair trade and still handmade. Im going to expand and also collaborate with multiple artists to do unique screen prints and other kinds of mixed media. I also plan to expand my line with accessories, such as socks, beanies and jewelry.



The Impact

Waiting for the right time to take a big leap, I have been presented with the perfect set of circumstances to not only produce my upcoming clothing collection for the first time, but to help alter the lives of women who are striving for independent liberation and freedom of choice all the way across the world. A brave 23 year old woman named Nasreen, in Kathmandu, Nepal, has expanded her sewing business, by employing women from the the slums of Nepal, giving them a job, and a new found belief that women can be independent and work for their own money. I am already building a relationship with her and plan to fly to Nepal in January to put my clothing line into production for the first time.

In the very near future, Nasreen is to be placed into an forced marriage with a man whom she has never met.  She does not want to do this and needs ALL of our support to believe she can be independent and have the freedom of choice. She is doing all she can to be a voice for other women in her community with little support. 

What We Need

My goal is to raise 8,000 - 10,000 dollars. I have my tickets to go see Nasreen and I am going to hire her even if I can only have a few items made. Every little dollar I raise towards my goal will help me to be able to produce the whole clothing collection including accessories. When you donate, your not only helping me achieve my dreams, but your giving women the chance to be paid well and stand up for themselves. Your funding will go to sourcing fabric and materials as well as production cost for Nasreen to make my collection. Money will also go into marketing, design work, promotion/advertisment costs and international shipping.

& What You Get

Im excited to introduce accessories, including socks and beanies. I will be sending out sticker packs with an array of talented artists work and more. I will be getting 2014 Summer lookbooks made with photos of the collection you helped put into action. You also have a chance to receive custom tees/tanks from production with graphic prints or even a custom HYC HANDMADE item. Check out the "perks" section, more perks including hand painted artwork or collaborations with Andrew Jones. 



Other Ways You Can Help

-I know times and money are tight, but you CAN help me by simply sharing my project.  Help me get the word out, Tell you friends about Hold Your Colour Clothing. 

-Visit my blog to follow our story, including conversations and the time I spend in Nepal with her. I will also have more on the dangers these women face, more info on my project and updates through out the whole process.

www.HYCclothing.wordpress.com

story:
Sports revolution fuelling a social Evolution (Our Crowd funding started late, so we have extended the date in order to reimburse the funds that we have borrowed to make the trip a possibility)

Since its introduction in 2011 Floorball has captivated the hearts and minds of many
youths in Jamaica, especially those from the inner-City areas in Kingston. The dream is to travel to Canada to take part in the Qualifications for the Men’s Floorball world Championships January 31 –February ,2 2014. 

The power of sport has allowed these youths to create their own path to success. Push to their limits to prepare and fund their dream of representing their family, communities and country. External support is needed to turn this dream into a reality.


What is needed

The Player needs $20,000 USD to add to funds they have raised to cover cost for 24
Plane tickets, accommodation, food and traveling to and from games whiles in Canada. 

These 24 youths from 17 different inner-city communities which are normally at odds with each other realize that their dream might not become a reality and thus started
to donate money that they have saved to fund themselves to other players who
they believe might have a better chance of assisting the team to win.

Any excess funds collected will be donated to the Jamaica Floorball Association to assist in the development of floorball in Jamaica.

The Impact

The success of this venture will resonate in every inner-city community across Jamaica creating confident in the youths within that can see themselves in each of the players that are on the team. Join us in building and glorifying the right attributes
of these youths.

Having Jamaica being represented at the Floorball World Championships in Gothenburg Sweden,December 2014 will be the biggest milestone for Floorball in Jamaica and the Caribbean.

Other Ways You Can Help

For you who can’t make a cash donation, help us spread the word to as much people
as possible

story:
The Team

We are two derby enthusiasts based in Belfast, Northern Ireland, with the aim of offering the roller derby community a monthly subscription box full of useful derby equipment, and some badass derby accessories. The project started when we realised that a lot of derby players like their persona to be as unique and as special as they are, and that we could deliver that! Every month's box will be a surprise, based on a theme to do with roller derby culture.

http://packupderby.com/
https://www.facebook.com/packupderby

Pack up! is made up of just ourselves, Jacky and Helen. Between us we are part of two derby leagues in Belfast.  Helen works in the creative industry and Jacky is a talented illustrator. We both love Roller Derby, and are excited to put our combined talents together to launch this business. 

The Journey

As we grow, we want to highlight the people that we work with. It's important to us to provide an audience for the talented people that are helping us build this service.

What you can get?

Every pledge helps us get closer to our goal.

For a pledge of £5 or more we have a range of stickers and badges designed by us, with a very grateful message in a handwritten note.

For a pledge of £10 or more, we have a range of stickers (for your helmet, laptop, wherever!) plus a Pack Up! designed tote bag!

For a pledge of £15 or more, we will send you a Pack Up! designed t-shirt and a packet of badges. Just let us know your t-shirt size, (s, m, l, xl)!

For a pledge of £20 or more, you will be one of the first to recieve a Pack Up! subscription box.

For a pledge of £50 or more, you will recive the first three boxes of Pack Up! A nice little discount as each box will be £20 each.

For a pledge of £90 or more, you will recieve the first 6 boxes of Pack Up! with an even bigger discount.

For a pledge of £150 or more,  you will recieve a year's subscription to Pack Up! with the biggest discount we'll ever do on the subscription.

Support

Supporting Pack Up! in this means the world to us. Backing the project sets us up to run the first month of subscription boxes, and opens up the potential for us this project's success. 

Thank You!

At this point, we feel the need to mention how lucky we've been to have such support in this project already. We wouldn't be here today without the help from the following:

The music featured in the video is from Ed Zealous. Thank you so much for being the soundtrack to our video!

https://edzealous.bandcamp.com/

Belfast Roller Derby for letting us film at one of their 2015 games.

http://belfastrollerderby.net/

Belfast City Rockets for letting us crash and video one of their practices.

https://www.facebook.com/BelfastCityRockets/

Special thanks to Ciara Mc Mullan and Niall Lawler for filming the video and to Ciara for editing it!

https://www.facebook.com/CiaraMcMullanPhotography

http://www.ciaramcmullan.com/

We couldn't recommend any of these legends more!

story:
I'm so excited to have been accepted as a contributor for Processing JavaScript (p5js). p5js is a low barrier to entry JavaScript library that is often used by artists, but can be extended as a teaching tool for those interested in learning to code. I'll be spending the week helping create curriculums that use Processing's JavaScript library, debugging code, and helping come up with ways to reach communities with little access to code.

I'll be using the funds I raise to pay for a round trip flight from Seattle to Pittsburgh. Currently, the cheapest flights from SEA to PIT (arriving 5/25 - departing 5/31) are between $550-$600. If I have remaining funds, I will use them for airport to hotel transportation fees and to cover indiegogo campaign costs (4%-9% of the raised amount).
