story:
About HOPE

HOPE is a brand for ALL seasons; an apparel company that maintains a conscious relationship with the global community. We believe clothing can only be beautiful if it is made that way – sourced from sustainable and eco-friendly materials, and crafted under fair working conditions. This environment of homogeny, fast-fashion, and instant gratification, saw an opportunity for HOPE to come to life.

Our vision is to position the brand and certify the processes that make HOPE unique, as our way of making a difference in the way apparel is manufactured and consumed throughout the world.

Our Ethical World

 

Made in the world

Our brand is a global collaboration of equals, and our clothing tells their story. Crafted by artisans and designers from Peru, United States and Colombia, HOPE is recognition that we are united by our ideals, and that quality doesn’t care much about borders.

 

Sustainability

We strive to source materials and use production methods that have as little impact on the environment as possible. If we see an opportunity to lighten our footprint, we will take it – because pants and t-shirts only matter if there is a world left to wear them in.

 

A responsible value chain

There are roughly 40 million garment factory workers worldwide, the majority of who make less than $3 per day. We are absolutely committed to a supply chain that is completely free from child and unfair labor. To learn more about our journey with the labor rights group CHILD LABOR FREE, click here. We are on the journey to be certified Child Labor Free.

HOPE is saying NO to ALL WORK, NO PLAY. 

 

A brand for all seasons

At HOPE, we know that cyclical and fast-fashion trends are damaging to ourselves and to our environment. That means no spring catalogs, no fall blowouts; just classic, quality, timeless pieces.

 

What We Need & What You Get

HOPE is raising money in order to grow awareness and strengthen the brand. Our goal is to obtain $10,000USD to invest in the following areas of operation:

10% of the proceeds will go to A La Rueda Rueda Foundation in Colombia. 

 

A Reason For HOPE

 

Fast fashion has a highly destructive power, from sweatshops and child labor to contamination and negative influence over the environment. Slow Fashion on the other hand, means standing up against abuse, poor livelihoods, and contamination – all the things that make transnational fashion companies so prosperous.

HOPE works under a different model, and we consider ourselves to be a different type of company. Our main focus is to offer people around the globe a different alternative to fast fashion, and still feel good about how they look and feel; knowing they have contributed to a responsible garment through ethical and transparent practices.

Your contribution will help us grow as a brand through our marketing and distribution efforts, therefore helping us have a higher impact on the global community.

 

​Proud Supporters of…

A La Rueda Rueda Foundation

At HOPE, we support a foundation that is located in Colombia (South America) called A la Rueda Rueda Foundation. Part of the objective is to be able to provide support for the organization and help them deliver shoes to children in need. The foundation was created to support the children population in situations of vulnerability of the Caribbean region in Colombia.

For every donation you make, 10% of the proceeds will be donated to the organisation. (Video of foundation has been uploaded). 

http://www.fundacionalaruedarueda.org/es/

Their site is in Spanish; we apologize for the inconvenience for non-Spanish speakers. However, we can provide you any additional specific information you may need, if you wish to learn more. Thank you!

 

Rewards 

We want to thank all potential backers in advance. We value your support!

$75 - 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton Scarf - Unisex

Get $15 Off when purchasing this perk. Scarf original retail price: $90. Free shipping within the United States - (Grey or Dark grey color).

$65 - Wide Pima Cotton Scarf - Unisex

Get $15 Off when purchasing this perk. Scarf original retail price: $80. Free shipping within the United States - (Light Grey or Oatmeal color). 

NOTE: To redeem the gift cards, just log on to our online store at www.hopemade.world and do your normal purchase process. At checkout, you will be asked to include the gift card code. May you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to write us directly at sara.milanes@hopemade.world. Thank you! 

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING IS AVAILABLE FROM OUR ONLINE STORE!

 

The Product

Our Sweaters:

1. Made from premium fabric: 100% Baby alpaca from Arequipa, Peru. They produce one of the world’s most luxurious fibers that are softer than cashmere, and lighter, warmer, and more durable than wool. 

2. Sustainable: This animal fibre is renewable, biodegradable and 100% natural.

3. Pesticide free: The lands where the alpacas live are pesticide free. They eat hichu grass (wild wheatgrass that grows in this part of the Andean Region of South America). Since they are pesticide free, this means that the alpacas and the fiber don’t have any type of chemical contamination. The premium result is very fine quality

4. Made in Peru: High quality, great workmanship and strict compliance standards. 

Our Scarves 

1. Made in Peru: 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton

2. More absorbent and softer than other cottons.

3. Ideal for those with allergies and/or sensitive skin.

4. Its extra long staple length makes it softer, more durable, and highly resistant to pilling.

Our Tee Shirts

1. Made in USA

2. Made from 100% GOTS Certified Organic Cotton

3. Pesticide and fertilizer free

4. Health-friendly and environmentally friendly

5. Prevents water contamination and conserves biodiversity

If we are not able to achieve our economic goal, we will take 90% of the proceeds to be invested in the digital marketing and distribution efforts, and the remaining 10% will be donated to A La Rueda Rueda Foundation.

 

Meet the Team

My name is Sara Milanes and I am an ethical fashion entrepreneur. I obtained my bachelor’s degree in New York City at the Fashion Institute of Techonology (F.I.T.) with a focus in International Trade and Marketing for the Fashion Industry and received a Master’s degree at Istituto Marangoni in Brand Management in Milan, Italy. I am the Director at HOPE Made in the world LLC (and member of the board), company that was established in the state of Delaware in 2015.  The official US launch was last September 2016.

After ten years of working in the industry in both the United States and Colombia, I was presented with an opportunity to develop a business that helps generate jobs, as well as inform people; the result was HOPE.  I have found that there is no better way to lead a professional career than by spreading valuable information that could potentially shape the way we consume.

This project has been able to come to life with the financial support of family and friends as well as our awesome team whose commitment and creativity is particularly valued. We also thank our social media followers whose feedback and support is vital in the growth of HOPE. 

Sara Milanes, Co-founder & Director/Board Member (Bogota, Colombia)

Adriana Ceballos, Co-Founder and Branding Director/Board Member (Bogota, Colombia)

Juan Manuel Perez, Investor/Board Member (New York, USA)

Maria Nella Manzur, Strategy & Sales Consultant/Board Member (Miami, FL,  USA)

Brandhaus, Branding Consultant (Bogota, Colombia)

A La Rueda Rueda Foundation, (Monteria & Bogota, Colombia)

Laura de Gamboa, Art Director (Bogota, Colombia

Gabriella Adeline, Designer (Milan, Italy)

Juan Fernando Cubillos, Web Developer & Digital Marketing (Bogota, Colombia)

Sonia Velasquez, DIP Digital Interactive Productions (Miami, FL, USA)

Javier Hidalgo, Crowd funding Consultant (Bogota, Colombia)

Verde Fulfillment, Distribution Center in Boise, Idaho (Boise, Idaho, USA)

Waka-s (Erick Febres), Manufacturer (Arequipa, Peru) 

Fashion Revolution

HOPE Made in the world is a proud supporter of the Fashion Revolution not-for-profit company from the UK.

Their MISSION: Believe in fashion – an industry which values people, the environment, creativity and profits in equal measure, and it’s everyone’s responsibility to ensure that this happens.

WHY TRANSPARENCY MATTERS: They believe transparency is the first step to transform the industry. And it starts with one simple question: Who made my clothes?

The situation now: A lot of brands don’t know who makes their clothes, so how are we supposed to make informed purchases?

Source: http://fashionrevolution.org/         

Child Labor Free

HOPE is on the journey to be certified Child Labor Free; it is a global certification system that can assess a brand's supply chain and certify products and manufacturers as child labor free. 

Child Labor Free is currently going through the process of becoming a signatory to the United Nations Global Compact, which is the world’s largest corporate sustainability initiative.

CLF provides an assessment framework and risk assessment protocol developed by Ernst & Young.

At HOPE, we do not support any kind of child labor.                               

Other Ways You Can Help

We are very thankful for your time and help. We understand that many people just can't contribute, so feel free to help us make some noise and spread the word. Have a great holiday season!
story_txt:
About HOPEHOPE is a brand for ALL seasons; an apparel company that maintains a conscious relationship with the global community. We believe clothing can only be beautiful if it is made that way – sourced from sustainable and eco-friendly materials, and crafted under fair working conditions. This environment of homogeny, fast-fashion, and instant gratification, saw an opportunity for HOPE to come to life.Our vision is to position the brand and certify the processes that make HOPE unique, as our way of making a difference in the way apparel is manufactured and consumed throughout the world.Our Ethical World Made in the worldOur brand is a global collaboration of equals, and our clothing tells their story. Crafted by artisans and designers from Peru, United States and Colombia, HOPE is recognition that we are united by our ideals, and that quality doesn’t care much about borders. SustainabilityWe strive to source materials and use production methods that have as little impact on the environment as possible. If we see an opportunity to lighten our footprint, we will take it – because pants and t-shirts only matter if there is a world left to wear them in. A responsible value chainThere are roughly 40 million garment factory workers worldwide, the majority of who make less than $3 per day. We are absolutely committed to a supply chain that is completely free from child and unfair labor. To learn more about our journey with the labor rights group CHILD LABOR FREE, click here. We are on the journey to be certified Child Labor Free.HOPE is saying NO to ALL WORK, NO PLAY.  A brand for all seasonsAt HOPE, we know that cyclical and fast-fashion trends are damaging to ourselves and to our environment. That means no spring catalogs, no fall blowouts; just classic, quality, timeless pieces. What We Need & What You GetHOPE is raising money in order to grow awareness and strengthen the brand. Our goal is to obtain $10,000USD to invest in the following areas of operation:10% of the proceeds will go to A La Rueda Rueda Foundation in Colombia.  A Reason For HOPE Fast fashion has a highly destructive power, from sweatshops and child labor to contamination and negative influence over the environment. Slow Fashion on the other hand, means standing up against abuse, poor livelihoods, and contamination – all the things that make transnational fashion companies so prosperous.HOPE works under a different model, and we consider ourselves to be a different type of company. Our main focus is to offer people around the globe a different alternative to fast fashion, and still feel good about how they look and feel; knowing they have contributed to a responsible garment through ethical and transparent practices.Your contribution will help us grow as a brand through our marketing and distribution efforts, therefore helping us have a higher impact on the global community. ​Proud Supporters of…
A La Rueda Rueda FoundationAt HOPE, we support a foundation that is located in Colombia (South America) called A la Rueda Rueda Foundation. Part of the objective is to be able to provide support for the organization and help them deliver shoes to children in need. The foundation was created to support the children population in situations of vulnerability of the Caribbean region in Colombia.For every donation you make, 10% of the proceeds will be donated to the organisation. (Video of foundation has been uploaded). http://www.fundacionalaruedarueda.org/es/Their site is in Spanish; we apologize for the inconvenience for non-Spanish speakers. However, we can provide you any additional specific information you may need, if you wish to learn more. Thank you! Rewards We want to thank all potential backers in advance. We value your support!$75 - 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton Scarf - UnisexGet $15 Off when purchasing this perk. Scarf original retail price: $90. Free shipping within the United States - (Grey or Dark grey color).$65 - Wide Pima Cotton Scarf - UnisexGet $15 Off when purchasing this perk. Scarf original retail price: $80. Free shipping within the United States - (Light Grey or Oatmeal color). NOTE: To redeem the gift cards, just log on to our online store at www.hopemade.world and do your normal purchase process. At checkout, you will be asked to include the gift card code. May you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to write us directly at sara.milanes@hopemade.world. Thank you! WORLDWIDE SHIPPING IS AVAILABLE FROM OUR ONLINE STORE! The Product
Our Sweaters: 
1. Made from premium fabric: 100% Baby alpaca from Arequipa, Peru. They produce one of the world’s most luxurious fibers that are softer than cashmere, and lighter, warmer, and more durable than wool. 2. Sustainable: This animal fibre is renewable, biodegradable and 100% natural.3. Pesticide free: The lands where the alpacas live are pesticide free. They eat hichu grass (wild wheatgrass that grows in this part of the Andean Region of South America). Since they are pesticide free, this means that the alpacas and the fiber don’t have any type of chemical contamination. The premium result is very fine quality4. Made in Peru: High quality, great workmanship and strict compliance standards. Our Scarves 1. Made in Peru: 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton2. More absorbent and softer than other cottons.3. Ideal for those with allergies and/or sensitive skin.4. Its extra long staple length makes it softer, more durable, and highly resistant to pilling.Our Tee Shirts1. Made in USA2. Made from 100% GOTS Certified Organic Cotton3. Pesticide and fertilizer free4. Health-friendly and environmentally friendly5. Prevents water contamination and conserves biodiversityIf we are not able to achieve our economic goal, we will take 90% of the proceeds to be invested in the digital marketing and distribution efforts, and the remaining 10% will be donated to A La Rueda Rueda Foundation. Meet the TeamMy name is Sara Milanes and I am an ethical fashion entrepreneur. I obtained my bachelor’s degree in New York City at the Fashion Institute of Techonology (F.I.T.) with a focus in International Trade and Marketing for the Fashion Industry and received a Master’s degree at Istituto Marangoni in Brand Management in Milan, Italy. I am the Director at HOPE Made in the world LLC (and member of the board), company that was established in the state of Delaware in 2015.  The official US launch was last September 2016.After ten years of working in the industry in both the United States and Colombia, I was presented with an opportunity to develop a business that helps generate jobs, as well as inform people; the result was HOPE.  I have found that there is no better way to lead a professional career than by spreading valuable information that could potentially shape the way we consume.This project has been able to come to life with the financial support of family and friends as well as our awesome team whose commitment and creativity is particularly valued. We also thank our social media followers whose feedback and support is vital in the growth of HOPE. Sara Milanes, Co-founder & Director/Board Member (Bogota, Colombia)Adriana Ceballos, Co-Founder and Branding Director/Board Member (Bogota, Colombia)Juan Manuel Perez, Investor/Board Member (New York, USA)Maria Nella Manzur, Strategy & Sales Consultant/Board Member (Miami, FL,  USA)Brandhaus, Branding Consultant (Bogota, Colombia)A La Rueda Rueda Foundation, (Monteria & Bogota, Colombia)Laura de Gamboa, Art Director (Bogota, ColombiaGabriella Adeline, Designer (Milan, Italy)Juan Fernando Cubillos, Web Developer & Digital Marketing (Bogota, Colombia)Sonia Velasquez, DIP Digital Interactive Productions (Miami, FL, USA)Javier Hidalgo, Crowd funding Consultant (Bogota, Colombia)Verde Fulfillment, Distribution Center in Boise, Idaho (Boise, Idaho, USA)Waka-s (Erick Febres), Manufacturer (Arequipa, Peru) Fashion RevolutionHOPE Made in the world is a proud supporter of the Fashion Revolution not-for-profit company from the UK.Their MISSION: Believe in fashion – an industry which values people, the environment, creativity and profits in equal measure, and it’s everyone’s responsibility to ensure that this happens.WHY TRANSPARENCY MATTERS: They believe transparency is the first step to transform the industry. And it starts with one simple question: Who made my clothes?The situation now: A lot of brands don’t know who makes their clothes, so how are we supposed to make informed purchases?Source: http://fashionrevolution.org/         Child Labor FreeHOPE is on the journey to be certified Child Labor Free; it is a global certification system that can assess a brand's supply chain and certify products and manufacturers as child labor free. Child Labor Free is currently going through the process of becoming a signatory to the United Nations Global Compact, which is the world’s largest corporate sustainability initiative.CLF provides an assessment framework and risk assessment protocol developed by Ernst & Young.At HOPE, we do not support any kind of child labor.                               Other Ways You Can HelpWe are very thankful for your time and help. We understand that many people just can't contribute, so feel free to help us make some noise and spread the word. Have a great holiday season!

story:
Which place is closest to your heart?

Choose any place on earth and turn its map into a designed, one-of-a-kind piece of jewelry. 

Anywhere...

Your hometown. An unexpected stop on a road trip that ended up being the most inspirational. That small dead end street where you finally got the courage to kiss...

 

How it works

On the online interactive map, you'll be able to enter any address or place and zoom or drag to finalize your frame. Your map frame will be further refined and embedded into your selected jewelry design at the studio. The virtual design will then be transformed into metal and plated with high quality 24K gold or silver. Keeping the personal touch in each piece, your map jewelry will be finished and elegantly packed before being sent over to tell your story. 

 

The jewelry 

At first glance, a graphic composition of lines, but with context these lines become personal, capturing memories, experiences and relationships. Choose the design to frame your personal map jewelry.

 

Collection designs

A lapel pin with clean and understated design, the perfect unisex piece to adorn any jacket or pocket. A pendant necklace with three different lengths available to choose from. A statement ring with an open back adjusting to fit your size. All of the collection designs are available in 24K gold or sterling silver plating with a matte finish.  

Special editions

I added a few special editions to the collection especially for the Kickstarter release:
Want to be more specific? PIN has a specific spot marked on your personal map, making your piece of jewelry that much more special. A natural pearl will become the bejeweled map marker.
Called a few different places home? STORY features three or more different maps on one necklace, telling the whole story.
Not the minimalist? ZOOM is the oversized version of the place closest to your heart in a custom shaped statement necklace.

 

  

Packaging is part of the story 

Each map piece created will come individually packaged in a beautifully designed gift box.

 

Perks

I greatly appreciate your support and I’m excited to get YOU ARE HERE to you! You will be able to make your jewelry selections after the campaign ends, for now you are welcome to choose your perk on the right ↗

Featured on:

 

Interested in writing about this project? A press kit is available for download here. Also, please feel free to email me directly at talia@taliasari.com or leave a message if you have any questions. 

DOWNLOAD PRESS KIT

 

Sharing is caring

Know someone who would be just as excited as you are to create a map? Share this campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top, and tell the world! Or click below:

 

 

 

Follow our progress on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter! You can also visit my website taliasari.com and subscribe to the newsletter. 

 

How I got here

For the past few years, I've been turning street maps into jewelry. I started with a collection based on nine cities close to my heart. Over time, I started getting requests to create new places outside my familiar territories. I’ve designed You Are Here: Create your map so that anyone can create a one-of-a-kind piece of jewelry while keeping the price very affordable. After over a year of development, and an experimental pilot that brought to life the most beautiful designs, I found myself in love with places I’ve never been to and telling stories of people I’ve never met. My Kickstarter campaign raised over 1500% of its original funding goal with the support of over 1200 backers. 

 

Thank you 

Thanks so much for taking the time to find out about YOU ARE HERE.
Please back and share, together we can tell a story about the whole world!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Graeme, a young entreprenuer from Liverpool. After graduating from an E-Business degree I have started a number of small investments, but never had an idea as exciting or fun as this one.

Legz/Bumz was a concept developed whilst my wife was working at a printing company, after developing a fun prototype of white ski salopets with a set of provocative girls legs on the front I trialled them in Tignes. The reaction was amazing, I barely passed a person who did not drop a comment and I can tell these will be a real hit with skiers and snowboarders who love the limelight.

At the moment I do not have the funds to bring these into mass production, but after working closely with a snowsports clothing production company of late I have all the expertise needed to bring BUMZ to the mass market.

What We Need & What You Get

I need at least $6000 to get the initial 100% prototype manufactured and delivered in order to bring these to some retail outlets. The money will also help develop a website to conduct point to point orders if selling through an established outlet does not take off.

If I dont reach my entire goal, the funds will go on developing a small MOQ with an OEM manufacturer to generate a small stock which will be sold on my website. The product will be marketed through a number of giveaways in cult snowsports magazines.

All pledges of £40+ will recieve a set of the originals bums when they are produced, pledges of less will receieve a money off voucher to the sum of their pledge from the BUMZ range.

The Impact

The impact of this product is seen on day one, if you have a set of these on, you immediatly become the talking point, centre of attention and break the ice with anyone you would like. perfect in the snowy weather!

Other Ways You Can Help

If anyone would like to help without funding, expertise in SQL linked web design and Chinese supply chain manufacturing would be useful!

story:
Hey Indiegogo-

Thanks for checking out our project. Bigote Sneakers are uniquely styled, high top sneakers inspired by traditional Incan textiles. Our sneakers are handmade by Andean artisans in Peru.  

The inspiration for Bigote Sneaker Co. came when Isaac took a semester off University to backpack in Latin America. While traveling in Peru Isaac found and purchased a pair of textile sneakers. When Isaac returned to the USA he received an abundance of compliments from friends, family, and strangers- some folks even offered to buy them off his feet. We identified the overwhelming interest in textile sneakers and a lack of accessibility as a problem. We have designed unique stylish sneakers and contracted a small family owned and operated factory in Lima, Peru.

We need $3000 to finance our product launch. Expenditures include financing our initial production run and paying artisans to create additional designs for Bigote Sneaker Co. With your support we will be able to bring our designs to life. Please support at whatever level you are comfortable with. We will pay you back with fashionable sneakers that you are sure to love.

As a supporter you get a pair of Bigote Sneakers in the style and size of your choice. We are developing additional styles that are not featured in the project gallery. Let us know if you are interested in taking a look, we'd love to hear your feedback! Our T-shirts feature the Bigote Sneaker Co. logo printed on an organic cotton t-shirt. Your choice of black or white on a v-neck or crew neck. 

Check out additonal photos in the project gallery!

The Impact

We are excited to be offering a unique, stylish, high quality product that supports the traditional Incan cultures producing our product. We will work towards a fair trade certification that guarantees a living wage for our manufactures employees. Well be working closely with our manufacturer to ensure a living wage for their employees. We have calculating a living wage using Fair Wage Guide. We also plan on initiating a membership in One Percent for the Planet. As a member of 1% for the Planet we will be committed to donating 1% of our sales to a network of more than 3000 approved environmental organizations. Also, we will be supporting the Fair Indigo Foundation by giving customers the opportunity to make a donation at check out.  We are striving to ensure the environmental and social responsibility of our company. Let us know if you have suggestions!

Check out our website. Join our email list if you are interested in learning more!

story:
First thing: Click above to stay informed about this campaign.

 

Help to Launch ONE DRESS UNITED™

Get involved and lay the groundwork to establish a sustainable, employee-owned dressmaking business for a group of unemployed, single mothers in Southern Haiti.


In mid-2012 Pathfinder Missions recognized a need among impoverished single mothers in Haiti: the women could not afford the uniforms required for their children to attend school. So Pathfinder built a sewing center equipped with a dozen sewing machines to enable these women to make the uniforms for their children and others.

Now Rachel Rose Cost, Founder of One Dress United™ a social business initiative of Her Worth International will help these women establish a sustainable, employee-owned dressmaking business.

During Thanksgiving Week 2012, Rachel is traveling to Haiti to assess existing resources, establish local contacts, determine outstanding needs and develop a business plan that will lead to a systematic dressmaking operation.

Once dressmaking operations are established, One Dress United™ will launch an eCommerce store with just one dress for sale. When a dress is ordered, another dress will be donated – a school uniform for a child in need. All the dresses will be made by the newly created employee-owned business operating under fair trade practices.

The system created to launch One Dress United™ in Southern Haiti will be a seed that can be planted in other communities to benefit women around the world.

It all starts by stepping out in faith with a spirit of generosity.

How You Can Step Out & Make a Difference:

Every contribution matters in these first steps of launching One Dress United™
As appreciation for your generous contribution you will receive the following gifts:

Contribute $25 and receive a One Dress United™ Postcard from Rachel during her trip to Haiti.

Contribute $100 and receive a Postcard and Photobook, documenting Rachel's trip to Haiti in beautifully designed words and images.

And larger Contributions will make double the impact. As part of this initial mission trip, One Dress United™ is coming alongside local Haitian, Pastor Dieupie in his amazing effort to build up a new school in the remote village of Mont Fleury. This school must cover the cost to educate 100 students. The families must also purchase school uniforms for their children, a considerable expense for these families. Therefore when you help launch One Dress United™ you will also make the following immediate impact for children in need:

Contribute $200 and receive a Postcard, Photobook plus Sponsorship in your name of a Complete Uniform Set for one child enrolled at Mont Fleury School.

Contribute $500 and receive a Postcard, Photobook plus Sponsorship in your name of One Year of Schooling for One Child enrolled at Mont Fleury School.
 
 
NOTE: All contributors will be credited on the website as well as in the Photobook. Any money contributed beyond the Campaign Goal of $2500 will go towards Phase II of establishing dress-making business operations.
 

Other Ways You Can Help:

You may not be able to contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t make an impact:

Spread the word about this campaign to all your friends.

Use the social share tools at the top of this page!

story:
CHECK OUT OUR EXCLUSIVE NEW PERK-HOODIE AND A SHOW!

FOR THE LAST 5 DAYS OF OUR CAMPAIGN WE ARE OFFERING THE 12-WAYS-TO-WEAR DRESS PLUS A TICKET TO OUR FIRST MAJOR FASHION EVENT IN NYC! THERE CAN BE NO DEAL LIKE THIS EVER! GO FOR IT WHILE IT LASTS!

AND WEAR THE DRESS TO THE SHOW!

 

 

IT ALL BEGAN WITH AN IDEA-TO MAKE FUNCTIONAL CLOTHING FROM SUSTAINABLE FABRICS IN AN ETHICAL WAY

         In 2009 I established my company for clothing design and manufacturing- DeDesign. I began exploring how to pare down garment design, reduce structure to a minimum, and celebrate the purity of simple forms.

        A simple concept for a convertible garment grew into a whole line of fully reversible dresses, which transform in seconds into almost every articles of clothing--from long to short dresses, long to short skirts, from skirt to a dress,from a dress to a top, from a top to a hooded cape.

     I named the garments TRAVALEER, because they embody the concept of travel--traveling along the body, and making a grea  travel piece.

TRAVALEER ® is now a registered Trade Mark of my convertible garments.

       The idea of the sustainable multifunctional cloths for travel and leisure has got many supporters.But costumers are asking for different colors and buyers for large stores and small boutiques alike look for more variety in size and color, to satisfy various tastes.

    To make the concept a reality, to create a sustainable brand and bring it to the large market, I need to make the dresses in more than one color and expand the sizes.The dresses are fully developed and ready to go for production. I have established a relationship with manufacturers of fabric and sewing facilities.

ALL WE NEED IS YOUR SUPPORT AND YOU GET OUR

UNIQUE PERKS!

1.HOODIE DRESS

 

 

 

The Hoodie is our first beloved garment, which set the beginning of it all.  Laid back,blanket-like double faced fabric, with soft drape and a snug fit,it offers anything from a polished black dress, to a cozy poncho and a hooded cape. You will love this charming garment  for early Fall and late Summer nights, as well as deep into the Winter. 

Machine-washable and non-wrinkle. 

 

 

2. The BAMBOO SLINKY DRESS

 

 

This dress is our pride--sleek,luxurious, pliable,soft,non-wrinkle, moister wicking and completely elegant! At the same time you can throw it in a bag ,and the next time you reach for it and put it on it will look as fabulous as when you put it on the last time!It is made from 92 % bamboo and some spandex gives it the pliable stretch and elasticity.Bamboo is a natural sustainable fiber, grows fast and does not need pesticides. The dress stands up to its name-SLINKY-it turns inside-out and upside-down with ease,and fits the body snugly and comfortably. With its unique raching technique on the side seams, it is thoroughly flattering to every body type! 

Machine washable and non-wrinkle. 

 

 

The TRAVALEER GOLD DRESS: 

 This dress is the apotheosis of the TRAVALEER collection-we still have not figured out its complexity! There is something almost magical in this garment! When I was developing it I was not aware of its possibilities. When the sample came out and we tried it on it revealed so many different variations, that we had to write down and draw each one right away,so that we can remember them all! As of now it transforms in almost 100 ways of  remarkable cocktail and party dresse with peplums and open backs, off the shoulder, caped and hooded ones.They are all so magnificent,and compete with each other for elegance, mystique and beauty!

TAKE THE UNIQUE OPORTUNITY TO OWN THIS MYSTERIOUS PIECE AND BECOME A PART OF OUR STORY! 

 ONLY ONE OF 2 PROTOTYPES IS AVAILABLE!

 

 

The DOUBLE BUBBLE DRESS: 

 

This is our easy piece, a flamboyant beach wrap, flawlessly draping up and down the body,very casual and visually striking  at the same time. It is the very basic of what convertible should be-the simplest of forms-a TUBE-that  travels along the body transforming along the way.This dress was also a "surprise baby", since the original sketches were only of a 4-way-wrap dress,and after it was done and fit it revealed 40 long and short skirts and dresses, tops and scarves.

One size fits all. Machine washable and non-wrinkle.  

Only one of 2 prototypes is available!

These dresses will not be produced in the same fabric again, so they are only available now and exclusively to our IndiGoGo supporters!

 KEY FEATURES OF THE GARMENTS: 

1. Less-is-more—our motto and mantra of sustainability- less-is more when we use sustainable and organic fabrics; less-is-more for producing locally rather than importing overseas; less-is-more for making small productions, rather than fast chain fashion; less-is-more for developing mindful designs with less fabric for multifunctional use.

2. More-for-less—is what you get for spending on only one piece that transforms into many!  

3. Each garment provides you with almost all different articles of clothing- long/short skirt, long/short dress, skirt-and-top, tops, hooded tops and hooded dresses, capes and hooded capes.

4. Each garment is fully reversible (with no back side) with two different colors on the two sides, giving you 2 colors of each variation.

5. Season-less- bare shoulder summer dress transforms into a snug poncho in the fall and hooded cape in the winter.

6. Dress-it-up-or-dress-it-down- these pieces epitomize this concept quite literary by traveling up and down the body; pull your pencil skirt from work to cocktail dress for happy hour in seconds; wrap your poncho on a cool airplane flight, pull it down into a sleek dress on stepping on the airport!

7. Effortless change- refer to our videos to see how easy it is to change from one variation to another in any possible place you go. Our models did it on the stage!

8. Comfort fit- adjustable lengths, styles and sizes in all of the variations that the garments sustain.

8. Soft luxurious fabrics- I and my assistants have gone out of our way in finding the best fabrics and fabric manufacturers to suite the design of the garments-- bamboo/spandex, cotton/rayon, bamboo/lurex- they are all produced locally and knit to order for the TARVALEER dresses.

10. Wardrobe in a bag-pack light, safe extra luggage fees for that flight, and have a piece for any occasion for long and short travel in any climate.

LITTLE HISTORY:
       I invested three years into fabric and market research, samples' development and a small run production. I also invested my love and personal funds into this project, with the idea to create a sustainable brand; a brand that is responsive to our changing environment, frequent travels and busy schedules.

        The journey of the TRAVALEER so far has not been an easy one.I am a one woman company and  I don't come from a manufacturing background, but rather from the creative field of art and design. But I wanted to have full control over the manufacturing process of my designs- I wanted to know how and where the fabric was knit, to produce the fabric and the sewing locally and to use organic and sustainable fabrics when possible.

       I found out hands on the hurdles of manufacturing. Since my product involves an industrial technology for the double-faced fabric knitting, as well as the sewing technique, I had to use big manufactories who have the machinery for my production. That means high minimums on fabric orders and sewing quantities. Since I sponsored my project with personal funds this restricted me to ordering only one color of fabric, and negotiating for the smallest possible batch of production that a factory would be willing to make.

WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT THE TRAVALEER?

      We've been called the dress engineers, for implementing such intricate construction into a flowing design.

      It is true, I spent most of the design development  diligently  constructing each piece according to the body structure and mechanics, so that the pieces could fit when worn in each different variation,  transform effortlessly from one variation to another, and are comfortable to wear in each and every way.

      What we achieved with the help of my pattern makers,graphic designer, my models in countless long fitting sessions, is an amazing product!


HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE DISTRIBUTED:

      If our campaign is fully funded we will have approximately  $ 5000.00  for the production of each one of the 4 dresses.

We will be able to make 300 dresses of each style in 3 different colors.

      2/3 of the funds will be used for fabric, 1/3 for sewing and the rest- for freight and distribution.

     If our campaign is not fully funded, unfortunately we won't be able to venture into manufacturing. But we will use the funds to market the brand and attract investors and buyers for pre-ordering production.

 

     EVEN THOUGH I'M A ONE-WOMAN COMPANY MANY PEOPLE HELPED ON THE WAY TO SETTING UP THE BUSINESS,PRODUCT TESTING,GRAPHIC DESIGN AND PRESENTATION. THANK YOU TO ALL!

 

      ANOTHER WAY TO HELP OUR CAMPAIGN IS BY FOLLOWING IT ON INDIGOGO,SHARING WITH FRIENDS,MAKING A NOISE ABOUT IT AND LIKING IT ON OUR FACEBOOK PAGE.USE THE POWERFUL INDIGOGO SHARING TOLLS.

 

                               GOOD TRAVELS WITH THE TRAVALEER... 

 

               THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Short Summary

Hi guys as you know I wear sunglasses a lot, it's like I never take them off. So I though shoot, I need to make some OVERBOARD SHADES!

These shades are going to be classic Overboardhumor red with a BLACK Overboardhumor logo on the side!

These are going to be the first batch of Overboard Shades. I hope to raise enough money to start up my own Sunglasses company!

What We Need & What You Get

So here is the deal:

These glasses are going to be sold for $15 on overboardhumor.com once we get the first batch made.

However if you donate to this cause now you can get them for a much cheaper price (see perks for details)

The Impact

As most you know my goal in life it to promote and spread laughter. These Shades are physical representation of that! By wearing these we can spread laughter togther! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

More ways you can help is just spreading the word around!

Thanks!!!!!!

Garrett Garcia

AKA OVERBOARDHUMOR

story:
A straight line, every time.

What is it?

The Perfect Part is a durable, stylish comb that any man can use to create his perfect hairstyle. The design features two sturdy combs, bound by a spring-loaded lever, so that anyone can quickly achieve The Perfect Part.

We believe The Perfect Part is the best comb – the best styling tool – you’ll ever own. Here’s why:

  • It’s simple. Just three easy steps lead you to The Perfect Part: wet it, part it, comb it and you’re done.
  • It’s unique. Its cutting edge design and smooth functionality makes it a must-have for your daily routine.
  • It’s convenient. In fact, it’s small enough to keep in your pocket.
  • It’s well-made. The Perfect Part is designed, manufactured and shipped from the United States.
  • It’s sharp. The jointed comb gives you a modern trendsetting design with a sleek finish.
  • It’s stylish. Using The Perfect Part will give you a straight, tidy part that’s trendy and fashionable.    

How does it work?

The Perfect Part works in just three easy steps:

1. Wet it: Wet your hair.

2. Part it: Place the comb at the top of your head at the desired location where you would like to part your hair. Once in place, simply squeeze the finger grips on the tabs and push down lightly. The fine teeth of the comb will automatically part your hair into a Perfect Part.

3. Comb it: Pull the comb off of your head and it will snap back into a traditional comb, which can be easily used for finishing touches or touch-ups throughout the day.

Why The Perfect Part?

Just this year, founder Travis switched up his style and began gravitating toward what he calls the “strong side part” – best described as the classic gentleman’s side part, a style that has caught on with today’s young male professionals just like him across the country.

The classic side part is a timeless look, created using one simple tool: the comb. The comb is a basic tool that has remained mostly unchanged throughout history: a straight piece of plastic used to style hair. It was time to re-invent the comb, and to give men everywhere the ability to make sure their hair looks great every single day. He wanted to provide a sleek look that takes less time to achieve.

THE STORY:

After spending hours each week styling his hair, Travis became frustrated. Travis realized that he was ready and in need for something new. He knew it shouldn’t take so long to achieve such a simple style - one that had become a staple of his everyday look. From zigzags in his part to stray hairs messing up his style, he grew impatient each morning, re-wetting, re-styling, re-parting his hair until he got it right. He wondered how such a classic, “simple” hairstyle could possibly take so much time and concentration to achieve.

Then, a light bulb went off: Travis envisioned a product that would help him easily create their perfect hairstyle and reduce the amount of time spent each morning styling his hair. Surely, if he felt a need for this, others would too. And the idea for a spring-loaded, two-comb tool – soon to be known as The Perfect Part – was born in his New York City apartment.

Once the idea was born, it was time to take action. He knew he was on to something, based on the simple fact that this product would undoubtedly improve his own life and routine. If it could work for him, it could do the same for others. So Travis began sketching out different ways the comb could look, then approached a manufacturer and began working with their engineer to develop the most durable, high-quality design. 

Why – and how – you should get behind The Perfect Part:

With our design finalized, we are ready to begin production, but we need your financial and social resources to make our project a success. In order for The Perfect Part to be successful, we need to raise enough financial capital – “cash” – to cover the costs for building our production tool and filling orders.

To accomplish our social goals, we ask that you help us reach as many people as possible! Tell your friends, family, strangers, boyfriends, husbands, best friends, coworkers – anyone and everyone – about The Perfect Part. Please help us spread the word via Instagram, Twitter, Facebook; however you’d like.

Dress Socks with the PP Logo (Content is 75% Moisture Wicking Material/23% Stretch Nylon/ 2% Elastic)

What you get by backing The Perfect Part

Check out the perks section on the right; financial donations of a certain amount can get you a free Perfect Part, a pair of dress socks designed by Travis with the Perfect Part logo and more.

What are the comb details?

At the moment, we offer just one size, color (clear) and style. We plan to offer additional products, sizes and colors in the near future on our website,www.theperfect-part.com (coming soon). The comb dimensions are 5.225” (length) x 2” (height) x .865” (depth). 

What if you don't raise enough funds before the deadline? 

If we don't raise all $20,000 by the completion of this campaign, all funders will be issued a full refund. This means that your donation is completely risk-free. You'll either receive the perk you chose or get your money back, depending on whether we meet our goal.

What if you raise excess funds on Indiegogo? Where will that money go?

See image at the bottom of the page for a breakdown of how your donations will be used to fund the project. Any additional money raised in excess of our goal will be directly reinvested into the company, and will be used to fund the following additional elements:

1. Launch of our website, www.tailoredavenue.com

2. The production of additional colors

3. Legal costs

How do I know I’ll love The Perfect Part?

Travis spent weeks asking friends, family and coworkers who rock the gentleman’s side part whether or not they have ever had a problem parting their hair. Typical feedback received included “It’s not easy, but I do it”; “It takes too long”; “The line is never straight or how I want it” and more. When Travis explained his product, all of these gentlemen were intrigued and excited to try it out. We are confident you will feel the same way.

What about quality?

The Perfect Part is designed for strength and durability using the best materials on the market. The combs are constructed of polypropylene plastic and a zinc plated torsion spring. This is a premium high quality product that men will be proud to carry around.

Why we know The Perfect Part will work for you:

If you’ve ever used a standard comb, this product will work for you. For best results, the product should be used on wet hair.


THANK YOU!

We thank you in advance for your support and for taking the time to learn about The Perfect Part. We truly appreciate it!

Let’s keep in touch. Reach out to Travis at any time at travis@tailoredavenue.com

Help us follow our dream. Together, we can give the world a Perfect Part.

PATENTS/TRADEMARKS:

Patent Pending – As of June 18, 2013

Trademark Pending – As of June 6, 2013 (The Perfect Part)

 


Feel free to watch the video again, since we know you enjoyed it!

Shipping Questions

Perks include free ground shipping in the U.S.  For international orders, please note that there will be a $15 shipping charge, per perk, for all international orders.  This does not include additional fees due to customs or other shipping costs to your country.

For international orders, if you do not include the additional $15 per device to your contribution, please make a new contribution via Indiegogo for $15 per perk. Email your original order confirmation and the additional shipping confirmation to: travis@tailoredavenue.com.

With our design finalized, we are ready to
begin production, but we need your financial and social resources to
make our project a success. In order for The Perfect
Part to be successful, we need to raise enough financial capital –
“cash” – to cover the costs for building our production tool and filling
orders.
To accomplish our social goals, we ask that you
help us reach as many people as possible! Tell your friends, family,
strangers, boyfriends, husbands, best friends, coworkers – anyone and everyone
– about The Perfect Part. Please help us spread the
word via Instagram, Twitter, Facebook; however you’d
like.


Dress Socks with the PP Logo (Content is 75% Moisture Wicking Material/23% Stretch Nylon/ 2% Elastic)

What you get by backing The Perfect Part
Check out the perks section on the right;
financial donations of a certain amount can get you a free Perfect
Part, a pair of dress socks designed by Travis with the Perfect
Part logo and more.
What are the comb details?
At the moment, we offer just one size, color
(clear) and style. We plan to offer additional products, sizes and colors in
the near future on our website,www.theperfect-part.com (coming
soon). The comb dimensions are 5.225” (length) x 2” (height) x .865”
(depth). 
What if you don't raise enough funds before the deadline? 
If we don't raise all $20,000 by the completion of this campaign, all funders will be issued a full refund. This means that your donation is completely risk-free. You'll either receive the perk you chose or get your money back, depending on whether we meet our goal.
What if you raise excess funds on Indiegogo?
Where will that money go?
See image at the bottom of the page for a
breakdown of how your donations will be used to fund the project. Any
additional money raised in excess of our goal will be directly reinvested into
the company, and will be used to fund the following additional elements:
1. Launch of our website, www.tailoredavenue.com
2. The production of additional colors
3. Legal costs
How do I know I’ll love The Perfect
Part?
Travis spent weeks asking friends, family and
coworkers who rock the gentleman’s side part whether or not they have ever had
a problem parting their hair. Typical feedback received included “It’s not
easy, but I do it”; “It takes too long”; “The line is never straight or how I
want it” and more. When Travis explained his product, all of these gentlemen
were intrigued and excited to try it out. We are confident you will feel the
same way.
What about quality?
The Perfect Part is designed for
strength and durability using the best materials on the market. The combs are
constructed of polypropylene plastic and a zinc plated torsion spring. This is
a premium high quality product that men will be proud to carry around.
Why we know The Perfect Part will
work for you:
If you’ve ever used a
standard comb, this product will work for you. For best results, the product
should be used on wet hair.

THANK YOU!
We thank you in advance for your support and
for taking the time to learn about The Perfect Part. We
truly appreciate it!
Let’s keep in touch. Reach out to Travis at any
time at travis@tailoredavenue.com
Help us follow our dream. Together, we
can give the world a Perfect Part.
PATENTS/TRADEMARKS:
Patent Pending – As of June 18, 2013
Trademark Pending – As of
June 6, 2013 (The Perfect Part)
 






Feel free to watch the video again, since we know you enjoyed it!
Shipping Questions
Perks include free ground shipping in the U.S.  For international orders, please note that there will be a $15 shipping charge, per perk, for all international orders.  This does not include additional fees due to customs or other shipping costs to your country.
For international orders, if you do not include the additional $15 per device to your contribution, please make a new contribution via Indiegogo for $15 per perk. Email your original order confirmation and the additional shipping confirmation to: travis@tailoredavenue.com.

story:
Welcome to “PROJEKT K”

What is Projekt K you ask?

Projekt K is a fundraising campaign that we have developed in order to raise a minimum amount of money for the startup costs of Inked Industries Clothing Co. With “K” being the middle letter in the word, “Inked,” we decided to use that as an iconic symbol of our logo. Hence, “Projekt K” has begun.

About us

Based out of Los Angeles, California, Inked Industries is a tattoo influenced, art driven lifestyle apparel brand that combines parallel sub-cultures. Owner, Robert Cefola, has created different apparel brands over the last several years and is committed to turning his newest brand into the next major name on the market. Inked Industries would like to become vastly engrained in the tattoo industry, as well as the Skate, Surf, BMX, FMX, Motocross and MMA areas. However, Inked Industries is not defined by any one culture. It represents a culturally aware community of all ages and walks of life, not only in the United States, but world-wide.

 

What We Need

We are looking to raise a Total of 19,500 dollarsfor startup costs.  This will enable us to pay for a new LLC in California, graphic artists for more designs on our t-shirts, an E-commerce website, copy-writes, and to bring our designer denim ideas from concept to product. So far, Inked Industries has been 100% self-funded. We believe so much in this business that we are ready and willing to continue to self-fund as much as we possibly can. We are only asking for what we need right now, and every little bit can be used. Fashion is one of the most common forms of self-expression. It is an art in itself and every one of us is a walking masterpiece.

Description of how funds will be distributed.

            Business expenses

$300    Submission for a California based LLC and California Vendors license.
$600    Copywrite artwork.
$800    Trademarks.
$1500  E-Commerce Website done by Brodsky Designs.
$1500  Vendor supplies and signage.
$2000  Development of designer denim.
$5000  Development of new designs from Tattoo Artists.
$5000  Inventory.

 

Miscellaneous Expenses

$2000  Product rewards to our loyal supporters.  (This includes packaging and shipping costs.)
$800    4% Fee to Indiegogo (if our monetary goal is met.)

 

What sort of rewards are we offering for your contributions?

We have spent a lot of time trying to determine what we could give back to you for your support! The truth is that we could never give back enough. However, here is the breakdown of the rewards you will receive if you decide to contribute to our project.

$3        A personal thank you on our new custom website.
$24      Personalized thank you card from sendoutcards.com plus our website thank you.
$89      1 Original Inked Industries T-shirt. (Mens or Womens.)
$119    2 Original Inked Industries T-Shirts and a Hat. (Mens or Womens.)
$224    2 newly designed T-Shirts. (Mens or Womens.)
$500    4 newly designed T-Shirts and 2 hats. (Mens or Womens.)
$1000  6 T-shirts (4 newly designed and 2 original), and 2 hats. (Mens or Womens.)

  • Please see project images to view our original and a select few of our newly designed t-shirts.
  • Any contribution of $3 or more will receive a formal thank you acknowledgement on our company website.

Ok, so what happens when we surpass our fundraising goal?

Once we have met our goal, any funds over the required amount will go towards producing more garments for our customers, as well as designing completely new styles. Every single dollar helps, and we will be eternally grateful for your contribution.

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you cannot contribute at this time. Perhaps there is some other way to support the fund:

  • Please share this page. Make some noise, via facebook, twitter, instagram, your blog or even LinkedIn.
  • Get the word out about Projekt K. Use the share tools on this page to show your friends and family our project. 

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
The project Avidox Design is to create a laboratory for the production of ceramics, tiles, flooring, household objects, objects for lighting, mosaics, furniture accessories, picture frames, decorative panels, lava stone tables, decorations, borders, inserts.

We are a group of young people each one with specific skills (artisans, architects, design, designers, salespeople, managers, etc..), Live and work between the UK and Italy, and just from craftsmanship of our land which is the idea to produce and disseminate the works in the world of ceramic tiles.

Vietri sul Mare is a small town in southern Italy where there are artisans who produce hundreds of years of ceramics with the unique decor, a production made ​​by hand using the ancient techniques of the place.

Our project is to create a production center for the manufacturing of these product integrating the work of master craftsmanship modern equipment to develop a production that can meet the many demands of customers around the world.

Participating in this project besides me also architects, designers, engineers and researchers are constantly developing new forms, new designs, new techniques and new production technologies.

With our staff we can create custom designs anywhere in the world, just send us your designs, measurements of the places where carry out the work and in no time we can send the design by computer Kitchens, Bathrooms, Gardens, Bedroom bed, Salons.

Also we can produce works for businesses such as Hotels, Restaurants, Spa, Palaces, Facades of buildings, etc..

All made ​​strictly with tiles and colors that identify the style, harmony and elegance of the artisan culture of Vietri.

To further develop the knowledge of these products all over the world and to be close with the design and the professionalism of our staff in world markets very important, our project plans as well as the construction of the production plant in the city of Vietri sul Mare in Italy, also produces Avidox Store Design in London, New York, San Francisco, Toronto, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Shanghai, Beijing, Prague, Paris, Barcelona, Milan and Warsaw.

We want to start in these cities but surely over the years our object is to achieve Store in every major world capital.

We want, if we can in a short time, groped to participate in the exhibition The Big 5 - International Building & Construction (www.thebig5.ae) taking place from day 25 to 28 November at the World Trade Centre in Dubai (UAE). It would be very nice to show up already now in the world market of building and planning with our project which has already gotten a chance to go and realized.

The financial capital that we will collect will be used for the following purposes:

1. Realization of the Industrial Avidox Design in Vietri sul Mare (Italy);

2. Purchase of machinery and equipment for the production of ceramics

3. Opening of stores in London, New York, San Francisco, Toronto, Dubai,  Abu Dhabi, Shanghai, Beijing, Prague, Paris, Barcelona, Milan and Warsaw.

4. Participation in trade fairs in the world for the presentation of the product.

We hope and trust in your help to make this our project.

To all those who decide to share this project with us and participate with donations, we will send gifts to thank you for your support to our idea. We are waiting ...

We will show now with videos and photos that we can achieve and how it is made​​:














F A Q

1.  Transportation charges for sending Perk are comprised?

1.1  Transport costs are included for the majority of countries, but we invite you to send an email to to the campaign you're subscribed to send us your information and ask if in your country are including shipping costs.

2.  What are the email addresses for communications?

2.2  For every perk email addresses are:

    perk7@avidoxdesign.com

    perk27@avidoxdesign.com

    perk40@avidoxdesign.com

    perk68@avidoxdesign.com

    perk135@avidoxdesign.com

    perk200@avidoxdesign.com

    perk680@avidoxdesign.com

    perk800@avidoxdesign.com

    perk1150@avidoxdesign.com

    perk1620@avidoxdesign.com

    perk2100@avidoxdesign.com

3  How should we send the information to enter the dedications on the products?

3.3  Only for Perk 27 (perk27@avidoxdesign.com), Perk 40 (perk40@avidoxdesign.com) and Perk 68 (perk68@avidoxdesign.com), after having joined the campaign we send you by mail the name or the dedication that you want to insert product.

4  We can add days stay in the Hotel Resort Spa for the Perk 1150, Perk 1620 and Perk 2100?

1.4  Perk 1150, Perk 1620 and Perk 2100 the offer of 3 days and two nights for two people at a Hotel Resort Spa in the corresponding location. You can add other days on request in the facilities listed, just send us an email request and after checking the availability we will send you the difference in costs to pay.

2.  The availability of the dates to book the rooms are to be verified?

5.5  After you have subscribed to one of our campaigns Perk 1150 (perk1150@avidoxdesign.com), Perk 1620 (perk1620@avidoxdesign.com) or Perk 2100 (perk2100@avidoxdesign.com) must send an email booking with the data of persons participating the living room and the dates you want to book in, a short time we give you the confirmation and the availability of places in the structures that we have selected for you.

6  You can also get assistance for booking flights?

6.6  We are connected with travel agents can assist you in acquiring the flights;

7  Until they have validity campaigns Perk 1150, Perk 1620 and Perk 2100

7.7  The campaigns Perk 1150, Perk 1620 or Perk 2100 are valid for the entire 2014 and 2015;

story:
----------------------------------------------------------------------
If you missed our IndieGoGo, 
you can order at http://ovrvision.com/preorder !
----------------------------------------------------------------------




UPDATE - October 17, 2013

Hello Everyone!

We would like to thank everyone who took an interest in our project and supported us. We are happily announcing that we collected in $7,193 USD from 56 individuals.

Although the campaign only reached 12% of our goal, we will of course still be sending the Vision Sensor to all those who made an order. Also the SDK will be made available at the same time.

As for specific shipping dates, more detailed information will be sent directly through email in the near future.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,
Mr. Yuhei Nishioka

＊日本の方々へ＊

皆様へ

私たちは、56名の方々から $7,193USD ものご支援をいただきましたことを大変光栄に思います。有難うございます！
目標金額の12％となってしまいましたが、ご支援いただいた方々には、VisionSensor本体の出荷とＳＤＫの提供を順次開始させていただきます。

出荷までの詳しいスケジュールは、メールにて連絡いたします。

ありがとうございました。
西岡


It is greatly felt that the future of the game industry as well as the entire world will be completely altered by the invention of an inexpensive immersive HMD, and we very much owe appreciation to Oculus VR for developing such a fine product.

As for us, while working on AR (augmented reality), we came across a few problems that we believed if adjusted, would leave users even more satisfied. The biggest problems we encountered were that you couldn’t use your hands and the obstruction of the viewing angle. We were convinced that the Oculus Rift was the first major product to fix these inconveniences, and in doing so, had created an AR device that was more immersive than anything which has come before. We completed our prototype, and developed it to be used in conjunction with the Oculus Rift. Our new product is the "Vision Sensor for Oculus Rift DevKit"!

WHAT HAPPENS IF WE DON’T REACH OUR GOAL?!

Regardless of how much we are able to collect during our fund raising effort, you can rest assured that all Vision Sensors purchased will be shipped and built to our contributors who have support us! 

Our parent company, Shinobiya.com Co., Ltd., plans on using the Vision Sensor in an amusement park maze built here in Japan. The goal of $60,000 is to help fund the construction of this attraction. Even if we don’t meet this monetary goal, we will be more than able to produce any amount of ordered units.

＊日本の方々へ＊

Oculus Riftという安価な没入型HMDの発明によってゲーム業界だけではなく世界が大きく変化すると感じており、それを開発するOculus VR社にはとても感謝しております。
我々はOculus Riftが登場する前から拡張現実（AR）について取り組んできましたが、今まで満足できるARシステムには行き着きませんでした。大きな問題としては、視野角不足と両手が使えないことでした。しかし、Oculus Riftの登場で、その抱えていた問題をクリアでき、究極のARデバイスができるのではないかと思いました。Oculus Riftを利用するという形で新しいデバイスの開発を始めプロトタイプまで完成したのが、この「VisionSensor for Oculus Rift DevKit」です。 

＜目標に到達しない場合＞

目標金額$60,000ドルに到達しない場合でもご支援して頂いた方には、製造し出荷をさせて頂きます。


Website : http://ovrvision.com/



Isn’t it disappointing that the size and shape of the Oculus Rift Consumer Version is different than the Oculus Rift DevKit1 (developer version)?


Vision Sensor is only for the Oculus Rift DevKit !　Vision Sensor currently only fits the Oculus Rift DevKit1.　


The Vision Sensor adds 3 new possibilities to the user experience!!

1. Immersive AR Experience

In conjunction with the Oculus Rift, top quality AR (Augmented Reality) can be experienced through an HMD with an immersive FoV (Field of View). In contrast to devices like smart phones and web cameras, the Vision Sensor gives an AR experience that incorporates the whole field of view. And through the use of both eyes, the available 3D depth perception makes the AR experience much more realistic.

* Under development

* Under development



2. Intuitive operation(Mixed Reality)

The high-speed image analysis capabilities of these cameras, enable your device to recognize hand movements in real-time. In this way, your fingers become an intuitive interface, replacing your keyboard and mouse. This now makes developing software for MR(Mixed Reality) with AR, a real possibility. The adding of real world space will create a brand new operating experience.

* Under development

* Under development


3. Regain Lost Vision

When wearing the Oculus Rift, your eyes are covered and it is impossible to see even nearby objects. So when you’re looking for something like your mouse or keyboard, you have to take off your goggles.
But now with the use of the Vision Sensor, you can be freed from the hassle of constantly putting on and taking off the Rift in order to see what’s in front of you. A simple swinging gesture from your hand in front of the camera will activate a sensor. With that easy movement, your current display will be replaced with a view of the real world.


Exclusive SDK Offer

C++、C#、Java, etc., are used as the main programming languages. With the included SDK, further development of image analysis and AR technology, as well as other functions, becomes simplified. The [Unity] plugin is supported, and does not require complex technical knowledge to operate. The Unity3D is easy to develop games, and anyone can easily program with it using our SDK.

* OpenCV

Technical Book

A technical book is provided in order to give support to users. It is filled with explanations on the contents of research we have been working on. Specific explanations on image analysis and AR are given, as well as research results on what is possible and not possible to do with them. Even a person without any knowledge at all on image analysis technology or AR can get started immediately with our provided source code and its accompanying commentary.



  • Interface Type, USB 2.0 (Wired)
  • Fish-eye lens corresponding to the Oculus Rift lens
  • Image resolution, 1280 x 480 pixels
  • 60fps fast speed, low-latency data transfer
  • Lightweight design of the total weight of 75g or less
  • Only for the Oculus Rift DevKit 1

Minimum System Requirements

  • Windows(Vista,7,8) or Mac OSX 10.7 Lion or Linux
  • Intel Core i3,i5,i7 processor or AMD Phenom II
  • 2GB RAM
  • USB 2.0 Port (UVC)


Vision Sensor is only for the Oculus Rift DevKit !　Vision Sensor currently only fits the Oculus Rift DevKit1.　

* BUY! OCULUS RIFT DEVKIT


Prototype


Special thanks

BGM by　あのにめんと

----------------------------------------------------------------------If you missed our IndieGoGo, you can order at http://ovrvision.com/preorder !----------------------------------------------------------------------






UPDATE - October 17, 2013

Hello Everyone!
We would like to thank everyone who took an interest in our project and supported us. We are happily announcing that we collected in $7,193 USD from 56 individuals.
Although the campaign only reached 12% of our goal, we will of course still be sending the Vision Sensor to all those who made an order. Also the SDK will be made available at the same time.
As for specific shipping dates, more detailed information will be sent directly through email in the near future.
If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,Mr. Yuhei Nishioka

皆様へ

It is greatly felt that the future of the game industry as well as the entire world will be completely altered by the invention of an inexpensive immersive HMD, and we very much owe appreciation to Oculus VR for developing such a fine product.
As for us, while working on AR (augmented reality), we came across a few problems that we believed if adjusted, would leave users even more satisfied. The biggest problems we encountered were that you couldn’t use your hands and the obstruction of the viewing angle. We were convinced that the Oculus Rift was the first major product to fix these inconveniences, and in doing so, had created an AR device that was more immersive than anything which has come before. We completed our prototype, and developed it to be used in conjunction with the Oculus Rift. Our new product is the "Vision Sensor for Oculus Rift DevKit"!

WHAT HAPPENS IF WE DON’T REACH OUR GOAL?!
Regardless of how much we are able to collect during our fund raising effort, you can rest assured that all Vision Sensors purchased will be shipped and built to our contributors who have support us! 
Our parent company, Shinobiya.com Co., Ltd., plans on using the Vision Sensor in an amusement park maze built here in Japan. The goal of $60,000 is to help fund the construction of this attraction. Even if we don’t meet this monetary goal, we will be more than able to produce any amount of ordered units.


＊日本の方々へ＊
Oculus Riftという安価な没入型HMDの発明によってゲーム業界だけではなく世界が大きく変化すると感じており、それを開発するOculus VR社にはとても感謝しております。我々はOculus Riftが登場する前から拡張現実（AR）について取り組んできましたが、今まで満足できるARシステムには行き着きませんでした。大きな問題としては、視野角不足と両手が使えないことでした。しかし、Oculus Riftの登場で、その抱えていた問題をクリアでき、究極のARデバイスができるのではないかと思いました。Oculus Riftを利用するという形で新しいデバイスの開発を始めプロトタイプまで完成したのが、この「VisionSensor for Oculus Rift DevKit」です。 

＜目標に到達しない場合＞
目標金額$60,000ドルに到達しない場合でもご支援して頂いた方には、製造し出荷をさせて頂きます。


Website : http://ovrvision.com/






Isn’t it disappointing that the size and shape of the Oculus Rift Consumer Version is different than the Oculus Rift DevKit1 (developer version)?





Vision Sensor is only for the Oculus Rift DevKit !　Vision Sensor currently only fits the Oculus Rift DevKit1.　

The Vision Sensor adds 3 new possibilities to the user experience!!






1. Immersive AR Experience

In conjunction with the Oculus Rift, top quality AR (Augmented Reality) can be experienced through an HMD with an immersive FoV (Field of View). In contrast to devices like smart phones and web cameras, the Vision Sensor gives an AR experience that incorporates the whole field of view. And through the use of both eyes, the available 3D depth perception makes the AR experience much more realistic.

* Under development




* Under development





2. Intuitive operation(Mixed Reality)
The high-speed image analysis capabilities of these cameras, enable your device to recognize hand movements in real-time. In this way, your fingers become an intuitive interface, replacing your keyboard and mouse. This now makes developing software for MR(Mixed Reality) with AR, a real possibility. The adding of real world space will create a brand new operating experience.


* Under development





* Under development
3. Regain Lost VisionWhen wearing the Oculus Rift, your eyes are covered and it is impossible to see even nearby objects. So when you’re looking for something like your mouse or keyboard, you have to take off your goggles.But now with the use of the Vision Sensor, you can be freed from the hassle of constantly putting on and taking off the Rift in order to see what’s in front of you. A simple swinging gesture from your hand in front of the camera will activate a sensor. With that easy movement, your current display will be replaced with a view of the real world.






Exclusive SDK Offer





C++、C#、Java, etc., are used as the main programming languages. With the included SDK, further development of image analysis and AR technology, as well as other functions, becomes simplified. The [Unity] plugin is supported, and does not require complex technical knowledge to operate. The Unity3D is easy to develop games, and anyone can easily program with it using our SDK.
* OpenCV

Technical Book





A technical book is provided in order to give support to users. It is filled with explanations on the contents of research we have been working on. Specific explanations on image analysis and AR are given, as well as research results on what is possible and not possible to do with them. Even a person without any knowledge at all on image analysis technology or AR can get started immediately with our provided source code and its accompanying commentary.















Interface Type, USB 2.0 (Wired)


Fish-eye lens corresponding to the Oculus Rift lens


Image resolution, 1280 x 480 pixels

60fps fast speed, low-latency data transfer

Lightweight design of the total weight of 75g or less

Only for the Oculus Rift DevKit 1

Minimum System Requirements


Windows(Vista,7,8) or Mac OSX 10.7 Lion or Linux


Intel Core i3,i5,i7 processor or AMD Phenom II


2GB RAM

USB 2.0 Port (UVC)
