story:
Let's talk PowerKnots!

    Each individual PowerKnot comes equipped with:
      • 3.7v (enough voltage to charge your device quickly)
      • 5200mAh (enough power to charge your phone up to 3 times!)
      • Li-ion battery pack (same battery technology used in your mobile device)


    The PowerKnots are guaranteed to charge your device fully (100%) as many times as it converts to your devices internal battery capacity (see Charging Chart below).
      Each PowerKnot is detachable from the charging station and can be taken with you anywhere. Each PowerKnot is equipped with a 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack, packed full of power, this equates to a total power storage of: 20,800mAh (4 piece w/charging station), 31,200mAh (6 pack w/o charging station), 41,600mAh (8 piece (w/charging station, limited to this campaign)). That's a lot of power, you will NEVER be out of touch with your world, unless you break your phone :-o or you're in the wilderness for a few weeks without at least 6 PowerKnots. :-)
        Specifications

          • Waterproof casing!
          • Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10")
          • 700 recharging cycles per PowerKnot!
          • Retractable USB stick, to protect it from damage.
          • Offered coverage plan for parts, repairs and battery replacement! (additional, nominal cost, inquiry after campaign)
          • 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion, w/custom cells battery pack, fully recharges most smartphones 3+ times!
          • Compatible with 5000+ USB capable products!
          • Output 5v/1A
          • 90-240v for international use!
          • CE, RoHS, and FCC Certifiable
          • Simultaneously recharges while connected to any USB input (i.e. Laptop, desktop, wall charger, car charger, etc.). Charge your device and your PowerKnot at the same time!
          • Smart charging! No on/off switch, when your device is plugged in it begins charging, when it's charged it shuts off and reserves the battery until you're ready for your next charge!
          • 5 color choices (orange, blue, green, gray or black)
          • Our smooth, sleek, round edges delivers a safe, logical design!
          • 2 LED indicator lights one to determine when your device is charged and one to determine when the PowerKnot is fully charged/low (LED will remain green for as long as there is power to charge a device and will turn yellow when it is low.)

        The problem...

        In this generation we are always on-the-move and mobile technology is not slack in keeping up with our busy lifestyles. Top brands readily design and redesign mobile devices to do practically ANYTHING in the palm of our hands, making them more and more user friendly to the point where our devices have become an extension to our everyday lives. However, keeping these advanced devices powered has become a major problem and with every upgrade it only gets worse -- they have yet to resolve it! So, if we are moving forward and mobile technology is moving forward, shouldn't the way we stay connected and in touch with our world be moving in the same direction? That's where we come in! Keep scrolling, you won't regret it!


        Battery life has become a major problem and as the problem continues to grow, battery life continues to fail to keep up with the advancements of their counterparts; with the growing use of mobile devices to do anything from getting us from point A to point B to taking photos, texting, video chatting, dating, browsing the internet, shopping, interacting with your friends, fans and followers on your social networks and much more, battery life has become scarce and rather limited; the days of getting throughout a single day on one battery charge are over! Studies have shown an extraordinary increase in mobile device usage over the years and has suggested that we use our phone more than any other similarly valuable object in our lives (i.e. computers, tablets, cars, house keys, television, etc.).


          It doesn't matter where we are or what we're doing, we're always checking our phones. Clearly our phones are the engine to our social lives, so it might be a good idea to always have power ready to back us up when our phone battery has run its course.

          The real solution...

          If you're a smartphone user you know firsthand that power is scarce and once you phone loses power, you're pretty much out of luck. That is the main reasons why we created the PowerKnots - this product is compatible with 5000+ USB enabled devices and can keep practically ANY USB capable device powered!

          This is where we ended up...
          The first born...
          Although our brain wrenching revisions gave birth to this, singular beautiful, patent pending, logically designed, travel sized device, we weren't quite done and in fact an additional three (3) were created, thus creating the four (4) piece unit, then a six (6) pack, and lastly the limited edition eight (8) piece unit, along with an all-in-one charging station (a one source charging station for all the PowerKnots and any USB device you connect to the charging station!).


          Just a glimpse at the passion that went into the design of the block itself. Designed to keep your device powered and to keep your PowerKnots safe from damage.


          Backup power storage never before seen or offered in this fashion! Get a four piece w/5200mAh each & a charging station for less than the price of one, quality 6000mAh backup battery!


          It's like taking a huge power bank and breaking it into little, even more powerful, portable units; with a drastic decrease in the cost of owning one of these powerful units!



          The PowerKnots first introduction to the world! At a coPhilly, PHLMade tech event in Philadelphia, PA!

          What exactly are the PowerKnots?
          The PowerKnots are the worlds first, patent pending, multi-unit (4, 6, or 8 piece), high powered (3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack per PowerKnot), travel sized backup batteries (take them anywhere!) & charging station that truly fits your lifestyle - the ideal product for the growing need of backup power on-the-go!


          Choosing has never been so easy!
          #1. $75-$89 (during this campaign, slightly more afterwards), 4pcs, total power storage 20,800mAh!
          #2. $40-$100, 1pc, total power storage 4000mAh. But seriously, this isn't a price battle, although we beat them in that area, too! ;-)

          Why choose the PowerKnots over the other guys?

            • Choose from a 6 pack (PowerKnots only), a 4 piece unit w/charging station or an 8 piece unit w/charging station (limited to this campaign).
            • Experience the same speed of charging as if your device was plugged into a car port or wall outlet.
            • Smart charging! No on/off switch, when your device is plugged into a PowerKnot it begins charging instantly, when it's charged it shuts off until you're ready for your next charge!
            • 700 recharging cycles per PowerKnot!
            • Offered coverage plan for parts, repairs and battery replacement!
            • One charging station for all the PowerKnots & your mobile device to be recharged at one time!
            • Smarter, compact & safer design!
            • Simultaneous charging and recharging capability of the PowerKnots!
            • Cost effective!
            • High Powered (3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack in each of the PowerKnots!) 3+ recharges for most smart phones!
            • Take them anywhere (easily store them)
            • Store them in different locations for that "just in case" moment (i.e. car, work desk, bag, purse, coat/jacket pocket, etc.)
            • Break free of the electrical outlet, so much power you'll rarely use your wall charger!
            • Select from 5 color options: green, orange, blue, black & gray!
            • Get better quality and more quantity for your money!

          "Why do I need more than one backup battery?"

          So why do you need so many? Why not? Practically no one is exempt from the growing use of smart devices, nearly everyone uses their mobile device for far more than just a phone call, text or email. This product was designed to provide security and variety.


          Charge 5000+ USB capable devices, not just your phone but your camera, watch, iPod, GameBoy, anything!

          Have power anywhere you may need it!

          For your convenience, leave one in your bag, one in your car, one in your pocket, one in your desk/locker at work, lend one to a friend, etc.


          No matter what the circumstances are, you'll always have the confidence of never being too far from instant power to keep you in touch with your world - no matter how long you're away from a power outlet! It's certainly better than owning just one huge backup battery.

            Let's talk numbers...
            According to market research of comparable products an individual PowerKnot can go for roughly $89 - $129 and each individual charging station for $40 - $70. Each 4 piece unit can go for $189, each 6 pack for $219, and each 8 piece unit for $269.

            We are in fact leveraging this information, but not for massive profits, instead, we're using it to increase the number of people our product will reach!

            Compare us to them...

            We're bigger in a smaller and better way! :-)

            - Our four (4) piece unit priced at $70 - $89 (during this campaign)

            - Their one (1) piece unit priced at $59 - $99 (on the market)

            For just around $30 more you'll receive three additional units of the PowerKnots which includes 17,800mAh more power!
            What can the PowerKnots be used for?

            The PowerKnots can be used for any USB capable product and any purpose including excessive business traveling, construction site workers, hikers, mail carriers, bus drivers, obsessive mobile device users, dispersing a unit to family members or friends for potential emergencies, campers, general power storage for USB capable devices and much more!
            We aren't the first, but we certainly are the best!

            We know we aren't the first backup battery on the market but the fact remains that we are in fact the first to offer the convenience of more than one, reliable, high powered unit at a remarkable price point and because our patent is working its way through the United States Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO) we will be the only, original company you can get this product from in all it's original greatness!
            Everything they don't offer, we do!

            1. There are currently no backup batteries on the market that provides a one source recharging station for all the units offered and any USB device at the same time (because the other guys only offer one unit)

            2. That are small enough to fit practically anywhere on your person

            3. That are smart enough to save your power after a charge (no on/off button, it does it itself to give you one less thing to worry about, just plug and go!)

            4. Powerful enough to quickly recharge your mobile phone 3+ times depending on your devices' internal battery capacity and unlike others, the charge lasts just as if it were charged via a wall plug!

            5. That are priced to beat every one of our competitors! Check out our perks for proof!
            What's more logical for your travels?



              A real world example of the simplicity involved in using the PowerKnots; the prototype plugged into an iPhone 5!


              It's really that simple! Plug and go, anytime, anywhere; three or more recharges per PowerKnot for most smart phones!



              What's out there?

              Of course there are some options on the market to patch this problem; however, very few, if any, help effectively resolve this ever growing issue.

              - NONE of the other guys offer multiple units

              - MOST of them are way too expensive

              - Only offer one, small, low capacity unit to recharge your device

              - Or one, bulky, high capacity, illogically designed unit

              - Have no way of being recharged themselves after losing power except by standard wall charging which is obviously unavailable while traveling

              - Most backup batteries do not give your mobile device a 100% charge, as promised.

              The PowerKnots, however, not only solves ALL of these problems but also addresses the major problem of our mobile device usage outliving our mobile devices' internal battery capacity, thus providing you with this great product!

              What most people DO NOT know!

              1. Fact: Milli-amps (mAh) converts to mAh only with the correct voltage output; for example, the iPhone 5s internal battery capacity is 1570mAh, one PowerKnot internal battery capacity is 5200mAh w/ a 3.7v battery pack and a 5v/1A power output, according to testing results, this means one PowerKnot can undoubtedly recharge your iPhone 5s up to 3.31 times while not in constant use during the charging cycle! So now you know, any other claim that promises you more power with less voltages and mAh is FALSE!

              2. An emergency charger is often mistaken as a backup charger, they are very different products. One is more expensive than the other and both provide two different needs. One provides extended power (emergency), a little talk time, the other provides a full recharge to your mobile devices' internal battery (backup battery), full talk time restored. DO NOT BE MISLEAD ANY LONGER!!!

              The Competition...

              Below I will outline some potential backup battery competitors, comparing them with the PowerKnots but I assure you, you will rate the PowerKnots #1 for many, or should I say "multiple" reasons! :-)

              A glance at some of the other guys, some are beautifully designed but none of them offer you more than what you see in each image; one, lone unit, plus they are all pretty large

              The other guys...

              • Bolt/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 70mm x 34mm x 28mm (2.75" x 1.33" x 1.10"), $59.99, Samsung 3000mAh battery, small but oddly shaped w/pointy edges, low Milliamps (won't stand up to the growing power needs in the now future) and its only ONE unit, once the backup battery loses power it must be recharged via an electrical outlet.
              • Eton BoostBloc/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 55.88mm x 127mm x 25.4mm (2.20" x 5.00" x 1.00"), $69.79, 6600mAh; relatively large, oddly shaped and powerful, but it's only ONE unit and it's over priced and the fact remains that once it loses its charge, that's it!
              • ViewCharger/1 piece unit- Dimensions: unknown, but from the images its pretty big, $69.99, 6000mAh battery, powerful but bulky, not ideal for travel and its only ONE unit, once it loses its charge, back to the wall socket you go, if you can find one!
              • Legion/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 2.45 x 4.32 x 0.45 inches, $79.99, 5500mAh, powerful but the size of an iPhone 4, not ideal for traveling, only ONE unit; too bulky to conveniently charge your device on the go if you don't lug around a purse or book bag, overpriced and once it losses its power, that's it!
              • JuiceBee/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 90mm x 36mm x 33mm, $69.00, 3000mAh, ONE unit, small but no design sense, low Milliamps, once it loses its power there is no other source of recharging except by an electrical outlet.
              • Ark/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 90mm x 90mm x 20mm (3.54" x 3.54" x 0.78"), likely retails for $99.99+, 5200mAh, ONE over sized unit, wireless charger, entirely too much hassle to charge including installing a wireless patch within your mobile phone or using a bulky case to be compatible with the charging station, as big as a galaxy s3, not logically designed for travel. Once this unit is drained, that's it, it doesn't "wirelessly" recharge itself...

              The PowerKnots...

              Sizing the PowerKnots up, all four of the 4 piece unit amounts to the size of an encased iPhone 5 - standard, high capacity backup batteries are typically that huge! The only thing big about this product is the power it packs to keep you charged!

               

              The PowerKnots in order of units offered and their retail costs

              • PowerKnots/4 piece unit w/charging station- Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10"), $99.00, 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack, changeable battery pack. Powerful, compact, sleek design; once one loses power you can use another one but unless you excessively use your mobile phone, one PowerKnot could last you all day.So why do you need so many? Why not? This product was designed to provide security and variety in the same or lower price range of our competitors. Leave one in your bag, one in your car, one in your pocket, one in your desk/locker at work, lend one to a friend, etc. But, if you decide to keep them all to yourself, you'll have the confidence of never being too far from instant power to keep you in touch with your world! It's certainly better than owning just one huge backup battery.
              • PowerKnots/6 pack (charging station not included)- Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10"), $119.00, 3.7v, 5200/mAh, Li-ion battery pack. If you prefer to just own the PowerKnots by themselves, this option is for you! The PowerKnots can be recharged in many ways, plug it into your computer, your car charger or your wall charger, wherever you charge them make sure they're all charged when you leave home, otherwise you'll be angry!
              • PowerKnots 8/piece unit w/charging station- Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10"), $150.00, 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack. Powerful, compact, sleek design, once it loses power you can use another one, can't do that if you own just one unit from the other guys. This unit is great for anyone but ideal for business travelers, hikers, farmers, mailmen/women, excessive mobile phone users (like me), outdoor research groups, construction site workers, mall shoppers, etc.

              Sizing up the PowerKnots again with an encased iPhone 5 & Galaxy S3. All 4 PowerKnots together is the size of a typical backup battery w/equal or lesser capacity as one PowerKnot!

              The circuitry design...

              See what's inside the PowerKnots! The smartest, safest design and circuitry ever!

              The tower...

              The inside of the charging station. A plug for all the PowerKnots and any USB capable device! The eight piece will be the same with 8 ports, 4 on each side.


              Design Plan

              We will maintain a sleek, compact and safe design. The unit will be as small as logically possible to ensure convenience but sizable enough to pack the powerful capacity required to keep you charged. The PowerKnot will be a sealed unit, the USB stick will retract in the final design to rest inside the casing to avoid damage to this component. In addition, the LED lights will be placed by the input where your cable connects with the PowerKnot, we will do this to make it easier for you to see the status of your PowerKnots power left before it needs to be charged.

              Beautiful, safe, smooth and stylish finish. The USB connection enables you to simply plug your standard USB cable into a PowerKnot and instantly begin charging any USB capable device!

              Branding prospect

              The PowerKnots will be branded with the product name along the side of the charging station, it will read "PowerKnots by TechSquare." On each PowerKnot the same branding will be on top of the unit. Like our logo, "Power" will be green and "Knots" will remain black.

              Packaging

              We're considering a travel case as packaging, this will be a reusable case and will come with our logo and company branding on the back of the case with instructions on how to use the PowerKnots.

                Manufacturing Plan

                We're ready to go, the hard part is over. Research and testing and prototyping was all a success, now we're ready to get this product on the assembly line and in your possession! Upon reaching or exceeding (hint, hint :-)) our funding goal we will immediately contact our manufacturing partner to complete mold creation, tooling and to finalize our design to ensure that all the size requirements, component placements, LED lights, etc. are met and correct. Because this process is tedious, it will take roughly 30 to 40 days to receive our finalized prototypes, after inspection of the prototypes and approval of the final product we will initiate mass production of the units. While we wait, we'll be working with our packaging partner and collecting survey data concerning your color choices and other information pertaining to any offered rewards that requires details from the backers. Also, if you're located nearby we just might deliver your PowerKnots to you personally! :-)

                Projected Production Schedule Breakdown

                • Funding ends (October 2014)
                • Make deposit to begin tooling (October 2014)
                • Produce final CAD model molding (October 2014)
                • Produce final PCB design (October 2014)
                • Finalize our packaging design (November 2014)
                • Receive first manufactured unit (November 2014)
                • Perform testing and submit revisions, if required (November 2014)
                • Manufacturer begins mass production (December 2014)
                • Manufacturer ships to us (December 2014)
                • We ship your PowerKnots to you (December 2014)

                A little about us...

                We're very passionate about technology, particularly mobile technology especially since we do absolutely NOTHING without our mobile devices. We're a team of highly talented businessmen and women, electrical and mechanical engineers, design specialist, manufacturing professionals, logistics geniuses and energy experts and with our combined skills and knowledge we've created the PowerKnots and have many other great products in the making!


                Why we need your support...
                We require a minimum of $25,000 to begin our first run of production, upon reaching our goal and the end of this campaign we can hit the ground running and have our first run shipped to you, the supporters, within two months!

                If we don't reach our goal...

                If we don't reach our minimum goal we will still be able to produce the PowerKnots, however, we would be required to sign a contract to repay the manufacture based on future projected sales.

                Your contribution will ensure that we remain an independent company with no debt or obligation to make future payments to our manufacturer. We do understand that in the future we will require investors to help us scale our manufacturing efforts and if we can remain debt free we will be a more ideal investment opportunity for future investors.

                A product EVERYONE has been waiting for...

                For quite some time now, consumers has been searching for the ideal product to keep them charged for more than just a few hours. Today, our mobile phones are practically our everything from radio to day planner to travel guide; apps from shopping to dating dominate our attention and mutilate our battery life -- the PowerKnots changes this dynamic by offer multiple, high capacity, travel sized backup batteries!

                Can't contribute, no problem!

                Not everyone is in a position to contribute to this campaign and that's OK, but that doesn't mean you still can't help! Spreading the word of this campaign is as valuable as contributing and It's easy and will certainly be appreciated. So if you can't financially support us, your social support will be just as valuable and we will be extremely grateful for your support! Simply use the Indiegogo share features or copy and paste the link and share it wherever you want!

                THANKS TONS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!


                                                             Charging Chart

                Internal Battery capacity for popular devices & PowerKnots recharging capabilities for each individual device:

                Formula: Devices internal battery capacity/PowerKnot internal battery capacity = total number of full recharges per PowerKnot, per device. (Example: An iPhone 4 will be calculated as follows: 1420mAh/5200mAh = 3.66 recharges per PowerKnot, per iPhone 4). If your device is not listed simply use this formula to calculate how the PowerKnots will power your device.

                Apple products

                iPhone

                • iPhone 4 =1420mAh/5200mAh = 3.66 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPhone 4s = 1430mAh/5200mAh = 3.63 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPhone 5 = 1440mAh/5200mAh = 3.61 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPhone 5s = 1570mAh/5200mAh = 3.31 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPhone 5c = 1510mAh/5200mAh = 3.44 full recharges per one Knot

                iPad

                • iPad 2 = 6930mAh = 75% recharging power per one Knot
                • iPad 3 = 11560mAh = 45% recharging power per one Knot
                • iPad 4 = 11560mAh = 45% recharging power per one Knot
                • iPad Air = 8827mAh = 60% recharging power per one Knot
                • iPad mini = 4440mAh = 1.2 recharges per one Knot

                iPod

                • iPod 2gen = 739mAh = 7.03 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPod 3gen = 789mAh = 6.59 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPod 4gen = 930mAh = 5.59 full recharges per one Knot
                • iPod touch = 1030mAh = 5.04 full recharges per one Knot

                Samsung products

                Galaxy S series

                • Galaxy S = 1500mAh = 3.46 full recharges per one Knot
                • Galaxy s2 = 1850mAh = 2.81 full recharges per one Knot
                • Galaxy s3 = 2100mAh = 2.47 full recharges per one Knot
                • Galaxy s4 = 2600mAh = 2.00 full recharges per one Knot

                Galaxy Note

                • Galaxy Note 2 = 3100mAh = 1.67 full recharges per one Knot
                • Galaxy Note 3 = 3200mAh = 1.625 full recharges per one Knot
                • Galaxy Note 3 10.1 = 8220mAh = 63% recharge power per one Knot

                Galaxy Tablet

                • Galaxy Tablet 3 7.0 = 4000mAh = 1.3 full recharges per one Knot

                Note: the PowerKnots can charge 5000+ USB capable devices, to determine how the PowerKnots works for your specific device use the formula at the top of this section.

                We appreciate all of your support!

                Follow us on Twitter!

                @TechSquare_

                @PowerKnots

                Like us on FaceBook!

                www.facebook.com/techsquareproducts

                The TechSquare Team!
story_txt:
Let's talk PowerKnots!Each individual PowerKnot comes equipped with:

3.7v (enough voltage to charge your device quickly)
5200mAh (enough power to charge your phone up to 3 times!)
Li-ion battery pack (same battery technology used in your mobile device)


The PowerKnots are guaranteed to charge your device fully (100%) as many times as it converts to your devices internal battery capacity (see Charging Chart below).Each PowerKnot is detachable from the charging station and can be taken with you anywhere. Each PowerKnot is equipped with a 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack, packed full of power, this equates to a total power storage of: 20,800mAh (4 piece w/charging station), 31,200mAh (6 pack w/o charging station), 41,600mAh (8 piece (w/charging station, limited to this campaign)). That's a lot of power, you will NEVER be out of touch with your world, unless you break your phone :-o or you're in the wilderness for a few weeks without at least 6 PowerKnots. :-)Specifications

Waterproof casing!
Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10")
700 recharging cycles per PowerKnot!
Retractable USB stick, to protect it from damage.
Offered coverage plan for parts, repairs and battery replacement! (additional, nominal cost, inquiry after campaign)
3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion, w/custom cells battery pack, fully recharges most smartphones 3+ times!
Compatible with 5000+ USB capable products!
Output 5v/1A
90-240v for international use!
CE, RoHS, and FCC Certifiable
Simultaneously recharges while connected to any USB input (i.e. Laptop, desktop, wall charger, car charger, etc.). Charge your device and your PowerKnot at the same time!
Smart charging! No on/off switch, when your device is plugged in it begins charging, when it's charged it shuts off and reserves the battery until you're ready for your next charge!
5 color choices (orange, blue, green, gray or black)
Our smooth, sleek, round edges delivers a safe, logical design!
2 LED indicator lights one to determine when your device is charged and one to determine when the PowerKnot is fully charged/low (LED will remain green for as long as there is power to charge a device and will turn yellow when it is low.)

The problem...
In this generation we are always on-the-move and mobile technology is not slack in keeping up with our busy lifestyles. Top brands readily design and redesign mobile devices to do practically ANYTHING in the palm of our hands, making them more and more user friendly to the point where our devices have become an extension to our everyday lives. However, keeping these advanced devices powered has become a major problem and with every upgrade it only gets worse -- they have yet to resolve it! So, if we are moving forward and mobile technology is moving forward, shouldn't the way we stay connected and in touch with our world be moving in the same direction? That's where we come in! Keep scrolling, you won't regret it!

Battery life has become a major problem and as the problem continues to grow, battery life continues to fail to keep up with the advancements of their counterparts; with the growing use of mobile devices to do anything from getting us from point A to point B to taking photos, texting, video chatting, dating, browsing the internet, shopping, interacting with your friends, fans and followers on your social networks and much more, battery life has become scarce and rather limited; the days of getting throughout a single day on one battery charge are over! Studies have shown an extraordinary increase in mobile device usage over the years and has suggested that we use our phone more than any other similarly valuable object in our lives (i.e. computers, tablets, cars, house keys, television, etc.).


It doesn't matter where we are or what we're doing, 
we're always checking our phones. Clearly our phones are the engine to 
our social lives, so it might be a good idea to always have power ready 
to back us up when our phone battery has run its course.
The real solution...
If
 you're a smartphone user you know firsthand that power is scarce and once you phone loses power, you're pretty much out of luck. That is the main reasons why we created 
the PowerKnots - this product is compatible with 5000+ USB 
enabled devices and can keep practically ANY USB capable device powered!
This is where we ended up...


The first born...

Although our brain wrenching revisions gave birth to this, singular beautiful, patent pending,
 logically designed, travel sized device, we weren't quite done and in 
fact an additional three (3) were created, thus creating the four (4) 
piece unit, then a six (6) pack, and lastly the limited edition eight 
(8) piece unit, along with an all-in-one charging station (a one source 
charging station for all the PowerKnots and any USB device you connect to the charging station!).



Just a glimpse at the passion that went into the design of the block itself. Designed to keep your device powered and to keep your PowerKnots safe from damage.
Backup power storage never before seen or offered in this fashion! Get a four piece w/5200mAh each & a charging station for less than the price of one, quality 6000mAh backup battery!
It's like taking a huge power bank and breaking it into little, even more powerful, portable units; with a drastic decrease in the cost of owning one of these powerful units!The PowerKnots first introduction to the world! At a coPhilly, PHLMade tech event in Philadelphia, PA!What exactly are the PowerKnots?

The PowerKnots are the worlds first, patent pending, 
multi-unit (4, 6, or 8 piece), high powered (3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion 
battery pack per PowerKnot), travel sized backup batteries (take them 
anywhere!) & charging station that truly fits your lifestyle - the ideal product for the growing need of backup power on-the-go!

Choosing has never been so easy!

#1. $75-$89 (during this campaign, slightly more afterwards), 4pcs, total power storage 20,800mAh!

#2. $40-$100, 1pc, total power storage 4000mAh. But seriously, this isn't a price battle, although we beat them in that area, too! ;-)
Why choose the PowerKnots over the other guys?




Choose from a 6 pack (PowerKnots only), a 4 piece unit w/charging 
station or an 8 piece unit w/charging station  (limited to this 
campaign).
Experience the same speed of charging as if your device was plugged into a car port or wall outlet.
Smart charging! No on/off switch, when your device is plugged into a
 PowerKnot it begins charging instantly, when it's charged it shuts off 
until you're ready for your next charge!
700 recharging cycles per PowerKnot!
Offered coverage plan for parts, repairs and battery replacement!
One charging station for all the PowerKnots & your mobile device to be recharged at one time!
Smarter, compact & safer design!
Simultaneous charging and recharging capability of the PowerKnots!
Cost effective!
High Powered (3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack in each of the PowerKnots!) 3+ recharges for most smart phones!
Take them anywhere (easily store them)
Store them in different locations for that "just in case" moment (i.e. car, work desk, bag, purse, coat/jacket pocket, etc.)
Break free of the electrical outlet, so much power you'll rarely use your wall charger!
Select from 5 color options: green, orange, blue, black & gray!
Get better quality and more quantity for your money!



"Why do I need more than one backup battery?"


So why do 
you need so many? Why not? Practically no one is exempt from the growing
 use of smart devices, nearly everyone uses their mobile device for far 
more than just a phone call, text or email. This product was designed to
 provide security and variety.


Charge 5000+ USB capable devices, not just your phone but 
your camera, watch, iPod, GameBoy, anything!
Have power anywhere you may need it!
For your convenience, leave
 one in your bag, one in your car, one in your pocket, one in your 
desk/locker at work, lend one to a friend, etc.


No matter what the circumstances are, you'll always have the confidence of never being too far from instant power to 
keep you in touch with your world - no matter how long you're away from a
 power outlet! It's certainly better than owning just one huge backup 
battery.

Let's talk numbers...According to market research of comparable products an individual PowerKnot can go for roughly $89 - $129 and each individual charging
 station for $40 - $70. Each 4 piece unit can go for $189, each 6 pack 
for $219, and each 8 piece unit for $269.We are in fact leveraging this information, but not for massive profits, instead, we're using it to increase the number 
of people our product will reach!Compare us to them...We're bigger in a smaller and better way! :-)- Our four (4) piece unit priced at $70 - $89 (during this campaign)- Their one (1) piece unit priced at $59 - $99 (on the market)For
 just around $30 more you'll receive three additional units of the 
PowerKnots which includes 17,800mAh more power!

What can the PowerKnots be used for?The PowerKnots can be used for any USB 
capable product and any purpose including excessive business traveling, 
construction site workers, hikers, mail carriers, bus drivers, obsessive
 mobile device users, dispersing a unit to family members or friends for 
potential emergencies, campers, general power storage for USB capable 
devices and much more!


We aren't the first, but we certainly are the best!


We know we aren't the first backup battery on the market but the fact remains that we are in fact the first
 to offer the convenience of more than one, reliable, high powered unit 
at a remarkable price point and because our patent is working its way 
through the United States Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO) we will 
be the only, original company you can get this product from in all it's original 
greatness!

Everything they don't offer, we do!


1. There are currently no backup
 batteries on the market that provides a one source recharging station 
for all the units offered and any USB device at the same time (because the other guys only offer one unit)



2. That are small enough to fit practically anywhere on your person


3. That are smart enough to save your power after a charge (no on/off button, it does it itself to give you one 
less thing to worry about, just plug and go!)


4. Powerful enough to quickly recharge your mobile phone 3+ times depending
 on your devices' internal battery capacity and unlike others, the 
charge lasts just as if it were charged via a wall plug!


5. That are priced to beat every one of our competitors! Check out our perks for proof!

What's more logical for your travels?



A real world example of the simplicity involved in using the PowerKnots; the prototype plugged into an iPhone 5!



It's really that simple! Plug and go, anytime, anywhere; three or more recharges per PowerKnot for most smart phones!What's out there?
Of course there are some options on 
the market to patch this problem; however, very few, if any, help 
effectively resolve this ever growing issue.
- NONE of the other guys offer multiple units
- MOST of them are way too expensive
- Only offer one, small, low capacity unit to recharge your device
- Or one, bulky, high capacity, illogically designed unit
- Have no way of being recharged themselves after losing power except by standard wall charging which is obviously unavailable while traveling
- Most backup batteries do not give your mobile device a 100% charge, as promised.
The PowerKnots, however, not only solves ALL of
 these problems but also addresses the major problem of our mobile 
device usage outliving our mobile devices' internal battery capacity, thus providing you with this great product!
What most people DO NOT know!
1. Fact: 
Milli-amps (mAh) converts to mAh only with the correct voltage output; 
for example, the iPhone 5s internal battery capacity is 1570mAh, one 
PowerKnot internal battery capacity is 5200mAh w/ a 3.7v battery pack and a 5v/1A power output, according to testing results, this means one PowerKnot can undoubtedly recharge your iPhone 5s up to 
3.31 times while not in constant use during the charging cycle! So now you know, any 
other claim that promises you more power with less voltages and mAh is 
FALSE!
2. An emergency charger is often mistaken as a backup charger, they are very different products. One is more expensive than the other and both provide two different 
needs. One provides extended power (emergency), a little talk time, the other provides a 
full recharge to your mobile devices' internal battery (backup 
battery), full talk time restored. DO NOT BE MISLEAD ANY LONGER!!!

The Competition...
Below I will outline some potential 
backup battery competitors, comparing them with the PowerKnots but I 
assure you, you will rate the PowerKnots #1 for many, or should I say 
"multiple" reasons! :-)


A glance at some of the other guys, some are beautifully designed but 
none of them offer you more than what you see in each image; one, lone 
unit, plus they are all pretty large

The other guys...

Bolt/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 70mm x 34mm x 28mm (2.75" x 1.33" x 1.10"), $59.99, Samsung 3000mAh battery, small but oddly shaped w/pointy edges, low Milliamps (won't stand up to the growing power needs in the now future) and its only ONE unit, once the backup battery loses power it must be recharged via an electrical outlet.

Eton BoostBloc/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 55.88mm x 127mm x 25.4mm (2.20" x 5.00" x 1.00"), $69.79, 6600mAh; relatively large, oddly shaped and powerful, but it's only ONE unit and it's over priced and the fact remains that once it loses its charge, that's it!


ViewCharger/1 piece unit- Dimensions: unknown, but from the images its pretty big, $69.99, 6000mAh battery, powerful but bulky, not ideal for travel and its only ONE unit, once it loses its charge, back to the wall socket you go, if you can find one!

Legion/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 2.45 x 4.32 x 0.45 inches, $79.99, 5500mAh, powerful but the size of an iPhone 4, not ideal for traveling, only ONE unit; too bulky to
 conveniently charge your device on the go if you don't lug around a 
purse or book bag, overpriced and once it losses its power, that's it!

JuiceBee/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 90mm x 36mm x 33mm, $69.00, 3000mAh, ONE unit, small but no design sense, low Milliamps, once it loses its power there is no other source of recharging except by an electrical outlet.

Ark/1 piece unit- Dimensions: 90mm x 90mm x 20mm (3.54" x 3.54" x 0.78"), likely retails for $99.99+, 5200mAh, ONE over sized unit, wireless charger, entirely too much hassle to charge including installing a wireless patch within your mobile phone or using a bulky case to be compatible with the charging station, as big as a galaxy s3, not logically designed for travel. Once this unit is drained, that's it, it doesn't "wirelessly" recharge itself...

The PowerKnots...
Sizing the PowerKnots up, all four of the 4 piece unit amounts to the 
size of an encased iPhone 5 - standard, high capacity backup batteries 
are typically that huge! The only thing big about this product is the 
power it packs to keep you charged! 
The PowerKnots in order of units offered and their retail costs

PowerKnots/4 piece unit w/charging station- Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10"), $99.00, 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack, changeable battery pack.
 Powerful, compact, sleek design; once one loses power you can use 
another one but unless you excessively use your mobile phone, one 
PowerKnot could last you all day.So why do you need so many? Why not? 
This product was designed to provide security and variety in the same or
 lower price range of our competitors. Leave one in your bag, one in 
your car, one in your pocket, one in your desk/locker at work, lend one 
to a friend, etc. But, if you decide to keep them all to yourself, 
you'll have the confidence of never being too far from instant power to 
keep you in touch with your world! It's certainly better than owning 
just one huge backup battery.

PowerKnots/6 pack (charging station not included)- Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10"), $119.00, 3.7v, 5200/mAh, Li-ion battery pack.
 If you prefer to just own the PowerKnots by themselves, this option is 
for you! The PowerKnots can be recharged in many ways, plug it into your
 computer, your car charger or your wall charger, wherever you charge 
them make sure they're all charged when you leave home, otherwise you'll
 be angry!

PowerKnots 8/piece unit w/charging station- Dimensions: 65.00mm x 30.00mm x 28.00mm (2.36" x 1.18" x 1.10"), $150.00, 3.7v, 5200mAh, Li-ion battery pack.
 Powerful, compact, sleek design, once it loses power you can use 
another one, can't do that if you own just one unit from the other guys.
 This unit is great for anyone but ideal for business travelers, hikers,
 farmers, mailmen/women, excessive mobile phone users (like me), outdoor
 research groups, construction site workers, mall shoppers, etc.

Sizing up the PowerKnots again with an encased iPhone 5 & Galaxy S3.
 All 4 PowerKnots together is the size of a typical backup battery 
w/equal or lesser capacity as one PowerKnot!The circuitry design...
See what's inside the PowerKnots! The smartest, safest design and circuitry ever!
The tower...
The inside of the charging station. A plug for all the PowerKnots and any USB capable device! The eight piece will be the same with 8 ports, 4 on each side.


Design Plan
We will maintain a sleek, compact and safe 
design. The unit will be as small as logically possible to ensure 
convenience but sizable enough to pack the powerful capacity required to
 keep you charged. The PowerKnot will be a sealed unit, the USB stick 
will retract in the final design to rest inside the casing to avoid 
damage to this component. In addition, the LED lights will be placed by 
the input where your cable connects with the PowerKnot, we will do this 
to make it easier for you to see the status of your PowerKnots power 
left before it needs to be charged.
Beautiful, safe, smooth and stylish finish. The USB connection enables 
you to simply plug your standard USB cable into a PowerKnot and 
instantly begin charging any USB capable device!Branding prospect
The PowerKnots will be branded with the product
 name along the side of the charging station, it will read "PowerKnots 
by TechSquare." On each PowerKnot the same branding will be on top of 
the unit. Like our logo, "Power" will be green and "Knots" will remain 
black.
PackagingWe're considering a travel case as packaging, this will be a reusable 
case and will come with our logo and company branding on the back of the
 case with instructions on how to use the PowerKnots.
Manufacturing Plan
We're ready to go, the hard part is 
over. Research and testing and prototyping was all a success, now we're 
ready to get this product on the assembly line and in your possession! 
Upon reaching or exceeding (hint, hint :-)) our funding goal we will 
immediately contact our manufacturing partner to complete mold creation,
 tooling and to finalize our design to ensure that all the size 
requirements, component placements, LED lights, etc. are met and 
correct. Because this process is tedious, it will take roughly 30 to 40 
days to receive our finalized prototypes, after inspection of the 
prototypes and approval of the final product we will initiate mass 
production of the units. While we wait, we'll be working with our 
packaging partner and collecting survey data concerning your color 
choices and other information pertaining to any offered rewards that 
requires details from the backers. Also, if you're located nearby we 
just might deliver your PowerKnots to you personally! :-)
Projected Production Schedule Breakdown

Funding ends (October 2014)
Make deposit to begin tooling (October 2014)
Produce final CAD model molding (October 2014)
Produce final PCB design (October 2014)
Finalize our packaging design (November 2014)
Receive first manufactured unit (November 2014)
Perform testing and submit revisions, if required (November 2014)
Manufacturer begins mass production (December 2014)
Manufacturer ships to us (December 2014)
We ship your PowerKnots to you (December 2014)



A little about us...
We're very passionate about technology, particularly mobile technology especially since we do absolutely NOTHING without our mobile devices. We're a team of highly talented businessmen and women, electrical and mechanical engineers, design specialist, manufacturing professionals, logistics geniuses and energy experts and with our combined skills and knowledge we've created the PowerKnots and have many other great products in the making!

Why we need your support...We require a minimum of $25,000 to begin our first run of production, upon reaching our goal and the end of this campaign we can hit the ground running and have our first run shipped to you, the supporters, within two months!If we don't reach our goal...
If we don't reach our minimum goal we will still be able to produce the PowerKnots, however, we would be required to sign a contract to repay the manufacture based on future projected sales.
Your contribution will ensure that we remain an independent company with no debt or obligation to make future payments to our manufacturer. We do understand that in the future we will require investors to help us scale our manufacturing efforts and if we can remain debt free we will be a more ideal investment opportunity for future investors.
A product EVERYONE has been waiting for...
For quite some time now, consumers has been searching for the ideal product to keep them charged for more than just a few hours. Today, our mobile phones are practically our everything from radio to day planner to travel guide; apps from shopping to dating dominate our attention and mutilate our battery life -- the PowerKnots changes this dynamic by offer multiple, high capacity, travel sized backup batteries!


Can't contribute, no problem!
Not everyone is in a position to contribute to this campaign and that's OK, but that doesn't mean you still can't help! Spreading the word of this campaign is as valuable as contributing and It's easy and will certainly be appreciated. So if you can't financially support us, your social support will be just as valuable and we will be extremely grateful for your support! Simply use the Indiegogo share features or copy and paste the link and share it wherever you want!

THANKS TONS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Note: the PowerKnots can charge 5000+ USB capable devices,

We appreciate all of your support!

story:
We’re back! After the successful funding of nearly $500,000 from our previous campaign, Bomber Barrel, our early backers asked us to make a survival keychain to go with their Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and bracelet. Introducing — Bomber Survival Gear, Survival Bracelet and Keychain.

 

 

We wanted to create a timeless piece to accommodate your Bomber Barrel: an accessory that you can bring with you to the city, on hikes, and on all of your adventures. So the conception of the perfect everyday keychain was brought to life.

With its minimal design and effective functionality, the Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain is the perfect addition to your Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and survival gear collection.

We carefully crafted and tied premium quality 550 paracord into the design. The Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain can be used for a variety of emergency situations. 

 

 

 

Equipped with 3 meters of paracord and fire-starting capabilities, the Bomber Survival Bracelet is not only stylish but practical.  The funding will help us manufacture a second production run of our Bomber Survival Bracelets.

In addition to its functional 550 paracord strength, the Bomber Survival Bracelet and Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain both have firestarting capabilities using flint/steel woven within its design.

 

 

Due to popular demand, we are bringing back the Bomber Barrel Set with an added bonus: the Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain.

The complete Bomber Set includes the original Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag, Mini Bomber Travel Kit, Bomber Survival Bracelet, and Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain.  With your help, we can start a second production run of the Bomber Barrel Duffle Bags.  All of the original tooling and pattern costs have been set up. Now, we're just in need of funding to get started on our production.

 

Paracord was first used as suspension lines for U.S. parachutes during WWII, but has since proved itself useful in hundreds, if not thousands of other ways. The braided sheath has an incredible number of interwoven strands compared to its thickness, giving it a smooth texture, elastic feel, and unmatched strength. This makes it compact, fashionable, and highly useful in survival and dangerous situations.
 

Bomber & Company was crowdfunded by you! The success of our previous campaign, Bomber Barrel, is really due to a strong backbone of supporters. We seriously appreciate all the support you have given us because without you, we wouldn't be here. 

We're a small company based in San Francisco on a mission to bring you the best damn everyday products. We can ensure our products are made with the best quality in mind as we would not offer a product that we would not use ourselves. 

We have a promise to keep. Our promise is to provide you the best damn everyday products you can own, period.  We need the best damn support from you guys again to make this dream come true.

Your funding will go towards: high quality materials, packaging, production, and logistics for the Complete Bomber Set. Not only will your support help production possible, but will also provide the community with more everyday carry products.

Thank you for taking the time to check out our project. As a small startup based in San Francisco, it means a lot to have your support.

Best,

Vincent Pilot Ng (Lead Designer/Founder)
Andrew Tran Nguyen (Director of Operations)

P.S.: Check out some of our high-quality resolution pictures here. :)

SHARE US
LIKE US on Facebook
FOLLOW US on Instagram

Why are we re-assigning another 60 days to our campaign? 
The reason we did another 60 days was because we wanted to make sure we had enough funding for the large production order we had already placed with our manufacturer. We took our savings to place the deposit for 30K units of bracelets and keychains based off of our backers from the previous campaign. Ultimately, we needed enough funding time to meet those goals.
Can you board an airplane / pass through TSA with our products?
Most definitely! We've actually used our Complete Bomber Sets (Bomber Barrel, Mini Bomber, Bomber Bracelet and Keychain) on all of our trips as a carry on with no issues. Since the branding is so subtle, jet black on black, nobody even notices. We kept the branding minimal, low-key and also, sleek. The last thing we want is a billboard on our bags with a giant "Swoosh" sign. Think of it like the bomber jackets from the 50's. ;)
Can you untie and tie back the paracord on the Bracelet / Keychain?
Yes, you absolutely can. However, we would not recommend doing so as the paracord is only meant to be used during emergency situations. 
Will you provide an instruction guide on how to tie the paracord back together?
This is something we will take a look into and may consider creating in the future. 
Shipping addresses and perks 
After the campaign is over, we will be sending surveys via backerkit where you can fill out your necessary information such as your shipping address and perk options. In case you want more of our products, you will also be able to add-on additional perks. ;)
story_txt:
We’re back! After the successful funding of nearly $500,000 from our previous campaign, Bomber Barrel, our early backers asked us to make a survival keychain to go with their Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and bracelet. Introducing — Bomber Survival Gear, Survival Bracelet and Keychain.


  
We wanted to create a timeless piece to accommodate your Bomber Barrel: an accessory that you can bring with you to the city, on hikes, and on all of your adventures. So the conception of the perfect everyday keychain was brought to life.


With its minimal design and effective functionality, the Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain is the perfect addition to your Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and survival gear collection.

We carefully crafted and tied premium quality 550 paracord into the design. The Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain can be used for a variety of emergency situations. 
 
 

 Equipped with 3 meters of paracord and fire-starting capabilities, the Bomber Survival Bracelet is not only stylish but practical.  The funding will help us manufacture a second production run of our Bomber Survival Bracelets.

In addition to its functional 550 paracord strength, the Bomber Survival Bracelet and Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain both have firestarting capabilities using flint/steel woven within its design.
  

Due to popular demand, we are bringing back the Bomber Barrel Set with an added bonus: the Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain.
The complete Bomber Set includes the original Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag, Mini Bomber Travel Kit, Bomber Survival Bracelet, and Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain.  With your help, we can start a second production run of the Bomber Barrel Duffle Bags.  All of the original tooling and pattern costs have been set up. Now, we're just in need of funding to get started on our production.



 
Paracord was first used as suspension lines for U.S. parachutes during WWII, but has since proved itself useful in hundreds, if not thousands of other ways. The braided sheath has an incredible number of interwoven strands compared to its thickness, giving it a smooth texture, elastic feel, and unmatched strength. This makes it compact, fashionable, and highly useful in survival and dangerous situations. 





Bomber & Company was crowdfunded by you! The success of our previous campaign, Bomber Barrel, is really due to a strong backbone of supporters. We seriously appreciate all the support you have given us because without you, we wouldn't be here. 
We're a small company based in San Francisco on a mission to bring you the best damn everyday products. We can ensure our products are made with the best quality in mind as we would not offer a product that we would not use ourselves. 





We have a promise to keep. Our promise is to provide you the best damn everyday products you can own, period.  We need the best damn support from you guys again to make this dream come true.
Your funding will go towards: high quality materials, packaging, production, and logistics for the Complete Bomber Set. Not only will your support help production possible, but will also provide the community with more everyday carry products.
Thank you for taking the time to check out our project. As a small startup based in San Francisco, it means a lot to have your support.
Best,
Vincent Pilot Ng (Lead Designer/Founder)Andrew Tran Nguyen (Director of Operations)
P.S.: Check out some of our high-quality resolution pictures here. :)
SHARE US

LIKE US on Facebook

FOLLOW US on Instagram




Why are we re-assigning another 60 days to our campaign?  

The reason we did another 60 days was because we wanted to make sure we had enough funding for the large production order we had already placed with our manufacturer. We took our savings to place the deposit for 30K units of bracelets and keychains based off of our backers from the previous campaign. Ultimately, we needed enough funding time to meet those goals.
Can you board an airplane / pass through TSA with our products?
Most definitely! We've actually used our Complete Bomber Sets (Bomber Barrel, Mini Bomber, Bomber Bracelet and Keychain) on all of our trips as a carry on with no issues. Since the branding is so subtle, jet black on black, nobody even notices. We kept the branding minimal, low-key and also, sleek. The last thing we want is a billboard on our bags with a giant "Swoosh" sign. Think of it like the bomber jackets from the 50's. ;)
Can you untie and tie back the paracord on the Bracelet / Keychain?
Yes, you absolutely can. However, we would not recommend doing so as the paracord is only meant to be used during emergency situations. 
Will you provide an instruction guide on how to tie the paracord back together?
This is something we will take a look into and may consider creating in the future. 
Shipping addresses and perks 
After the campaign is over, we will be sending surveys via backerkit where you can fill out your necessary information such as your shipping address and perk options. In case you want more of our products, you will also be able to add-on additional perks. ;)

story:
Porscha Starr is a premier custom lingerie brand designing only the hottest lingerie and intimate apparel that is tailor made to its client. Based out of Los Angeles California, Porscha Starr was founded April 2011 by CEO Porscha Woodard. Porscha Starr has expanded its business beyond the showroom to its online store www.porschastarr.com  Porscha Starr Lingerie is well known for it's edgy, alluring, fashion forward, sexy designs and custom created lingerie .The Porscha Starr customer is beautiful, sexy, alluring, playful, trendy, bold and fashion forward. Founder and CEO Porscha Woodard envisioned a clothing line that embodied the various surfaces of a woman: classy, sexy and edgy. Inspired by futuristic styles and trends, Porscha Starr Lingerie creates custom pieces that evoke confidence and high energy unveiling a Starr in every woman.

A Starr is emerging and ready to take over the largest stage for lingerie in the United States; the Las Vegas International Lingerie Show! However, with every big dream a financial seed must first be planted. To accomplish the goal of participating in the International Lingerie Show, we need $5,000 by February 4th. This will include transportation to Las Vegas, cost of materials, and other expenses to accomplish the show. With a fundraising goal of $5,000 raising money with Porscha Starr has its sexy perks to get involved. Persons who donate have the opportunity to attend exclusive photo shoots, receive autographed pictures, or be given the VIP treatment at the next Porscha Starr Fashion Show.

The International Lingerie show is the leading and nationally renowned platform for all things intimate apparel, lingerie and swimwear. In addition, this opportunity for Porscha Starr Lingerie to participate will present the opportunity for national exposure. You can make a difference and help the company reach the next level and grow by sending Porscha Starr to the International Lingerie Show. The deadline to raise all funds is February 4th 2014. Every dollar counts and donate today!




Check Out The Latest Porscha Starr Events!

During The BET Experience Weekend Porscha Starr set the stage ablaze as the featured lingerie designer in the FACET Fashion Show. This star studded celebrity event took place at the exclusive Siren Studios in the heart of Hollywood with over 200 attendees. Themed as an all white day party, this sexy affair set the tone for a sizzlingsummer!

Launching our Fall 2013 Custom Collection the show featured futuristic high fashion pieces taking ordinary lingerie to a new level. The crowd was wowed by this season's unique designes including VIP guest editor and owner of Black Men’s Magazine Marcus Blassingame and actor Shemar Moore. As guest enjoyed libations poured by Courvoisier Mascto, celebrity DJ Storm set the party mood spinning the latest hits.

Celebrity guest included Draya Michelle, Former 106 & Park Host Miss Myike, Brooke Bailey, Miss Maryland USA 2013 , Raven Sorvino, Tiffany Foxx, S. Hasan of FACET Studios along with a full house of influential industry figures.



Fashion Photo Shoot Behind The Scenes. Porscha Starr Lingerie.
Website & Promotion Photography by Arthur St. John



As fashion weeks took place all over the world from New York to Milan it was the west coast time to shine in the fashion capital of Los Angeles during LA Fashion and style Week. With all the glitz and glam that accompanies LA Fashion Week it wasn't until this season #LAFW finally had the sizzling sexy component it's been missing. Porscha Starr launched its Fall 2013 custom collection October 11th to over 200 members of the fashion community. 

From bloggers, socialites, celebrity guest and industry figures all gathered to veiw the debut of the new collection. Attendees enjoyed the detailed oriented and uniqueness of each piece. LA.com wrote  "Porscha Starr's Lingerie is sexy sultry and playful romantic and some very futuristic pieces....overall stunning" Lucky Magazine  described the custom aspect of collection "Many figures and sizes may wear this line due to it being tailor made for each individual woman. Porscha prides herself in taking care of each one." Celebrity guests of the evening included actress KD Aubert & Giovonnie Samuels and singer Ruben Cannon. 

The show was an absolute success on behalf of Porscha Starr we would like to thank our sponsors Pofa Nail Polish, Shoes Girls Love, Couture Night Club, Janerio's Model &  Production Company and La Mansion de Fashion. We thank every one who attended and participated in the amazing event stay tuned more fabulous sexy fun is on the way from the runway into your wardrobe.




NEW REWARD TIER

PORSCHA STARR LINGERIE SETS — 'SEXY SELLS’ — Only available on Indiegogo at this price through the $25 reward tier!

Sexy Violet Sizes 1 Medium & 2 Large

Jupe Violette 2 36C/L Panty & 1 38C XL/Panty




Please remember to share this on facebook, twitter, instagram, tumblr, e-mail,
word of mouth or any other way you can think of to spread the word.
We realize that not everyone can support this project financially, but sharing this
project is just as important!

story:
MEET FIXO

 

THE TIME CHANGES FACE

First of all, FIXO is a multi-face clock with weather forecast and Google Calendar appointments at a glance. But let’s get it straight: Fixo isn’t just reminiscence of your classic table clock, it’s a smart disc that’s integrated with a number of apps and smart objects. 

 

A NEW USER EXPERIENCE


Designed to be placed on a table or wall and even comfortable to hold thanks to the wide frame, FIXO comes with a complete set of dedicated applications. 
 
 
Inside of a nine and a half inch disc (24 cm), FIXO is equipped with a round touchscreen, an HD camera, 2 inch stereo speakers and three wide touchscreen buttons, for easy access to the main commands.
 

WHAT FIXO CAN DO?

Like a computer, FIXO can perform endless tasks. But what are the main advantages of a device designed for stationary use? It enriches your life at home with information at a glance, gives a great music experience with stereo loudspeakers, provides remote monitoring features interacting with your mobile device, is always connected with smart home accessories.

 

THE SMART OBJECTS

A set of special SMART OBJECTS completes FIXO in the tasks of home automation, security, health and wellness for tracking activities and remote monitoring. 
 

 

 

ONE APP FOR EACH DAILY TASK

FIXO is equipped with all the apps you need for each daily task. Set up the alarm or any other event with one touch. With multicolor SMART BULBS going off smoothly you will fall asleep and wake up in a gentle mood with a light and your favourite music increasing softly.

 

 

 

The SMART SCALE distinguishes users by the last recorded measurement, stores data and displays the evolution of weight over the time while the fitness app counts your exercises and helps you to stay fit.

 

FIXO brings in your kitchen thousands of recipes to follow easily step by step and to browse with a touch (feature in development stage)

 

The music player offers your music via streaming organized by artist and album and gives the visual experience of the rotating vinyl record that goes straight to the heart of music lovers.

 

With the multicolor SMART BULBS light up your parties to the rhythm of music while the integrated HD camera records videos and takes selfies. You can share your shots or present an instantaneous slideshow like a photo frame.

 

 

Safety requires automation. With KEY TAGS, FIXO knows who is at home, switching the alarm on when the whole family is out; you can set the action related to the button on KEY TAG: take picture, play music, switch the lights or send an SOS.

 

 

Good quality speakers, 3-axis accelerometer and the circular shape make it a device very suitable for gaming.

 

YOUR GOOGLE AT A GLANCE


FIXO is a cloud based device integrated with Google eco-system. You can store photos and videos on Google Drive and share it on Google+, add new events with a touch and see them on your smartphone with Google Calendar or present a slideshow of your Google Photos.

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

 

SIZE 9,3" x 0,47" (236 mm x 12 mm) approx.
WEIGHT 1,1 lbs (500 g) approx.
DISPLAY IPS touchscreen D 4,7" (12 cm) / 17.5 in2 (113 cm2)
CPU Ultra low power Intel Atom Quad Core 64-bit
CONNECTIVITY WI-FI 802.11 B/G/N, Bluetooth 4.0/LE
MEDIA OpenGL ES 2.0, H.264, VP8 (enc./dec.) and H.265 (dec.)
SOUND 2 x 2" stereo loudspeakers, microphone
SENSORS HD cameras, 3-axes accelerometer
BATTERY Li-ion Battery 3.7 V 4.000 mAh approx.
POWER 5 V Micro-B USB
O.S. FIXO Android based HTML5/API architecture
LANGUAGES English, Italian, French, German, Spanish
 

 

GOALS ON THE TIMELINE

 

 

THE TEAM

 

 

FIXO is a product by Nuvolaria Srl, an innovative start-up company based in Campobasso, Italy. Special thanks for their great support to Alessio Vitale, Umberto Colozza, Gianfranco Guglielmi, Noemi Patete, Bartolomeo Alberico, Pierpaolo Palladino, Giuseppe Terrigno, Antonello Di Criscio, Daniela Di Maria, Domenico Florio, Francesca Maniccia, Alberto Di Lecce, Domenico Manocchio, Fabiana Bavota e Mario Campopiano, Emiliano Pilla, and to the amazing students and professors of the Art School “Giorgio De Chirico” from Torre Annunziata (NA) and Computer Science School “Enrico Mattei" from Casamicciola, Ischia Island.

 

DEVELOPER? WE WANT YOU

Are you an HTML5 developer and do you want to create apps for Fixo? We have a proposal for you. Contact us to: dev@fixo.io

 

QUESTIONS & ANSWERS

What is the benefit ordering the products on Indiegogo?

By ordering now on Indiegogo entitles you to a substantial discount, to the free shipping and to gifts related to the achievement of the goals. Above all, you'll become part of our project, will be the first to make the experience of Fixo and will receive our best future offers.

When will Fixo be shipped?

Fixo will be shipped to our contributors in July 2017 [updated]. We'll complete shipping in the same order as we've received contributions. 

Is the shipping cost included?

Shipping is included in every Perks. This year Fixo will apply for CE and FCC certification that allow us shipping to Europe and the United States.

You will ship Fixo even if you don’t reach the goal?

Yes, this is the reason why we set a "flexible goal". We are receiving funding from investors outside the Indiegogo campaign but reaching the goal of the campaign can enable us to speed up our work and to reward our early supporters with additional gifts.

What is the challenge and the next steps planned?

Making a product so different from the ordinary like Fixo is not without challenges. That is why, before starting this campaign, we have spent a lot of time to find the right partners and to build working prototypes. In this page you can find our detailed timeline with the final steps towards production and shipping. 

Has it an internal battery?

Yes, FIXO has a 4000 mah internal battery useful to listen to music for at least two hours, for example when you are in the garden. But, normally, it is meant to be used on its support and connected to the power plug. 

How does Fixo connect to Internet?

Fixo connects to Internet through your local router with the standard Wi-Fi 802.11 B/G/N.

How does Fixo connect to the external accessories?

Smart Objects, external speakers and earphones are connected via Bluetooth 4.0/LE.

How many users does the Smart Scale support?

There is no formal limit to the number of users supported by the Smart Scale but, since Fixo distinguishes users by last known measurement, the higher the number of users the higher the probability of coincident weights. If in doubt, Fixo prompts to select the user to whom to attribute the measurement.

Can I order more than one Fixo, a larger number of units or have it with a custom software?

For bulk orders and for custom software solution please tell us your special needs contacting us to support@fixo.io

What about privacy?

No data is recorded locally on Fixo. Fixo stores any application data and media to your Google account (on Google Drive, Google Photos, Google Calendar, etc). The confidentiality of your data is related to the protection of your Google credentials. Video surveillance is made through 

Write us for any clarification to support@fixo.io. The most frequently asked questions will be published in this space during the campaign.

 

 

JOIN US!

We have deviced a product with personality that breaks conventions and combines real innovations with a timeless design. Now we need your help to start production and bring FIXO to life.

 

 

Join us and be the first to enter the world of FIXO at a special price!

 

 

PRESS

Interested in writing about us? Download our Press Kit. For further information visit our website fixo.io and feel free to email us directly at support@fixo.io

story:
The Keeper's Vision...

“Just glue some gears on it, and call it Steampunk.” By Reginald Pikedevant says it all. Within the mock Steampunk community and also in the unreal alternate history that gets mislabeled as Steampunk, we have seen too many people glue gears on mundane items to pass as Steampunk.

My Difference...

My personal designs consist of clockwork pieces, cogs, sprockets, gauged wires, feathers, leather,By polymer clay, Swarovski crystals, filigree, findings, real and glass pearls and anything else I can get my hands on. A lot of the finished products are wired together, soldered together, screwed together, but very few elements are glued.

Several of my pieces are handcrafted or specifically modified for that particular finished piece. 95% of my materials are repurposed and from mom-and-pop stores, yard sales, thrift stores, auctions, or on Etsy within the US.

My Situation...

My goal with this campaign is to be able to buy a work bench with a large enough workspace so I can work on several projects at the same time. As it stands right now I am based out of my dining room area and have consumed the entire space of my dining table. I just recently bought a storage shelf-but it can only hold so much material. The husband is working on our bare studded attic to make it into a living/ work space. So hopefully by the summer I can move everything up into the finished attic.

What is still needed...

  • A workbench
  • New tools
  • Better supply pieces
  • My first professional website (right now all I have is an Etsy page)
  • New and better components
  • A new soldering iron
  • A light box for better product/ professional looking photos
  • And eventually use some of the funding so I can be a vendor at different locations; Dragon*Con, Tesla Con, Steampunk World Fair and other locations that my customers and friends ask me to be at.
     

Added Goodies...

Along with the chosen rewards for backers I will keep a list of all the backers regardless how much was donated on a list so I can send out samples of new designs, almost like Beta testing. With the beta testing pieces they will be free and free of shipping charges. This will continue to show my utmost gratitude for making this project successful

Other Ways to Help...

Spred the word on Twitter, Facebook, friends, family... every little helps to get my AirShip dream in the air!
story_txt:
The Keeper's Vision...
“Just glue some gears on it, and call it Steampunk.” By Reginald Pikedevant says it all. Within the mock Steampunk community and also in the unreal alternate history that gets mislabeled as Steampunk, we have seen too many people glue gears on mundane items to pass as Steampunk.

My Difference...


My personal designs consist of clockwork pieces, cogs, sprockets, gauged wires, feathers, leather,By polymer clay, Swarovski crystals, filigree, findings, real and glass pearls and anything else I can get my hands on. A lot of the finished products are wired together, soldered together, screwed together, but very few elements are glued.

Several of my pieces are handcrafted or specifically modified for that particular finished piece. 95% of my materials are repurposed and from mom-and-pop stores, yard sales, thrift stores, auctions, or on Etsy within the US.

New tools

New and better components
