Anyways, I went to college and studied psychology for three years, but was burned out with all the papers and partying (Death to MLA and APA Formats!!!).  I was luckily accepted as a union electrician which has sustained me for the past 2 years.  
 
Get to the Point!! 
My campaign, Vagrant Soles (VGNT), is a way for me to put my "two cents" into the fashion world, and therefore social world, about the issues I find within it.  I am an overly cynical and paranoid young man who sees a lot of wrong in today's existence.  Why?  I'm not sure, as I had a magical and bright upbringing.  I plan to show the world the darker side that is commonly overlooked, in hopes of connecting to those who agree with my idea of what is really important in life and to create products that are deeper than fabric and print.
 
But the campaign's called Vagrant "Soles." What about the shoes?! 
Good question!  The original idea was to produce a simple and light bmx/skate/casual shoe that likeminded "shredders" want to wear.So I did what I could and got a prototype made.  I've been shredding on them for 2 months.  The reason I'm not trying to sell them yet is that there are some changes that need to be made, and I want to offer the best product to the consumer, which will take some time.  But they do shred damn well!
 
You keep using the term "shred." Please elaborate.
Well when someone asks me to define "shred," I refer to the Spongebob episode where Spongebob tries to explain "FUN" to fuddyduddy Plankton.  It's rather difficult but here's my attempt at it.  Shredding basically means doing what you're passionate about and doing it well, be it bmx, skateboarding, painting, piano, guitar, or whatever and consistently doing what you can to progress!  Obviously my shoes will be designed with the BMX/skateboarder in mind, which also means they will hold up for less "foot-intensive" activities.  My hope is that the Vagrant Soles message will appeal to those who have a burning love for their hobby and a desire to keep getting better.
 
That's all fine and dandy, but why should I buy your merch?
Why should you buy my merch? Hmmm. 
I am a man of my word, and while I can't boast my creddentials over the internet, I can hope to establish a trust with interested consumers.
The "trust" being the fact that I will do what I can to deliver durable, functional, and sweet looking products to my fellow shredders.  For now, the prices are higher than I had hoped, but will be cheaper once bulk orders are necessary and I have master the "Logistics Monster." 
Nowadays, lack of trust is a major issue of today's world that I hope to combat.  Too damn cut-throat!
Supporting Vagrant Soles will also support the up-and-comers of the shred community.  I plan generate extensive exposure for those who rock my products.  This will help others to try and live the same type of life I want to live.  I support the underdogs.
I want to create a successful company which will give me time to work on my shredder hobbies.  Aside from bmx, my main creative hobbies are photography and music production.  I am depressed when I am trapped in a noncreative lifestlye, and I'm sure most would feel the same. 
Supporting this campaign would be mega sweet.  
 
What are your future goals for Vagrant Soles?
I have many, I am a dreamer through and through.
My first goal would be to establish myself as a credible merchant of awesome products.  This is a huge part of what this company will be about.  While the products are simple, this will be a "watch us grow" company.  I'm calling the first releases the "1st Gen" products.  With more funds and exposure, I can design more radical and complex designs to keep the shred moving!
My second goal with this company is to try my hand in the high competition shoe market.  I sincerely believe if people knew the ideaology behind the company, they will give the kicks a try and love them.  While the shirt/whatever designs will become better with complexity, I want to keep the shoes simple.  Many shoes I see are way too flashy/flamboyent for my taste, and hopefully others (hopefully a niche market). Again, this goal will take some time.
The third goal would be to create a fully automated and problem-free customer experience so as to give me more time to explore my creative vibes, thus improving future products.  I want to go completely mobile, with a murdered-out Hurse, some Vagrant Soles products, my camera, and like two pairs of clothes and meet others who share my passion.  I feel cluttered with my possessions, and want to break free of them!
My fourth goal would be to get into the the female market.  I love the ladies, and they look super sexy in the right clothes.  My hopes are to make women at least 40% of my market (kind of a stretch given my company image).  I hope I can find a cute little thing that likes me well enough to model my stuff, and maybe grab a bite. ;)
My fifth goal is to bring followers a behind the scenes look at my life and the company.  I have a huge hard-on for documentaries, and have many dreams of making some sweet unadulterated documentaries showcasing some radical individuals.
My sixth goal, and ultimate goal (hints the company name), is to donate time and products to those in need.  I was scheming up a way to go to an orphanage and donate my kicks.  Sounds like a PR move, while it would be beneficial to the company, it would be deeper than what it appears.  Childrens' Homes, I believe they are called now, foster children who grow up with the idea that they are less valuable than other members of society.  Growing up with this mentality will undoubtedly create a self-fulfilling prophecy for them (hopefully this doesn't happen and more civil service is being done to avoid this).  My dream is to have a "shred event" for these children, giving them my shoes, my time and entertainment.  The entertainment being some buddies of mine who happen to work for a major BMX distributor who also happen to have ramps for such occasions to "jump" around and get them excited about the sport.  I feel that just by showing people care about what happens to these children, could ultimately change their path in life for the better.  The more successful this company becomes, the more "underdogs" I can help.  Imagine how rewarding it would be to know you've changed multiple lives of kids for the better!   Extremely rewarding.
 
 
Ok, now what about the perkzz?
 
Perk 1: $1-7 Help the Cause
You and I obviously think alike, which is a huge booster for this company.  I will hope to one day run into you and buy you a soda!  I will be thinking of you!
 
Perk 2: $8- The Vagrant Soles Koozie
Simple and lightweight koozie to keep your shredhands warm, and you're "soda" cold! Drink with a purpose.  Shipping included.
 
Perk 3: $16- VGNT Blinders
One pair of simple and lightweight shred shades to ward off the non-shredders!Shipping included.
 
Perk 4:  $30- The First Vagrant Tee!
Sweet VGNT shirt to look sexy while you shred and to support the shred movement!Will ask for sizes after the 30 days has reached an end.
 
Perk 5:  $52- Shred Blood Cell Count Bundlezz
You will receive the aforementioned products to ensure that the shred will continue.  The complete first gen set that will start the shredder empire!  Will ask for sizes after the 30 days has reached an end.
 
Perk 6: $1000- He Did What?!
You will receive the aforementioned products to ensure that the shred will continue. IN ADDITION I will personally visit you to solve the problems of the world, talk about the company, attempt to teach you how to barspin, as well as vacuum 1 room in your home of your choosing.  Vacuum must be provided and please dont live in Alaska or Hawaii.
 
Expected delivery seems far off, but I hope to get the products to you sooner.  I'm just using the date as a cushion.
New to this website but I hope to find some of your sweet campaigns to help fund!
 
NOTE: If you for some reason aren't completely on the same page as Vagrant Soles, but are curious about it, generate some talk! VGNT will take all the word of mouth we can get!  The weirder the better!  SPREAD THE SHRED!  Oh and use the indiegogo share tools!  I'll give you an imaginary french kiss!
 
Final Words of Wisdom
I want to become a man of the people.  Any advice/questions/concerns/ideas are openly accepted and appreciated.  If you are reading this, you have either read this entire post, or skimmed it.  Either way, you have my sincere thanks.
Expect a video and some more images very shortly!
With much shredlove,
Matthew Meneely
P.S.  Feel free to add me on Facebook.  I won't make it too weird.

story:
Hey, I'm Mark and I make wooden button's with my partner.

My partner Jenna and I make wooden button's primarily from locally collected white ash wood. We never cut/harm any tree's for our wood, only picking the best of fallen branches.



We do small, medium, & large sized button's, cut by Myself, sanded and drilled by my partner, before being coated with linseed oil and left to dry for 12 hours to cure. The curing brings out the details in the wood, as well as adding a coat of protection.



White ash wood is particularly hard to cut, especially with a one handed scroll saw like the one I've been using. We are no strangers to the unwritten law that when incorrect tool's are used it open's up the door for injury, so for the last year we have only been producing a small handful at a time, which Jenna can't help from snatching up for her own projects.

(I will be uploading a video shortly of what I go through each time I cut button's with my scroll saw... it's not as easy as you think!)

Upon special request we have also been making button's with burnt designs on them, for this my partner has been using a soldering tool which is not the correct tool for the job and leaves her with multiple burns on her hands and many miss burnt button's. It also means intricate burnt design's are not possible at all & considering her previous design work, I know she could produce some pretty wild design's with the right tool.

The initial idea for our button's was to be able to produce enough to be able to supply my partner for her own work, as well as countless numbers of fellow crafter's to use on their own projects.

Unfortunately with our current tool's we are unable to keep up with demand.

Which leads me to why we are asking for a total $500.

$220 of that will allow us to purchase a new Mastercraft 120V 9-in Bandsaw which will allow us to cut our button's in large numbers with ease and safety in mind.

$40 will allow us to purchase a Mastercraft Wood Burning Kit. No more burnt hands, and the proper tips & handle to burn intricate designs onto our buttons.

The remaining fund's will be used to purchase various wood stain's & Varnishes as well as to cover the cost of shipping out perk's to our contributors.

For your $15 contribution you will receive 10 button's
For your $25 contribution you will receive 15 button's
For your $35 contribution you will receive 20 button's

This would mean the world to my partner and I, and give us a HUGE leg up.
I appreciate any and all who read, like, share our campaign.

To those who contribute, I guarantee you will love our button's!!

story:
This campaign has ended.  However, we still have some sunglasses available and because of the BIG success of this Indiegogo Campaign, you can still order sunglasses from this page.

IMPORTANT NOTE:  Sunglasses will be sent within a week or so of your support.   Thank you for your support!


“Who Else Wants to Support the Mission to Create the World’s Greatest Eyewear [and receive these totally awesome sunglasses for your help]?”

 

             "Not all Sunglasses
              are Created Equal!"

(You’re about to discover how the "Orion4Sight Sunglasses on a Mission" deliver unrivaled vision performance.)

Are you a cyclist?  
A runner?  
A fisherman?  
A hunter?  
A hiker?  
A skiier?  
A golfer?  
A pilot?  
A basketball, baseball or softball player?
Actually, if you are active in any way and you want to improve your performance, these sunglasses are for YOU!

Poor quality and ordinary sunglasses are so common that most people don’t even know how bad their sunglasses are.  Though many sunglasses look alike, there are big differences in performance.  If you would like to have an entirely new vision experience with sunglasses like you’ve never seen before, this will be one of the most exciting messages you’ve ever read.  (It is in fact the Orion4Sight company's mission to create the world’s greatest Eyewear).  

What is this project about, and why should you support it? 

Some may think our mission to create the world’s greatest Eyewear is crazy.  But we don’t agree. In fact, we’ve already created the greatest sunglass lenses available on the planet.  And with your help, this is just the beginning.

And in whatever activity you love to participate in, these sunglasses can take your experience to the next level!

The sunglass lenses we’ve created are revolutionary.  They are a brand-new consumer spin-off version of patented vision technology that is being used by elite US Military Special Force Commands today.  You can only get this new spin-off technology from Orion4Sight Ltd. – we invented it – and the technology today is protected under our closely guarded trade secrets.

                  

                          Military version of the Eyewear displayed in photo above

For years the inventor of this technology (his name is Kirk Kreutzig) has been asked to develop a consumer version of the Military Eyewear of his creation.  After years of development, an earlier crowd-funding campaign got us started by helping to fund this new consumer version.  We now have a limited stock remaining to offer as a perk in this campaign (see the list of perks on the right of this screen).

You can get a pair of these sunglasses with unmatched lens technology, and enjoy them in any sport or activity of your choice!  You'll see things more clearly.  Everything will look more crisp.  You'll have a more enjoyable experience through an enhanced vision experience.

An Exciting New Vision Technology

When you look through our newly developed sunglasses the world looks different, better, more vivid, more clear, and more beautiful!  In fact, you will even notice things you never saw before.

We are asking for your support to advance new lines of Eyewear that will utilize the Orion4Sight vision technologies (“O4S”).  We are excited to be able to provide the finest Eyewear on the planet, driven with this technology.

        

This man is wearing the new Orion4Sight sunglasses we are offering as a perk in this campaign.

Why are people calling these “Sunglasses on a Mission”?

When we started hearing people refer to these as “Sunglasses on a Mission” we liked it because it describes our campaign in the following three ways:

#1:  These O4S Sunglasses boast a rich military and law enforcement pedigree.  In fact, for almost two decades our original core Orion Optical Eyewear Filters are being utilized by elite US Special Operations Forces on top secret and other military missions.  The military version has been battle tested by military and law enforcement personnel, and the patented vision technology has literally helped save lives of many who serve.  Hence, calling our brand-new consumer spin-off version “Sunglasses on a Mission” is perfect.

                          
      Soldier wearing the Military version of the Orion Optical Eyewear Filters

#2:  Because of the military heritage of these Sunglasses, we are donating 5% of the money raised in this Indiegogo campaign to the Special Operations Warrior Foundation, a remarkable charity serving the families of fallen military personnel (providing college education funds and more for kids of fallen soldiers). We are honored that our Orion4Sight sunglasses are helping to advance the Mission of this charity as well.

#3:  The third reason Sunglasses on a Mission is an appropriate title is that we have a Mission to create the best line of consumer eyewear on the planet, incorporating our vision technology into new Orion4Sight consumer eyewear.  (But we can’t achieve this epic Mission without your help.)

             

Why We Need Your Support

We’ve developed a truly remarkable pair of sunglasses, but we’re just at the beginning of what Orion4Sight will become.  Your support on Indiegogo today will help us accelerate our development and the creation of additional product lines (including custom high-performance Ski Goggles and high performance fashion eyewear).  Understandably, improving and expanding our product line will take additional funding, R&D and time.  So we thank you in advance for supporting this campaign and our troops.                   

Extensive Research

The original Spectrum Technologies products are Patented for their ability to improve human vision under extreme lighting conditions. The “Vision Transferability” is corroborated Research Papers conducted by the US Navy, Army, and Air Force.

Your ORION4Sight spin-off Eyewear integrates many of the vision Technologies used by elite US Special Operation Commands, including many Law Enforcement Agencies.

Here’s a Big Perk for Your Support

You can get a pair of these Orion4Sight Sunglasses on a Mission sent to you shortly after the end of the campaign. 

Because you’ll be helping us with our mission to create a line of Eyewear that’s best on the planet (and because you’ll be helping advance the mission of the Special Operations Warrior Foundation as well), you can be rewarded with this amazing Eyewear soon.  Everyone wins when you support this campaign today!

(And when you receive your sunglasses, you'll be out cycling or running or hiking or hunting or fishing or shooting hoops or playing softball or driving or golfing or working in the yard or whatever your chosen sport or activity...in awesome comfort and style!)

The original retail price for these sunglasses is $195.00.  We have a limited number available after the close of this campaign, and you can now receive a pair for your support of just $105.  They will never be offered for less than you find in this campaign, and you can get them sent to you at the end of August. 

The O4S Sunglasses on a Mission are sleek wraparounds, and when you receive them they’ll be tucked into a white microfiber cleaning bag inside of a rugged protective case (see photo).  Included is a set of Eyewear Instructions that explain correct usage of the Eyewear so you can achieve maximum visual benefits.

    This photo shows the package you'll receive when you support the campaign.

Some of the World’s Coolest People are Already Enjoying the O4S Eyewear…and You’re Invited to Join Them.

                                      

                      

                    

                   

The Sunglasses have unisex frames, and look great on men and women in all seasons of the year.

Now that you’ve discovered this remarkable Eyewear, you may begin to notice very cool people already wearing the O4S Sunglasses while performing on stage, in sporting events, or on TV.  And speaking of cool people, the fact we are raising money to help the Special Operations Warrior Foundation is a special part of this campaign as well.  

When people see you wearing these O4S Sunglasses as you engage in your favorite activities, they’ll want to try them on.  After they do they’ll likely want a pair too, and this will further help to advance the epic Mission we’re on.  So please spread the word through Facebook, Twitter and elsewhere. 

Please share the link to this Indiegogo campaign with others. (They can also search Sunglasses on a Mission on Indiegogo to participate in this campaign.)

What Else Makes These Sunglasses So Special?

                          

                                                          The Inventor – Kirk Kreutzig

Kirk Kreutzig is the inventor and founder/sole owner of Orion4Sight Ltd.  His Orion4Sight Eyewear selectively regulates light to minimize the visual sensation of overwhelming brightness. This unique filtering process attains an optimum balance of photopic (day) and scotopic (night) vision along with improved scene contrast yielding improved visual acuity.

Here’s a graphic to illustrate why it works:

·  O4S Eyewear blocks 99.9% of UVA and UVB light

·  O4S Eyewear has anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings

·  O4S Eyewear has wrap-around unisex frame

·  O4S Eyewear’s wrap-around frame transmits maximum amount of filtered light to your eyes

·  O4S Eyewear has improved visual acuity

·  O4S Eyewear has improved scene contrast

·  O4S Eyewear has improved color saturation

·  O4S Eyewear reduces eyestrain

·  O4S Eyewear incorporates technology that surpasses anything else available.   

You should know that you can use this Eyewear any time of the year, for nearly any activity, including sports and leisure outdoor events, driving, hiking, hunting, working in the yard, skiing, and so forth.

Remember, this one-of-a-kind Eyewear incorporates core ORION spinoff technologies providing unrivaled vision for those seeking unsurpassed Eyewear performance.          

                            

Get A Pair Sent to You Soon…

Again, we have a limited number of the Eyewear left after the previous crowd funding campaign, and that’s what we are offering (while they last) as a perk in this Indiegogo campaign.  And as you offer your support to this campaign you’ll be helping us continue to develop the exciting line of world-class Eyewear.  Thank you in advance for your support!

Money Back Guarantee!

What we’ve created here are truly remarkable lenses, and here's our guarantee:  if you're not satisfied with your O4S Sunglasses on Mission, you may return them within 30-days of receipt in original condition and receive a refund for the cost of the Eyewear.  What could be fairer than that?  Send them back if you don’t love them – it’s that simple.


Additional details for this Indiegogo Campaign, and other O4S Eyewear Programs being developed, will be posted on our web site:  

             www.Orion4Sight.com

 Can't Contribute? You can still help

We know not everyone can contribute, but you can help this mission to spread.  Whether or not you are able to financially back this campaign, we ask that you please share the campaign across all of your social networks.

You can find us on FACEBOOK.  The more people who are aware of the campaign and the Sunglasses on a Mission, the better chances we have to hit our goal, and to offer significant financial support to the Special Operations Warrior Foundation as well.  Thank you!  

             “Orion4Sight Sunglasses:
     Performance Driven by Excellence”

           

THIS CAMPAIGN ENDED, BUT YOU CAN NOW GET THE SUNGLASSES IN THIS "ON-DEMAND" STAGE.


Because of the success of this Indiegogo Campaign, it is now in the "In-Demand" stage.  

IMPORTANT NOTE:  Sunglasses will be sent in August.   Thank you for your support!

The original retail price for these sunglasses is $195.00.  We have a limited number available after the close of this campaign, and you can now receive a pair for your support of just $105. 
They will never be offered for less than you find in this campaign, and you can get them sent to you at the end of August.  


The O4S Sunglasses on a Mission
are sleek wraparounds, and when you receive them they’ll be tucked into a white
microfiber cleaning bag inside of a rugged protective case (see photo).  Included is a set of Eyewear Instructions
that explain correct usage of the Eyewear so you can achieve maximum visual
benefits.

    This photo shows the package you'll
receive when you support the campaign.

Some of the World’s Coolest People are Already Enjoying the O4S Eyewear…and You’re Invited to Join Them.
                                      

                                          
                   


The
Sunglasses have unisex frames, and look great on men and women in all seasons of the year.Now that you’ve discovered this remarkable Eyewear, you may begin to notice very
cool people already wearing the O4S Sunglasses while performing on stage, in sporting
events, or on TV.  And speaking of cool people, the fact we are raising money to help the
Special Operations Warrior Foundation
is a special part of this campaign as well.  

When
people see you wearing these O4S Sunglasses
as you engage in your favorite activities, they’ll want to try them on.  After they do they’ll likely want a pair too,
and this will further help to advance the epic Mission we’re on.  So please spread the word
through Facebook, Twitter and elsewhere. 


Please share the link to this Indiegogo campaign
with others. (They can also search Sunglasses on a Mission on Indiegogo to participate in this campaign.)What Else Makes These Sunglasses So Special?
                                                                                    The Inventor – Kirk KreutzigKirk Kreutzig is the inventor and founder/sole owner of Orion4Sight Ltd.  His Orion4Sight Eyewear selectively regulates light to minimize the visual sensation of overwhelming brightness. This unique
filtering process attains an optimum balance of photopic (day) and scotopic
(night) vision along with improved scene contrast yielding improved visual
acuity.

Here’s a graphic to illustrate why it works:




· 
O4S
Eyewear blocks 99.9% of UVA and UVB light
· 
O4S
Eyewear has anti-fog and anti-scratch coatings
· 
O4S
Eyewear has wrap-around unisex frame 
· 
O4S
Eyewear’s wrap-around frame transmits maximum amount of filtered light to your
eyes
· 
O4S
Eyewear has improved visual acuity
· 
O4S
Eyewear has improved scene contrast
· 
O4S
Eyewear has improved color saturation
·  O4S Eyewear reduces
eyestrain
·  O4S Eyewear incorporates
technology that surpasses anything else available.    
You
should know that you can use this Eyewear any time of the year, for nearly any activity, including
sports and leisure outdoor events, driving, hiking, hunting, working in the
yard, skiing, and so
forth. Remember, this one-of-a-kind Eyewear incorporates core ORION spinoff
technologies providing unrivaled vision for those seeking unsurpassed Eyewear
performance.          
                            Get A Pair Sent to You Soon…
Again, we have a limited number
of the Eyewear left after the previous crowd funding campaign, and that’s what
we are offering (while they last) as a perk in this Indiegogo campaign.  And as you offer your support to this
campaign you’ll be helping us continue to develop the exciting line of
world-class Eyewear.  Thank you in
advance for your support!

Money Back Guarantee!
What
we’ve created here are truly remarkable lenses, and here's our guarantee:  if you're not satisfied with your O4S Sunglasses on Mission, you may return them within 30-days of receipt in original condition
and receive a refund for the cost of the Eyewear.  What could be fairer than that?  Send them back if you don’t love them – it’s that simple.


Additional
details for this Indiegogo Campaign, and other O4S Eyewear Programs being
developed, will be posted on our web site:  
             www.Orion4Sight.com
 Can't
Contribute? You can still help
We know not everyone can contribute, but you can help this mission
to spread.  Whether or not you are able
to financially back this campaign, we
ask that you please share the campaign across all
of your social networks.
You can find us on FACEBOOK.  The more people who are aware of the campaign
and the Sunglasses on a Mission, the
better chances we have to hit our goal, and to offer significant financial
support to the Special Operations
Warrior Foundation as well.  Thank you!  

             “Orion4Sight
Sunglasses:      Performance Driven by Excellence”




           
THIS CAMPAIGN ENDED, BUT YOU CAN NOW GET THE SUNGLASSES IN THIS "ON-DEMAND" STAGE.
Because of the success of this Indiegogo Campaign, it is now in the "In-Demand" stage.  
IMPORTANT NOTE:  Sunglasses will be sent in August.   Thank you for your support!

story:
As seen on

Hi and welcome to our project! 

First of all, thank you for landing on our Indiegogo page! 

We greatly value your time and interest. Before you go any further, did you know? Word of mouth is the MOST powerful tool in marketing. 

So if you like what you see, spread the word!

Below is a selection of photos to get a better idea about our product and the styles that are available.

About our project |

We started out with a simple goal: Find a quality, stylish watch at an affordable price.

As you may have guessed, watch prices ran into the hundreds (for an average looking watch). This motivated us to bring an affordable stylish watch to the market.

Over the past two years we have worked closely with a local designer and a top international watch manufacturer, with over 10 years of experience in the watch industry. Using our creativity and their expertise we designed and built a new watch from the ground up, paying close attention to every detail.

LMTLS pronounced Limitless is not just another watch brand. We know there is nothing like LMTLS watches on the market. We have scaled back all non-essential costs by working directly with our manufacturer (bypassing the "middleman") on every aspect of the watch. This has enabled us to provide an extremely competitive price whilst maintaining the highest of quality.

About us |

We are two young "Kiwi" guys from New Zealand, a small country with a population of 4.4 million people. 

In between our busy work and study commitments, we have had plenty of long nights to bring this project to life. LMTLS started from a lounge and a burning desire to become entrepreneurs. 

We realised we had the opportunity to bring a truly unique, affordable and high quality watch to market with a New Zealand influence behind it. The 100% natural wood bezel represents the beautiful vast green landscapes across New Zealand. The smart look and quality feel of the watch represents the high quality standard that New Zealand is renowned for. 

Although New Zealand is small, we (as a country) have always liked to punch well above our weight. We truly believe with your support on Indiegogo, we can reach a global market and thrive.

The meaning behind our brand | 

We believe that everyone has the ability to be extraordinary at anything in life; all that is needed is proper planning and execution.

This product is for the entrepreneurs and anyone who has a big dream to chase. We want our brand to be something our backers could aspire to. This gave us a perfect brand name: LMTLS. Limitless - without end, limit or boundary. 

We believe this word perfectly represents our products and the meaning behind our brand.

The Win/Win | 

From day one it was important for us to create a “win/win.” 

We want customers to feel valued and receive a high quality product that is priced fairly, while allowing us to continue to grow our brand. Using our strong passion for business and product design, and our ability to source quality components, everyone will get a better deal.

Watch Specifications |

Stainless Steel case with sandal wood bezel

Case Material: 316L

Case Diameter: 43mm

Face Diameter: 35.5mm

Case Thickness: 9.4mm

Genuine leather straps

Width: 22mm 

Band Length: 75mm/115mm

Japan Miyota with date function 

Water Resistance: 3ATM (30 meters) 

Mineral glass face

As these are hand crafted watches, no two watches are the same. Although they will be similar, the different cuts and textures of the wood create a truly unique finish.

We are confident in our product, but for your peace of mind all of our watches have a one-year warranty.

Your support | 

We need your help to place a large enough order to make the watch at a cost effective price. 

As this will be the first official order for LMTLS Watches your support will cover the production costs of the watches + packaging and shipping.

This will help with our goal to grow LMTLS Watches into a market leader, providing style and uniqueness at affordable prices. 

We have been working round the clock and believe the possibilities are limitless (puns-intended). 

With your help, you will enable us to build our brand further. 

With your help we can bring out more quality products that have our brand values of committing to high quality and style with no ridiculous mark ups. 

We have big plans for LMTLS. For starters we want to bring out more colour combinations, models and watches for the ladies market.

If you made it this far, thanks for you support! 

Gallery |

Social Media | 

https://www.instagram.com/lmtlswatches/

https://www.facebook.com/lmtlswatches 

Seen on |

http://www.stuff.co.nz/business/84539382/Limitl...

http://thegadgetflow.com/portfolio/lmtls-watches/

http://heygents.com.au/2015/05/lmtls-watches-fr...

http://www.thecoolector.com/lmtls-watches/

http://watchbandit.com/lmtls-free-yourself-of-l...

Co-founders Marcus Sos & Wiliam McClure

Projected Timeline LEAD TIME & DELIVERY |

Knowing the exact timeline from beginning of production to the end is never an easy thing to predict.

We have built strong relationships with our supplier and logistics partners. 

We're confident that we can finish all orders within our projected timeline. Risks and challenges If this project is successfully funded the next step will be collecting the information via a questionnaire from our pledgers as to the style of watch they prefer and shipping details for each watch. 

In other projects there have been some delays in shipment and meeting timelines. We hope to avoid this by strict quality control leading to the shortest possible time from project finish to shipping.  

Risks and challenges

We have done everything possible to minimize risk and our goal is to stick to the timeline. If for any reason there are delays from unseen obstacles, you will be notified as soon as we are aware of any issues.

We will be transparent with you, we know communication is the best way to avoid frustrations.

If for any reason there are delays from unseen obstacles, you will be notified as soon as we are aware of any issues.We will be transparent with you, we know communication is the best way to avoid frustrations.

story:
Parker Gray makes the world’s best pajamas. It’s not just the ultra-soft Supima® cotton fabrics, luxurious feel, and simple yet elegant menswear-inspired design that makes our sleepwear shine--it’s what they do when you buy them. For every purchase, we donate to a woman in need. And you’ll sleep better, too!

When we learned that pajamas are one of the most requested clothing items at domestic violence shelters, we knew we had to do something. So we started a company, designed the world’s best pajamas, and put together a plan to use their popularity to help those  in need. Now we’re using our Indiegogo campaign to kick off our initial production run to get it all rolling.

 

No matter how advanced an apparel technology is, if it doesn't look good, now one will wear it.  That's why our pajamas are beautifully designed with an amazing fit. Our pajamas are timeless, with a classic menswear-inspired silhouette. Whether you're snuggling up in bed to an addictive read or watching Netflix with friends, these timeless pajamas will have you feeling chic and sexy (while still comfy) at the end of the day.

Grown exclusively in the southwestern United States, Supima® is a rare form of cotton that is softer, finer, and more durable than regular cotton. This extra long staple cotton is also natural and breathable. Supima regulates body temperature so you get a ‘cool’ sleep on warm nights and a ‘warm’ sleep on cool nights for year-round comfort. The extra long-staple also gives Supima® the luster of silk and the luxuriously soft feel of cashmere. Try our pajamas once and you'll never sleep in anything else again.

The best quality comes when you make things at home. We aren’t another company that goes overseas to manufacture simply because it is cheaper to do so. We see a better way. We’re adopting technology to manufacture in small batches here at home; we’re setting up shop in the U.S and reinvesting our profits into job training programs that support economic development in our community.

Parker Gray is driven by a mission to develop products that improve lives. The concept is simple: for every purchase, Parker Gray will donate to those in need – in other words “buy one, give one.” The popularity of the one-for-one concept has been proven by companies like TOMS shoes, Warby Parker eyeglasses and Bombas socks.

After decades of complacency in the sleepwear industry, we’re giving pajamas a much-needed makeover.  Made with smart fabrics, advanced construction and manufactured locally, Parker Gray pajamas are created to be so comfortable that you’ll never want to take them off—and so practical, that you don’t need to.

Inspired by the classic 20th century menswear pajamas, we set out to design a timeless and stylish collection with a modern twist.

Parker Gray was founded by a group of apparel industry veterans who believe there is a better way to make pajamas. Our team shares a passion for creating beautifully designed products that improve lives.

To create the world’s best pajamas we started from scratch. No details were overlooked: from the superior pima cotton fabric to the reinforced shell buttons, and from the grosgrain drawstring to the satin piping, we designed our sleepwear to be both pretty and practical, with a polished look and a flattering fit.

Like coffee, cashmere or fine wine, the quality of cotton can vary greatly.

 

We’re on Indiegogo to raise funds to purchase materials and get into the initial production run. Your backing will help us position Parker Gray for success, allow us to retrain U. S. workers for better jobs and create a brighter future for women who need your support.  

We’ve teamed up with nearly a dozen nonprofit organizations - great folks like Mom’s Pajamas and Shelter House - who will serve as our Giving Partners and distribute our pajamas to shelters in their communities.

Our pajamas are designed for extreme leisure, with soothing, tranquil colors that promote relaxation and encourage more restful sleep. Not only is our Supima® cotton fabric luxuriously soft, it is also known for its vibrant long-lasting color. This means your Parker Gray pajamas will retain their brilliance over many years of use. You will be able to choose your colors and specify your size in a survey that will be sent once the campaign ends!

To get there, we need to sell a lot of pajamas!

 

Pledge $300 and join the Founder’s Club! Receive our entire pajama collection (1 of each style) at 50% off MSRP, and get exclusive offers and special discounts.

You will receive one of each of the following:

1 set of classic pajamas + 1 set of short sleeve crop pajamas + 1 set of shorty pajamas + 1 pussyhat sleep mask + 1 kimono robe

It takes a lot of courage for women to leave their abuser. A new set of pajamas, belonging only to the survivor, is meant to offer comfort and security during a new beginning. Women often arrive  a shelter with nothing but their children and the clothes on their backs, so on a practical level, she needs something cozy and comfy to sleep in.

On a deeper level,  having the freedom to make a small initial decision through picking out something nice for themselves can be the first step toward recovery. Knowing that people in the community care — even ones they’ve never met — helps to give survivors a sense of belonging and support that aids in rebuilding their lives.  

 

Our journey started almost three years ago when we began to explore a radically new approach to making pajamas and sleepwear. Made in America, from premium materials, using automated technology to manufacture in small batches and still turn a profit at scale.

When we learned that pajamas were one of the most requested items at domestic violence shelters, we decided to adopt a one-for-one business model in order to help those in need. The fact is that women’s rights - including the Violence Against Women Act - are under fire right now...it feels like it’s important to help fight back.

After the 2017 Women’s March, we were inspired to create this adorable “PussyHat Sleep Mask” with the idea we could donate proceeds and help support affordable healthcare for every woman - it's the perfect addition to our sleepwear collection, and great for a quick cat nap! 

Parker Gray makes it easy to feel good about buying our products. Whether you are motivated by great fit, luxuriously soft fabrics, or using the power of your purchase to help others, we’ve got you covered. As a special “thank you” for supporting us from the beginning we want to give you the world’s best pajamas at special prices. Check out our EARLY BIRD perks below:

We’re a team of dreamers, doers & creators on a mission to make a difference in the world. There’s nothing we love more than helping others.

When we learned that pajamas are one of the most requested clothing items at domestic violence shelters, it inspired us to help. We saw an opportunity to give pajamas a much needed makeover and use their popularity to generate donations for women in need through our “buy one, give one” business model.

We created parker gray to help improve the lives of women and to make a difference. Our whole team is passionate about what we’re doing and love every product we make. We sincerely hope you do to.

We need your help to get started so we can position our company for success. Your support will help get us into our first production run. In return, you’ll be the first to try our amazing pajamas and know your contribution made a difference to those in need.

 

1. How do I choose my sizes, colors and styles?
At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out where you can choose sizes, colors, and styles for your new Parker Gray Pajamas.

2. What are the shipping costs?
US Shipping costs are included in each reward. There are additional costs for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. 

3. When can I expect my order to arrive?
Parker Gray pajamas are expected to ship in September 2017. This completion date range may be extended based on how successful this campaign is, because our factories have limits on the amount of pajamas they can make during a normal production cycle.

4. Will they shrink?
Parker Gray PJs are pre-washed so they are extra soft and designed to fit perfectly from the moment you put them on. And forever after that. We wanted to make sure we created a pajama that you could wear every day without worrying about any special washing instructions. Parker Gray will hold up to the high heat of any dryer and come out perfectly every time.

5. Where are your Pajamas made?
Our pajamas and sleepwear are 100% Made in the USA. We work with mills and factories in California, North Carolina, Pennsylvania and Virginia. All orders will ship from our distribution center in Virginia.

6. What if I don’t like them?
Unlikely, but stranger things have happened! That said, if for any reason, you aren't happy with your Parker Gray just reach out to us at hello@ParkerGrayPJs.com and we'll arrange for an exchange or full return.

7. Will you have Men’s Pajamas?
Heck yeah! Men need to step up their pajama game too! Our men’s line will launch in Summer 2017, stay tuned so you can be #1 in line to give our amazing performance pajamas a try! 

8. Where can I buy your pajamas?
We sell directly to the consumer through e-commerce. By using a disruptive direct-to-consumer model, and cutting out the middlemen, we can offer premium pajamas for practical price while maintaining the same high-quality standards as leading luxury brands.

9. Why donate pajamas?
Through your purchases, we help provide pajamas and sleepwear to to people in need. The concept is simple: Buy a pair of pajamas, and a second pair is donated to a person in need through one of our Giving Partners – in other words “buy one, give one”

The popularity of the ‘one for one’ concept has been proven by the following companies:

  • TOMS shoes
  • Warby Parker eyeglasses
  • Bombas socks

10. What about unintended consequences of donating?
Because our production will all be in the U.S. (yes, even our donated sleepwear will be made locally), we don’t have the unintended consequences of making one problem—such as supporting unregulated sweatshops in far-off lands—worse as part of solving another. Instead, we’re supporting domestic manufacturing by investing in infrastructure, technology-driven economic development and job creation. We call our approach a “one-for-one+” model, and we’re pretty pumped about it.

11. Can you explain more about the cost of your pajamas?
There are three things that are influencing our prices: (1) we're making pajamas in the U.S. (which we love, but is costly) (2) we're not producing in huge numbers like the big brands out there (which means higher cost per unit); and (3) we build in a donation. For Indiegogo, we're also including shipping costs.

Our beautifully designed pajamas also have all the timeless features that the leading brands do (you know who they are), and, despite the many influences on our cost of goods, is competitively priced with them too.

12. How did you get your name Parker Gray?
Parker Gray is an historic neighborhood with a rich cultural history as part of Alexandria, VA's African-American community. The district was named after two African-American educators during the segregation era, John Parker and Sarah Gray, who established the Parker-Gray School in 1920. The community’s original residents worked together to make future brighter. We like that. The name Parker Gray is a reminder of a place we call home, that we're all connected and little improvements can add up to make a big difference.

13. What are the risks and challenges?

There are some risks that could delay the process of getting our pajamas into your hands. We have the research, testing, fabric samples, patterns, and prototypes. We have the sources for the materials and production all lined up. The primary thing we are missing, and what this crowdfunding campaign will help provide, are the ratios of colors and sizes so that we can order accurate amounts of what is needed to produce your orders.

We’ve been making clothes in America for 10 years now, and so we’re familiar with the challenges of being a U.S. manufacturer. That said, another challenge is the financial investment: It’s simply just more expensive to make clothes in the U.S. and to develop proprietary fabrics.

Lastly, our designs and pictures are of prototypes that represent the final product; however, as we continue to receive your input, we may incorporate subtle updates/enhancements prior to production. If so, any changes will be transparently communicated to all backers.

No details were overlooked: from the superior pima cotton fabric to the reinforced shell buttons, and from the grosgrain drawstring to the satin piping, we designed our sleepwear to be both pretty and practical, with a polished look and a flattering fit.Like coffee, cashmere or fine wine, the quality of cotton can vary greatly. We’re on Indiegogo to raise funds to purchase materials and get into the initial production run. Your backing will help us position Parker Gray for success, allow us to retrain U. S. workers for better jobs and create a brighter future for women who need your support.  We’ve teamed up with nearly a dozen nonprofit organizations - great folks like Mom’s Pajamas and Shelter House - who will serve as our Giving Partners and distribute our pajamas to shelters in their communities.Our pajamas are designed for extreme leisure, with soothing, tranquil colors that promote relaxation and encourage more restful sleep. Not only is our Supima® cotton fabric luxuriously soft, it is also known for its vibrant long-lasting color. This means your Parker Gray pajamas will retain their brilliance over many years of use. You will be able to choose your colors and specify your size in a survey that will be sent once the campaign ends!To get there, we need to sell a lot of pajamas! Pledge $300 and join the Founder’s Club! Receive our entire pajama collection (1 of each style) at 50% off MSRP, and get exclusive offers and special discounts.You will receive one of each of the following:1 set of classic pajamas + 1 set of short sleeve crop pajamas + 1 set of shorty pajamas + 1 pussyhat sleep mask + 1 kimono robeIt takes a lot of courage for women to leave their abuser. A new set of pajamas, belonging only to the survivor, is meant to offer comfort and security during a new beginning. Women often arrive  a shelter with nothing but their children and the clothes on their backs, so on a practical level, she needs something cozy and comfy to sleep in.On a deeper level,  having the freedom to make a small initial decision through picking out something nice for themselves can be the first step toward recovery. Knowing that people in the community care — even ones they’ve never met — helps to give survivors a sense of belonging and support that aids in rebuilding their lives.   Our journey started almost three years ago when we began to explore a radically new approach to making pajamas and sleepwear. Made in America, from premium materials, using automated technology to manufacture in small batches and still turn a profit at scale.When we learned that pajamas were one of the most requested items at domestic violence shelters, we decided to adopt a one-for-one business model in order to help those in need. The fact is that women’s rights - including the Violence Against Women Act - are under fire right now...it feels like it’s important to help fight back.After the 2017 Women’s March, we were inspired to create this adorable “PussyHat Sleep Mask” with the idea we could donate proceeds and help support affordable healthcare for every woman - it's the perfect addition to our sleepwear collection, and great for a quick cat nap! Parker Gray makes it easy to feel good about buying our products. Whether you are motivated by great fit, luxuriously soft fabrics, or using the power of your purchase to help others, we’ve got you covered. As a special “thank you” for supporting us from the beginning we want to give you the world’s best pajamas at special prices. Check out our EARLY BIRD perks below:We’re a team of dreamers, doers & creators on a mission to make a difference in the world. There’s nothing we love more than helping others.When we learned that pajamas are one of the most requested clothing items at domestic violence shelters, it inspired us to help. We saw an opportunity to give pajamas a much needed makeover and use their popularity to generate donations for women in need through our “buy one, give one” business model.We created parker gray to help improve the lives of women and to make a difference. Our whole team is passionate about what we’re doing and love every product we make. We sincerely hope you do to.We need your help to get started so we can position our company for success. Your support will help get us into our first production run. In return, you’ll be the first to try our amazing pajamas and know your contribution made a difference to those in need. 1. How do I choose my sizes, colors and styles?At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out where you can choose sizes, colors, and styles for your new Parker Gray Pajamas.2. What are the shipping costs?US Shipping costs are included in each reward. There are additional costs for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. 3. When can I expect my order to arrive?Parker Gray pajamas are expected to ship in September 2017. This completion date range may be extended based on how successful this campaign is, because our factories have limits on the amount of pajamas they can make during a normal production cycle.4. Will they shrink?Parker Gray PJs are pre-washed so they are extra soft and designed to fit perfectly from the moment you put them on. And forever after that. We wanted to make sure we created a pajama that you could wear every day without worrying about any special washing instructions. Parker Gray will hold up to the high heat of any dryer and come out perfectly every time.5. Where are your Pajamas made?Our pajamas and sleepwear are 100% Made in the USA. We work with mills and factories in California, North Carolina, Pennsylvania and Virginia. All orders will ship from our distribution center in Virginia.6. What if I don’t like them?Unlikely, but stranger things have happened! That said, if for any reason, you aren't happy with your Parker Gray just reach out to us at hello@ParkerGrayPJs.com and we'll arrange for an exchange or full return.7. Will you have Men’s Pajamas?Heck yeah! Men need to step up their pajama game too! Our men’s line will launch in Summer 2017, stay tuned so you can be #1 in line to give our amazing performance pajamas a try! 8. Where can I buy your pajamas?We sell directly to the consumer through e-commerce. By using a disruptive direct-to-consumer model, and cutting out the middlemen, we can offer premium pajamas for practical price while maintaining the same high-quality standards as leading luxury brands.9. Why donate pajamas?Through your purchases, we help provide pajamas and sleepwear to to people in need. The concept is simple: Buy a pair of pajamas, and a second pair is donated to a person in need through one of our Giving Partners – in other words “buy one, give one”The popularity of the ‘one for one’ concept has been proven by the following companies:
TOMS shoes
Warby Parker eyeglasses
Bombas socks
10. What about unintended consequences of donating?Because our production will all be in the U.S. (yes, even our donated sleepwear will be made locally), we don’t have the unintended consequences of making one problem—such as supporting unregulated sweatshops in far-off lands—worse as part of solving another. Instead, we’re supporting domestic manufacturing by investing in infrastructure, technology-driven economic development and job creation. We call our approach a “one-for-one+” model, and we’re pretty pumped about it.11. Can you explain more about the cost of your pajamas?There are three things that are influencing our prices: (1) we're making pajamas in the U.S. (which we love, but is costly) (2) we're not producing in huge numbers like the big brands out there (which means higher cost per unit); and (3) we build in a donation. For Indiegogo, we're also including shipping costs.Our beautifully designed pajamas also have all the timeless features that the leading brands do (you know who they are), and, despite the many influences on our cost of goods, is competitively priced with them too.12. How did you get your name Parker Gray?Parker Gray is an historic neighborhood with a rich cultural history as part of Alexandria, VA's African-American community. The district was named after two African-American educators during the segregation era, John Parker and Sarah Gray, who established the Parker-Gray School in 1920. The community’s original residents worked together to make future brighter. We like that. The name Parker Gray is a reminder of a place we call home, that we're all connected and little improvements can add up to make a big difference.13. What are the risks and challenges?There are some risks that could delay the process of getting our pajamas into your hands. We have the research, testing, fabric samples, patterns, and prototypes. We have the sources for the materials and production all lined up. The primary thing we are missing, and what this crowdfunding campaign will help provide, are the ratios of colors and sizes so that we can order accurate amounts of what is needed to produce your orders.We’ve been making clothes in America for 10 years now, and so we’re familiar with the challenges of being a U.S. manufacturer. That said, another challenge is the financial investment: It’s simply just more expensive to make clothes in the U.S. and to develop proprietary fabrics.Lastly, our designs and pictures are of prototypes that represent the final product; however, as we continue to receive your input, we may incorporate subtle updates/enhancements prior to production. If so, any changes will be transparently communicated to all backers.
